name: Brian Bagwell
text: This rental is the best overall vacation home on Weiss Lake! 5 stars! We try to get this one every year that we go to Weiss Lake - It has a spacious, comfortable house with excellent views and a easy to find location.  You can fish from the swim dock or just go swimming. Great place to water ski from dock to the Coosa River flow in Weiss Lake.  Best Deal on the lake! Don't miss it!

name: Tonetta Gilbert
text: My family loves staying here (this past March was our fourth year staying at the house) We always have a great time. While my husband and kids fish, I relax out on the deck with a good book or knitting project. I recommend this house whether you are going to the lake to fish or just to get away from it all.

name: Rick Hauber
text: You can't get much better than this place!  We've stayed here for many years.  It's a beautiful setting with a beautiful view of the lake and the accommodations are awesome.  This house is fully furnished with all linens, bedding and a full laundry room for your convenience.   The kitchen has everything you need, the sleeping accommodations are very comfortable.  After a full day of fishing you can relax in the living room, light the fireplace for those cool evenings or sit around the table and talk.  The multilevel deck is big enough to relax and enjoy the view, sunbathe and there's room to tie up three boats.  There's also a fish cleaning station, with water, on the deck.  The deck is lighted for night fishing or relaxing.

name: Christopher Smith
text: This Was Our Third Trip And As Always A Great Experience. The Place Is Beautiful In The Spring. Prime Location For Fishing. The Dock Is Easily Accessible From The House and Located Just Off The Channel. I Can't Imagine A Better Location For Fishing. The House Is Nice Clean And Fully Furnished. They Have Everything You Need. Just Bring Food And Clothes. This Is Definitely A Trip I Plan On Making For Years To Come.

name: Jerry Pack
text:
A beautiful lake front home including docking facilities and a large outdoor deck. Plenty of parking and easy to access. Furnishings and appliances all updated. No need to take anything but yourself and enjoy.
My family has vacationed in this home for the last 11 years. We rent during the crappie season, which has always been productive. Docking facilities can accommodate up to 3 boats. Fish cleaning table and 110 volt AC available at the dock.
If you enjoy sight seeing, plenty of parks are nearby. If you enjoy shopping, there is and outlet mall not to far from the cabin in Boaz. Summer fun is at an optimum. Boating, skiing or tubing whatever your delight.
The Swifts  are delightful people always taking care of their customers.
So if you are looking for a fishing camp , summer retreat, or   Holiday gathering facility this home will definitely serve your purpose.
Thank you Michael and Lynn for sharing your awesome lake front home with us over the years.
Jerry Pack
Ohio

name: Mark Strange
text: We have been fishing Weiss Lake for 20 plus years, that says a lot about that lake. We have been staying at Michael's house for several of those years. I don't believe that you will find a nicer, more relaxing place to spend time whether you want to fish or just relax in the Alabama sun. The owners of the house will really make your stay enjoyable. So from the crew from southern Indiana come on down and have a great time on a great lake.

name: Jeffery Bates
text: Great place to stay

name: Alfred Flanagan II
text: Love this place

name: tonya king
text: We were there recently with my dad's side of the family.  Very spacious and lovely home.  All basic cooking needs were there.  My only suggestion for visitors is to bring house shoes.  I don't wear them usually but, with a very good AC and tile floors it is cold getting out of bed in the morning.  A simple request for the owners would be for a laminated sheet of remote instructions (and maybe channel lineup) as we couldn't get back to the cable after the kids got it on netflix.  The last day someone accidently got it back.   A great vacation with excellent owners!

name: Linda Ashby
text: We just spent the most wonderful time there. We were celebrating the union of two very special people. Definitely a very accommodating to large families. Would recommend for any large gathering. I will be back

name: Brendan Lamberth
text:
I would reccomend Porters Mark for all family reunions or large groups, our family of 27 is creating life long memories and enjoying this beautiful home. This 9 bedroom 9 bath house with all the comforts of home, there is no lack of space, we have had family dinners every night and have had everything we needed to prepare our meals.  Book it now as the dates go quick.

Brendan Lamberth

name: Ed Hillyer
text: Nice for family gathering.  Should not be considered luxury but is very nice.  Everything you need.

name: Alice Lang
text: Awesome place to go it was very clean everything was perfect.

name: Candy Moore
text: Fabulous, beautiful and spacious 2 level gulf facing home chocked full of amenities and charm! Major plus is the large private pool and the super great elevator from the ground floor to both living level. Each level is completely furnished with 3 bedrooms, king, queen twin each with a bathroom, and a large open living room kitchen and dining area. Very comfortable. Slightly inconvenient is the location which is about 2 blocks from the beach access but the rental fees are quite reasonable. Only 2 miles from the heart of Gulf Shores with a multitude of restaurants and shopping and entertainment venues to satisfy your dreams of a great beach vacation!

name: Angela Carr
text: Fantastic

name: Victoria Boyer
text: The ice machines are amazing. And the kitchens have tons of counter space. You can even see the ocean from the balcony. Great place for the price you pay.

name: Sergio Bui
text:
(Translated by Google) Nice place, close to the beach, parking, barbecue, terrace, good and clean furniture, kitchen equipped with the necessary. I recommend visiting this place. Go ahead:
I like it

(Original)
Lugar agradable, cerca a la playa, parqueadero, bbq, terraza, buenos y limpios muebles, cocina  dotada de lo necesario. Recomiendo visiten este lugar. Dale:
Me gusta

name: Julie Christofferson
text: We had a wonderful time at The Collonades last month! The location was perfect, condo was spacious and clean, super convenient to stores, shops, restaurants and there isn't a better view of the beach! My granddaughters loved the pool and crab hunting at night. We will be staying again! Thank you!

name: Joey Duckworth
text: We just found our “go to” spot every year!!  We had a great time and thank you to Simpson Properties for promptly answering our questions. I can see why you guys have an excellent reputation in the area!  I will recommend this property to anyone who is looking. Great location with plethora of amenities for families. I honestly can’t think of a negative remark to leave about this experience. Thank you and see you next year!

name: Bonnel Seyler Eggspuehler
text:
My brother’s family And I spent a week at Phoenix West 2 and both condos 2403 and 1609 were very nice and had plenty of sleeping space for his boys families and me! Right off the beach both with beautiful views of the ocean!!
Very nicely furnished and kitchen has all you need. Had a large laundry room with sink and counter with a large shower!!! Each bedroom had a full bath,
We had a great time and will do this again!!
Simpson properties were very accommodating!
We will be back!’

name: Lynn Crosser
text: We loved our vacation to Orange Beach, AL. Our stay in Admirals Quarter Unit 1201 was exceptional! It was the perfect condo for our two-family vacation. The views from our balconies were beautiful! The condo had everything we needed to make our stay a great vacation.  The Simpson Properties Group made it easy to book, check-in and check-out. They were quick to respond when I messaged them. All in all, our stay was fantastic!

name: Kary Royer
text:
Condo was exactly as advertised and there was nothing unexpected.  They sent information when promised and had everything ready when we arrived.  A simple text message here and there made it very manageable to our schedule and without interruption.  Our family enjoyed our stay and the amazing views from the balconies.  We've stayed with other companies before,  but Simpson properties made it even more stress free and less hassle than anywhere else we've stayed. We had no issues,  although if there had been.  I know they would have been responsive to our request.

Sincerely,

The Royers

name: Pat Schellenberg
text:
After coming down to Gulf Shore for a few years we have finally found exactly what we are looking for, the right location, condo and property management group, Simpson Properties Group.
We never knew how wonderful it could be with such a responsive, helpful property management team!  They answered all of our questions immediately and responded immediately to the one issue we had.  The building we were in was having work done and we were pleasantly surprised when they notified us of all work and when it was to be completed prior to building management posting notices!  You never know how important this is until you have had poor property management teams that did not do this and you were caught in very poor situations.  We have and will continue to recommend Simpson Properties Group to everyone who is looking for a vacation location.

resp.text: Pat, thank you for your kind words! We look forward to seeing you again next year!

name: Kayla Brehm
text: I can't say enough good things about our experience! Booking was effortless and the communication with the property manager was impeccable! Forms needed prior to arriving were sent with detailed information. We arrived to our destination before check in, but we got a text from the property manager  nearly 2 hours early providing us a simple code that allowed us access, couldn't have been more pleased! There were parking forms on the counter ready for us to put in our car and there was everything we needed supplied in the condo! Check out was just as easy! Simply clean up after yourself, shut the door behind you and text the property manager that you are out! I would highly recommend this property group for so many reasons!

name: Kaitlynd Nichols
text: Had a great experience with Simpson Property Group. They were very active in letting us know when the condo would be ready and what was expected of us. The condo was very clean and they notified us that the guest bathroom would need fixing before we arrived. It was a smooth experience and would definitely stay with them again!

name: Angie Rodgers
text: This is our second year using them for our vacation rental and we will use them again next year.  We are very happy with their customer service.

name: daniel wiggins
text: Thanks Simpsons properties for putting our only families auto in a flood zone! Btw i know you dont care only about the money but no insurance isnt going to take care of all of it. Feel horrible for the people on that day that had liability and the people you all still screwing over. Lookup Edgewater west 93. Molded rooms in a flood zone!!! Beware!

name: Jo Ann Snyder
text: We really enjoy staying at Crystal Shores West. The Simpson Properties Group is always very professional and responds very quickly. Everything is always so clean and of great quality.

name: Erika Albin
text: We enjoyed staying at our condo! It was the perfect location on the beach in the Gulf Shores!

name: Tim Bradford
text: This was a nice, but old property. It was clean and well taken care of. It just needs an upgrade of counters, showers, beds. The balcony area is nice.

resp.text: You're right this is an older property but thank you for noticing that it is clean and well cared for. The owner is currently in the process of updating so we hope you'll stay with us again!

name: Ryan Griffin
text: Management was responsive. We were able to check in well before check in time. Check ok and out was seamless.  Location is fantastic.

name: Tina Henson
text: Only complaint was having to check in late because of a cleaning issue but I was notified of this in a timely manner.  Overall a great experience.

name: Tiffany Aragona
text: Our stay was amazing! Great booking experience from check-in to check-out. Everything was clean when we arrived and the cleaning staff checked in on us at arrival to make sure everything was satisfactory. The condo had an amazing view of the marina and watching the sunsets every evening was a favorite for us. The kitchen was well appointed with everything we needed and we were pleasantly surprised to find a separate ice maker and beverage cooler in the bar area. My kids love all the pools at the Caribe and I love the lazy river... ice chests are allowed which makes a day at the pool with a large family so easy. We had a blast and I definitely plan on booking this unit again!

name: Daniel LeBreton
text: We very much enjoyed our stay at this property. The condo was spacious, had a very large balcony with a nice view of the beach and Gulf.  The condo suited all our needs and we enjoyed the trip. The location is also great. Close to The Shrimp Basket and only a 10 minute drive from the Gulf Restaurant. Very family friendly. Loved it and would stay again, for sure!

name: Caroline S
text: Absolutely LOVED the condo we stayed in on Orange Beach. Wind Drift unit 710S was awesome. So much more spacious than other condos we’ve stayed in, amazing view on the 7th floor, and we loved the spacious balcony with a high table and sofa. So roomy for my husband and I and 2 teenage girls. Will most definitely book here again. We loved the empty beach next to us as well! Definitely recommend!

name: David Jenkins
text: My sons and I chose to vacation in Orange Beach in June 2020 and, having not visited in several years, reviewed multiple sources for condominium recommendations.  We chose a Simpson Properties condominium at Mariner Pass and could not have been happier with the quality of the property and the service provided.  The condo was convenient to the beach, restaurants, shopping, and other amenities.  Additionally, the property manager was very responsive to the few requests that we made during our visit.  We will definitely consider staying at a Simpson Properties condominium during our next visit.

name: Misty Waide
text: We had a great vacation. Simpson Property was great to work with. They were easy to book with and loved receiving updates via text. They let me know when our condo was ready via text. Our condo was ready to check in 2 hrs earlier than check in time. You will be very pleased booking with the Simpson Properties Group.

name: Cristy King
text: Excellent experience with Simpson Properties!!! The customer service was excellent with easy communication and easy booking. The entire process was made simple which is not always the case with other rental managers. I would recommend using Simpson Properties to everyone - we will definitely use them again. Thanks for a great Mother’s Day vacation!!!

name: Lauren Stewart
text:
I found Simpson Properties Group through a friend on Facebook and I’m so glad I did. They were great to work with from booking to check out! I loved receiving text updates along the way and the info via text for check in. Hunter answered all my questions promptly.
We had a few minor issues at the condo and they handled it quickly and professionally.
Overall I was very satisfied with their company and our stay, would highly recommend and will definitely use them again.

name: Misty Burdan
text:
We thoroughly enjoyed our beach trip to the Phoenix.West II. The condo was beyond amazing.  We had a crazy week and even had a skim board accident and had to have surgery in Foley our week down there.   The Simpson Properties Group (Hunter) was in close contact from booking to check out.  I will not hesitate to book with them again next year. Five stars without a doubt !
Misty Clower (Arkansas)

name: Jennifer Cooley
text: Easy access to everything. We loved the view from the balcony! Our room was everything they said it would be. As a family of 5 we had plenty of room. The check in process was easy. We would definitely stay here again.

name: Laura Parker
text: We loved our Vacation booked through Simpson Properties.  Working with the staff was very easy and they did everything they could to make our stay enjoyable.    They have fabulous properties and the price was great!  I will definitely use them again in the future!  Thanks for a great vacation!

name: Jennifer Fletcher
text: The booking process was great. They were very quick to respond to all of my questions. The check in and check out process was even better. They texted me a code as soon as the condo was available. No huge list of things to do before departing. I will definitely use Simpson Properties again!

name: S Walker
text:
Used the Simpson Group several times and have been completely satisfied each time, never a problem.

They helped us get the best deal we could for the dates we were going to be there and that saved us some money.

Check-in and check-out was a breeze.

Any questions we had were responded to.

I will use them the next time we go to the Gulf Shores or Orange Beach area.

Try the Simpson Property Group, you will like them.

name: Angie Houloose
text: Simpson Properties is an honest company that is doing the best possible thing right now for those unable to travel.  I knew I was going to have to cancel my trip to Gulf Shores, but was reluctant to have to make the call.  Instead, Simpson Properties stepped up and sent an email with revised cancellation guidelines which allowed me to cancel.  I called and left a message that I was cancelling and quickly received an email with notice it had been cancelled and when I should expect to receive the refund.  I commend Simpson Properties for it's timely response and understanding.  When the time is right to travel again, I will be staying at one of their properties in Gulf Shores, AL as I value a company that is proactive, transparent, and cares about their clients.  Thank you.

name: jason stringer
text: Manager was quick to respond via phone call, text, and email. Booking process was quick and easy. Unit was as described and clean. Gulf Towers is a great location. I would have no problem using Simpson Properties for future rentals.

name: Rick & Diane Schulze
text: Very positive experience booking with Simpson Properties. There were quick responses to all my questions and an easy solution to a change I made in my itinerary. They kept me informed of all the updates and closings in the area due to the nationwide health concerns. Even though I had to cancel this trip, we hope to schedule another in the near future. I would not hesitate to book with Simpson Properties again.

name: Nicole Busam
text: Simpson Properties Group was amazing to work with. We booked last minute and they were prompt to respond to all my questions.  Lagoon Tower 1502 was beautiful. Fully stocked with everything a family could need. The location was perfect and the view was amazing. The walk across the street to the private beach area took 3-5 minutes at the most. The condo was clean, modern and spacious. We loved our time spent at the indoor and outdoor pool too. We definitely plan to make this a new tradition and can’t wait to work with this company and stay at this property again in the future! Our favorite family vacation yet!

name: S Dier
text: Beautiful condo that easily accommodated 3 families! Simpson Properties was so great to work with- answered all of my questions super fast and made sure check in was a breeze. We would definitely stay here again- the facility was amazing!

name: T Troutt
text:
Simpson Properties is a “customer first” kind of business! Whether in booking or cancelling, I have always been treated like I am valued and appreciated! They listen first, and then try to accommodate,  instead of coming up with reasons why they can’t help!!
I can highly recommend them, their customer service and promptness is top notch!

name: Sherry Curtis
text: Beautiful condo. Tastefully decorated. Fully stocked. Amazing view of the ocean. Owner responds quickly. Very helpful. Highly recommend this place.

name: Susan Janes
text: Thank you so much Hunter for the wonderful stay at Admirals Quarters .  We had a great long weekend for Spring Break and with the schools closings we ended up staying an additional 4 days.  Hunter was great to work with.  He was super quick in responding and will definitely book with him again when we come this summer.  Thanks Hunter

name: John Richardson
text: Booking at Simpson Properties Group was through Vrbo.  I didn’t realize they charge a fee.  Book directly with Simpsons if you can.  They sent a detailed email with policies, suggestions, recommendations and check-in and out info. Read it all.  Lots of good stuff there.  All communication was through text.  Very easy and painless.  The door code was provided in plenty of time before check in.  All questions were answered quickly and professionally. Overall an excellent experience and we would stay there again (beach was about a 2 minute walk).

name: J F
text: We had a wonderful experience booking our condo through Simpson Properties. They were very quick responding to emails and also through text. Unfortunately we had to cancel due to the Pandemic and they were so understanding and gave us our full refund. We are going to book with them again for next year’s Spring break!

name: robyn lanier
text:
Great condo. Great location.

This was definitely the way to go! I booked online and received a big discount! I received a text letting us know that when the condo was ready as well as the door code. The condo was clean and cool upon our arrival. The ac froze overnight and I texted Simpson Properties when we awoke to a warm condo. I received a reply within minutes and a repairman was on site within an hour or so. Checking out was a breeze- sweep the floors, start the dishwasher, pile the used towels in the bathroom and set the ac to requested temp. That’s it. No keys to return bc of coded lock! Simpson Properties were so easy to work with and quick to respond to any questions I had before and during our stay. I would definitely recommend Simpson for you rentals!

name: Lacee McKellar
text: Absolutely loved this place. The patio was our favorite part - it was huge and overlooked the ocean. Perfect place for a cup of coffee in the morning. Condo was clean and very spacious.

name: Bob Burris
text: The property was everything we expected. The rental process and check-in were easy. Pat Simpson of the management group was readily available and attentive, and responsive to questions about the unit. Highly recommended!  Wonderful visit!

name: john machost
text: We stayed for a week in 105c it was fabulous. It was clean and ready on time. Slept our family of 5 wonderfully. Can’t wait to rent again

name: Cindy Ruchin
text:
From the first phone call to inquire about properties for rent, this was a wonderful experience! Everyone i spoke to was SO knowledgeable and attentive. After booking, i called on and off to ask additional questions, for example, to get the name of a family photographer to take our family photos on  the beach, and they had immediate answers.
I plan to use Simpson properties again for our family vacations!!!!!

name: mary spiegel
text: We were treated very kindly from the point of our reservation. Any questions were answered very quickly with customer service. We will use Simpson Properties in the he future.

name: Mary Clausen
text: I can’t say enough about the professionalism, promptness and flexibility of the people at Simpson Properties. They reached out before others in this industry and relaxed their cancellation policy so that people like my family would not need to worry about losing their investment in their vacation rentals. When all calms down, I will definitely re-book with Simpson Properties!

name: JD Mervis
text: Simpson Properties was a great source for renting a condo at Orange Beach. Hunter was great to work with! I would recommend them for any Orange Beach of Gulf Shorrs rentals!

name: Ashley Lovain
text: I booked a condo at The Palms room 512 and expected it be like any other beach condo. Tacky floral furniture and all. But I got the opposite! My 5 friends and I walked into a huge kitchen with granite countertops and an island. The tile floor was so pretty, the furniture and living room rug was something I’d put into my own home. The dining room table was very nice and had amazing leather chairs. The decor was great and not at all what I expected! (Aka the typical try too hard beach house and overwhelming floral) Checking in was a breeze and I even made the mistake of not remembering the time difference and arrived an hour early. I texted the manager and told them about my mistake and got a response that our room was ready for us to check in early. The communication was impeccable and I was impressed. The master bedroom had a king bed and we still had plenty of room to unload our suitcases. The bathroom in the master had a great walk in shower. The other 2 bedrooms were very spacious and clean. The best part about this entire trip is how SPOTLESS the entire condo was. I expected to have black feet walking around barefoot as that seems to be the usual beach condo thing. I checked my feet daily and was amazed! All the girls including myself kept bragging about how nice and clean our little home away from home was. I’ve told family and friend back home to rent this condo next time they visit the beach! STAY AT THIS CONDO!!!

name: Cookies and Cream
text: We have booked beautiful condos in Orange Beaxh for years. We were so looking forward to a wonderful Spring Break 2020, but good ole Covid19 really had other plans. Simpson Properties went out of their way to help us cancel our reservation, providing many options. We chose a refund and received our funds Immediately. We can’t wait for life to go back to normal so we can call Simpson Properties and head to the beach!

name: DeAnne Friar
text: What a wonderful company to work with! Whenever I had a question about my reservation , there was always someone to directly talk to who had easy answers. I highly recommend Simpson Property  Group!!

name: Mike Creasy (Mike)
text: We have been staying at this property for many years and are completely satisfied with the quality and the amenities there. Simpson Properties is an excellent group of people to work with. Completely satisfied in every way. I would rate them a A+.

name: Heather Keenan
text: Seriously a great experience booking and getting all my questions answered. I will always reach out to Simpson Properties for my travel accommodations. I so appreciate the excellent customer service!

name: Jan Root
text: They made everything very easy and clear.  Check in and out went very smoothly!  Whenever I had a problem or question they were right there and very responsive. I would rent from them again!

name: Doreen Musial
text: We stayed in Condo 1502 in Lagoon Towers in Gulf Shores.  The condo and the property amenities went beyond our expectations.  The view was phenomenal and having access to a private beach was fantastic.

name: Brenda B
text: They make everything easy. Booking was a breeze and every question answered quickly. We plan to book with them in the future. Above and beyond what I expected.

name: Nikki Bajor
text: Easy to work with. Great condo! Clean, excellent location.

name: Olivia Young
text: We enjoyed our stay at Gulf Tower! Love the sliding doors on the balcony for small children!

name: Sherry Owens
text: We enjoyed this condominium and the location. We would recommend this place to anyone.

name: Dylan Thriffiley
text: Wonderful experience with Simpson Properties Group and their unit at Shoalwater. There was some confusion over the WiFi password, which they resolved immediately over the phone.

name: Nicole Hardekopf
text: Great communication and wonderful group to work with! Look forward to booking with them again.

name: Maggie Boyles
text: Simpson Properties is a wonderful agency to work with. They are as friendly, prompt and professional as they come!

name: Richard stoey
text: Hunter was very helpful and responsive. Great service when calling the office.

name: brooke vickers
text: The condo we stayed at wasn’t anything to write home about, but this property group was great to work with. We had to reschedule and they were very responsive to emails. When the internet/cable went down during our stay they sent someone out right away to fix it. I would book through them again.

name: Rickey Meadows
text: Great communication and easy check in for a condo.

name: Kimberly Lambert
text: Took care of us and kept us posted with the circumstances that were changing day to day.

name: Angela Elmore
text: Great place to stay, have stayed last 5 years, staff very friendly!

name: Johnny Scott
text: Its always good! Great service

name: Adam Hosto
text: Great for vacation

name: Larry Waddle
text: We have enjoyed our stay at this beautiful beach house. 1979 was our first trip and missed only 1 year. Feel qualified to mark 5 stars.

name: Christy Davis
text: Cutest little beach house! Love sitting on the deck listening to the waves roll in.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars! We are so glad you had a great time!

name: Terri Lynn
text: We have been staying in Mar Tortuga  for a week in July, for several years.  We have stayed in other beach houses prior to this home, and this has been the best we've found. Mar Tortuga is a great spacious home in a great location. The home is well equipped with everything you may need.  There are even beach chairs that you can bring out to the beach.  The home is far enough away from the high rises to avoid the crowds.   Any minor problems we had were addressed right away, and management continuously messaged us to see if there was anything we need.  We have already booked for our next year's trip!

name: Pam Kirby
text:
We enjoyed our stay at mar tortuga so much. Beautiful home and great location. The new walkway to
the beach was an awesome surprise! Just built before we were scheduled to be there. I have disabilities that make the beach difficult for me to walk on the sand, this walkway made my trip so much more enjoyable. Best family vacation ever, would love to stay here again. Very spacious and inviting the minute you walk in the door! We were blessed with a visit from a sea turtle that came ashore while we were there and layed 151 eggs. Volunteers came out that are experts on handling the eggs and moved them to an area where they won’t be disturbed and roped off the area so as they hatch they can make it safely to shore.

name: Gus Delafuente
text: I get treated very well here. The servers and staff are awesome. The food is delicious.

name: Cody Ramirez
text: We had a fantastic stay w/ greeted courtesy by the one and only Mark! He was quite the talker and a pleasant character. We were in a primetime location with a pool outside of the  patio area and a 40 foot walk to the beach. We had a wonderful unit and it was very spacious and relaxing for 6 people. When we get the chance we'll be returning!

name: Angie Walters
text: Aqua Vacations was amazing to work with!  Last summer our rental was bumped first due to Covid and then cancelled due to Hurricane Sally.  Dana was responsive and flexible and great to work with through it all.  We booked again for this summer and it was worth the wait!  Aqua did a great job communicating with us.  Check in and out was super easy.  We will definitely book again!

resp.text: Thank you so much Angie for the great Google review! I enjoyed working with you and helping you and your family in having an amazing vacation with us!

name: Brian Speerly
text:
We stayed at the Jubilee Landing for a long weekend getaway before school started. Great place, friendly people, condo was clean and well stocked. Beautiful view of the bay on one side and the beach on the other. We are considering purchasing property in the area now.
Definitely would recommend the jubilee and Aqua Vacations.

resp.text: Thank you so much Brian for the amazing comments and review! I enjoyed hosting you and your family at Jubilee Landing in Orange Beach! Let me know when your ready to look for a property to purchase, we are a full real estate firm!

name: Kara Hastings
text: Aqua Vacations was super easy to work with for our family vacation to Gulf Shores. We had great communication leading up to our trip. Anytime they emailed important information they also called me to make sure I saw it. They also called before running my credit card for the final payment, which was a great courtesy. Check in was seamless, and a packet of important information was waiting for us on the kitchen counter when we arrived.

resp.text: Thank you so much Kara for you taking the time to give us a 5-star review on Google! We truly enjoyed hosting you and your family in Gulf Shores and look forward to see you again next year!

name: Jeff Venning
text: This house was fantastic! Just the right size for our family (4 adults and 2 kids) and you cannot beat the location! Out of the hustle and bustle of Gulf Shores proper but still close enough to run into “town” if you need to. Also super close to both the pool and the beach. Very clean. We would definitely stay again!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jeff! We so enjoyed hosting you and your family at Sunset Sands! We look forward to hosting you again!!

name: Hanna Telano
text: Booking and checkin were very easy. Each time I emailed or called with a question they were quick to respond. The condo was very nice and updated. It had everything we needed. The location was very good also.

resp.text: Thank you so much Hanna for taking the time to give us a Google review! We truly enjoyed hosting you and we look forward to hosting you next year!

name: Antoine McKinnie
text: Had an incredible stay with this company at their San Carlos Condo. Great facility clean with nice appliances and the master bathroom was awesome. Will definitely be staying again

name: P S
text:
The rental was homey and adequate. Arrived Monday and immediately reported broken toilet seat, received a message that maintenance had been scheduled for Tuesday. No show no call. Wednesday about noon I made the same request along with a now chirping smoke alarm and non working tv remote. Repairs made Wednesday afternoon.
We even asked for another nights stay, which Dana accommodated.
All these above points are trivial compared to what came next.... we lost all power in the unit at 3:10 and I reported it to Dana immediately at 3:17 before the office closed.
3:17 PM Dana: "OK thank you let me see if I can find out what's going on. Me: Thanks
4:27 PM Me: what's the diagnosis? Dana: an outage somewhere
7:20 PM Me: So we have been gone for 4 hours and still no power. We need an update or a plan please.
Crickets, crickets, more crickets. Are you kidding me?!?!
I called the office. Office is closed of course. I left a voice mail for Dana, it wasn't pleasant since I was livid at this point. I even had the County Electric service calling me back about it. They were very kind. The security guards and a condo owner helped resolve the issue. There was no "outage somewhere", a blatant lie from Dana. ....and we never heard anything back from Dana, nothing!  We will never consider this place again, due to the poor Customer Service.

I find it interesting that Dana has poor reviews on Google but none on the Aqua-Vacations site itself. But we know she has the option to take those down. (I did leave a review there but can't find it) I will also be reporting this to VRBO. The property owners have been apprised as well.

resp.text: thank you Patricia for the slander. We addressed your issue with the broken toilet seat lid and also the replaced the battery in the smoke alarm. COASTLINE MANAGEMENT IS THE COMPANY THAT HANDLES THE EXTERIOR OF LAGOON RUN NOT AQUA VACATIONS. YOUR POWER OUTAGE WAS REPORTED DIRECTLY TO LAGOON RUN. THEY NOT AQUA CALLED AN OWNER THAT LIVES THERE ABOUT THIS ISSUE. I CAN ONLY REPORT BACK TO A GUEST WHEN WE RECEIVE ANY INFORMATION WHICH WE DID NOT. I DO NOT LIE PATRICIA. I SAID THAT IT COULD POSSIBLY BE A POWER OUTAGE WHICH GULF SHORES EXPERIENCED THE WEEK BEFORE YOU ARRIVED THAT EFFECTED THAT AREA OF WEST BEACH. REPORT ME TO VRBO FOR A DAMN ISSUE THAT IS OUT OF OUR CONTROL. YOU MAY ALSO REPORT COASTLINE MANAGEMENT WHILE YOUR AT IT, BE MY GUEST.

name: Kayla Klabunde
text: We stayed in LA 2 this past weekend. The house was beautiful and in a great area. We were within walking distance of several good things; however, our overall customer experience was not very pleasing. We ran out of toilet paper and paper towels after a day and a half of being there, and they did not have any replacements anywhere in the house. As we started to clean up the last day, we also did not have any trash bags to replace the full one in the trash can. I tried calling the office; no answer. I sent an email to one of the employees; no response. Very unprofessional and unsatisfactory in that area. For the price we paid for the house, we should not have had to provide our own trash bags, paper towels, and toilet paper. There should have been replacements under the sinks or in the cabinets.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Kayla. It's obvious that you didn't read, you just signed and dated our Guest Rental Agreement which states that we start you off with a starter kit. Starter kit includes: 1 toilet paper per bathroom, 2 trash bags, 1 paper towel roll, shampoo, conditioner and body soap.  Anything beyond that is the guest responsibility. I did receive your email but you sent it on Sunday, again if you read the agreement and the rest of your information, you would have known that. We are a professional management company and we answer all calls and emails during business hours. So thank you for the 3 star review. Dana Rose-Owner and Broker of Aqua Vacation.

name: Bonnie Price
text: A nightmare to say the very least! The property managers are as professional as the dog I buried years ago! I went to book a property, I received an email telling me the property was already booked. So I found something else. Then after a few days I looked at my bank statement I noticed where they had taken a deposit. I sent them an email telling that I was told property was already booked so to refund my money. No response to that email. Then on the day i was driving down I get a phone call asking me if I was coming. I of course said yes as I assumed the call was from the place I ended up renting. She said well we havent taken the rest of your payment. So I said again yes we are on our way now. Then I get to the condo I rented and I said something about the phone call. They informed me it wasnt them. Went back to my phone, tracked back the number and it was Aqua Vacation Rentals. I immediately called them. Long story shoet they eefused to return my 933.00 so, I guess we will be in small claims court in the state of Tn. As that is the state where supposed transaction took place. I tried repeatedly to reach a fair resolution but it is obvious all they care about is money. I will never use them again and I will post negative review on every possible place I can!

resp.text: Bonnie Price,  you never cancelled this reservation. I called you several times and sent you many emails about your reservation with us. You never replied to me until you were here and said you had booked another property. That does not make that my issue. Why didn't you call me back on the several attempts. Why would you not cancel a reservation instead of making 2 reservation, that makes no sense. We have an easy cancellation policy WHICH YOU DID NOT ABIDE BY. You stated that our "friend" called asking about the same dates and the same condo was available, which of course it wasn't because you had it booked.

name: Mary Ann Savage Fletcher
text:
The location is fantastic, the beach is clean, the house is a 3 story duplex with each side having 7 bedrooms.  We had five retired couples staying on the east side of the duplex.   We handled all the steps with no problems, but this rental would not be good for someone in a wheelchair or walker.  3 bedrooms are large king suites with private bathrooms; 1 king room shares a bathroom; 1 bedroom has two (2) double beds; and 2 bedrooms have a double bed with overhead bunk bed.

The pool is nice and was clean.  If the pool is used with the new heater, there is another charge.  There are no chairs to take to the beach or beach "stuff", but they do have a local rental agency that is accommodating, but an added expense.  I rented 10 beach lounge chairs and 5 umbrellas for 2 days for $222.

Twenty young professionals rented the other side of the duplex, as there was a music festival in town.   We heard them, mainly on the main level through the locked adjoining door, but they were really nice and friendly, so it didn't bother us.

I would have given the Endurance II 5 stars, except that some towel bars were broken, a couple of lights were out, the pots and pans were merely adequate, a burner on the stove needed maintenance, the furniture in the main sitting area was quite dated and limited for the number of bedrooms, and the dining table needed a few more chairs.  There is a small coffee pot, but I brought my Keurig to use, as there were 10 of us.  Do know that there is very minimal supplies in the house, so renters will need to go to the store to buy what they need or bring it from home.

Even with the minimal minor problems, we would happily rent the house again.  The house is SO CLOSE to the beach, and it is really not crowded, which was the reason we wanted to rent this house in the first place.  I had no problems contacting the manager, who remained friendly and courteous.

name: Patrick Krill
text: Endurance house double booked the house and kicked out me and my family. This was terrible as my kids were really beginning to settle in. There rational for evicting my family was complete hearsay and fake news. The “manager” Libby was unprofessional, rude, and cackled at my children as she was making us leave.

name: Dawn Teeters
text:
I’m confused by these reviews because this place has not been built yet. It’s completely under construction. In fact I’m watching it be built right now.
Edit: thank you for your reply. Although helpful it’s still confusing for people who search on Google maps. I clicked on the pin right next to where we are staying on the map to find out more info about the new build. It led me to reviews of other “lazy river beachside” locations & not this one in particular. Maybe this is a Google issue. I would love it if it led me to info on sales for the new condo instead of reviews for other locations. But thank you so much for resolving the mystery.

resp.text:
Hi Dawn,
That is because our business “Lazy River on the Beach” is advertising multiple luxury beachfront condos with lazy rivers, 2 of which are currently under construction and will be the only beachfront property in Orange Beach with 2 lazy rivers.  We strive for great reviews by providing excellent communication and clean, spacious, beautiful beach vacation condos.  The 2 bedroom will open in 2022. And the 3 bedroom will open in 2023. Most of the reviews are from the lazy river property we have been renting to beach goers at Phoenix West II since 2014. My phone number is posted, and I’d be happy to answer any questions you have to more appropriately review our rental business. Thank you and we’d love to have you as a guest in the future.
Kathy

name: Abby Kohl
text: This condo was Lovely! Beautifully decorated & one of the best stocked condos I have stayed in. We were there on Spring Break with our 2 daughters & their friends. Plenty of room & great location in Orange Beach! Kathy was such a pleasure to rent from! Very attentive to detail. I texted her several times with questions & she responded very quick! We would definitely rent from her again! Thanks Kathy for sharing your beautiful condo with us!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the feedback and the communication throughout the planning and during your vacation to Orange Beach! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and that you all were impressed with our condo!

text: Great place to stay! We had an awesome time. The condo is very spacious and beautiful. There is something for everyone. We loved the lazy river. We met a lot of nice people while staying here. Restaurants and shopping are very close. We would recommend staying here. We plan on coming back again.

resp.text: Thank you Becky for the review! And thank you for choosing our vacation condo for your memorable vacation.  We love to hear what our guests enjoy.  The lazy river right on the beach is always a hit from grandparents to grandchildren and everyone in between. The spacious accommodations with 4 bathrooms, and ,of course, the local food choices.  We look forward to having your group return!

The plentiful restaurants, shopping, attractions, and of course the white sand beaches bring many visitors to our area.  This property tops off a fabulous vacation destination being one of the most beautiful and newest accommodations on Orange Beach!

Hi Carlos
Thanks for the updated photos!! Exciting progress going on with this newest Gulf Front  property that will have 2 lazy rivers when completed!  We will be starting to take reservations for our 3rd floor 2 bedroom 3 bath condo at the 1st tower in a few shorts months.

Can’t wait!
Kathy

name: Paul Cuevas
text: The house was really nice and in a good area. If you go East it gets a little congested with traffic but there’s grocery stores and anything else you may need.  West takes you to another touristy area and gives you access to the toll bridge so you’re able to move around easily if you want.  The beach is really close, and the pool area was nice. No issues with any neighbors, honestly we couldn’t hear anyone. The house provided a lot of essentials, they specify in emails.  Only negative was that the elevator did not work nor could the maintenance man get it operating.  I would book with them again though.

resp.text: Thanks Paul! So happy you all loved my home! I don't see your reservation in your name so I am not sure when you all were there but generally the elevator works great, as long as the interlock doors are closed on all levels and/or kids (or others) haven't tripped it by treating it as a toy to run around--you'd be surprised! Both those though usually any of the mgt co maintenance folks should know, but even when not, we generally can get the elevator guys out there within a business day. Definitely reach out directly to me if it goes sideways on a future stay at beachtrip@bamabeachhouses.com. Glad you all had a great time and look forward to the return trip! Rick

resp.text: Thanks Courtney! Glad you like my family's home! If you need anything, or want to book directly with the owners, ping me at 2517324020, cs@bamabeachhouses.com. Happy to assist! Take care, Rick

text: We rented a cottage for a week in Fort Morgan, AL. The cottage was very nice and clean. The location was awesome! Public beach 2 blocks from the cottage. The people at Luna Beach Properties were amazing and very friendly!  We will definitely rent from them again!

text: Went in to make a payment. Greeted very pleasantly. Did my transaction and found out about an additional problem that was handled without fanfare. Assured that they had my best interest at heart and would take care of my business with finesse.

name: Mike McEunn
text: Beware of booking this place unless you don’t care about customer service and professional staff!  Long rant, but the bottom portion is where the issue starts.  We booked this place on 11/7/20 and on 11/20/20 I received a phone call stating that the elevator was malfunctioning and the part would not be in until after my stay.  I was told they would be refunding my money and they apologized for the inconvenience.  My stay was supposed to start on 11/25 so this was fairly inconvenient as we had numerous people in my group booked at other locations nearby.  I received a follow on call a few minutes later stating that I bought insurance and they could not refund me and that I had to go through the insurance for the refund.  After receiving an email, I called them back and questioned that since they cancelled my trip, was I going to be entitled a refund on my insurance money as well.  Terri said “yes.”  The insurance refused my claim as it did not meet their criteria so I contacted Terri again at Luna Beach and explained the situation.  They quickly executed a partial refund (all the money minus the insurance).  This is where the customer service and professionalism goes down the drain.  I spoke with Terri that night and questioned why I didn’t receive the money for the insurance I paid.  She said that her company is not “allowed” to issue a refund on insurance and I was “lucky Luna Beach Properties issued any type of refund because they are not obligated to.”  She stated it was my decision to leave the property because I didn’t ask if I could still stay there with no working elevator.  She did not give me an option to stay there as she said she was going to cancel my stay and that I would have to find another place.  I would of gladly stayed at this location and took the stairs due to having to find a place away from others that already had bookings in the area.  All of this was a heated conversation with the most disrespectful and unprofessional person I have dealt with in a long time.  I asked for her boss’ contact and she said I could call her the next day and she would see if her boss was available to speak with me.  I didn’t call back because obviously if she treated me like this, she has done it numerous times (look at other negative comments) and it must be a culture of this organization.

name: Sydny Hardy
text: We rented and stayed 3 days. All 3 of us caught bed bugs from the Rockery 111 and the property manager did nothing to compensate! My husband and I had to get 2 shots each, missed a entire week of work.....our body was covered!!!! It was worse than chicken pox!!!!! The house was obviously infested, the rash covered our face, neck, hands and arms, moved to the legs after. Prednisone and 2 rounds of shots and cream after creams later we are beginning to see improvement.

name: Tory Thevenot
text: TERRIBLE! I will NEVER book thru then again! We booked 10 rooms art the same location.  When there was issues at the location they were not at all concerned about them and laughed then off.  After asking 3 times for the manager/ owners information I finally got a call from Chris.  That was a WASTE. He was no help and so not professional.  Terrible customer service.

text: Luna Beach Properties were absolutely wonderful!! They took such good care of us. Would recommend them all day long!

3 night stay in a house at The Rookery III

name: Robby Brannum
text: I will say the condo was great, but luna beach's management was absolutely horrid. From booking to trying to fix maintenance issues, we were treated rudely. We were threatened with eviction before we even arrived, we had no working wifi for the first day and a half, and we actually had to have one of our group leave due to the fact that we couldn't get internet in order to do some work. When asking to speak to the manager at the office, we were ignored and told they would notify him. The boss's behavior (Chris) when discussing our issues was less than ideal. He was cussing while we tried to have a civil discussion. Dealing with this property manager was a real drain on our spring vacation. Will not be renting with them ever again.

name: Heather Bailey
text: The owner, Chris, is wonderful & runs a great company.

name: Donna r Morgan
text: Stayed last August it was great we had a great time

name: Maya Tradon
text: Great customer service!

name: Patrizia Leist
text: Amazing customer service!!!

name: Kaye C
text: Great location. How was ok. A few odds and ends need to be repaired, but overall it was perfect for what we were looking for in a getaway.

name: tray russell
text:
Probably the worst rental I’ve ever wasted money on. This home looks much worse in person than in the pics. The pics are very misleading. Downstairs the baseboards are completely rotted out and you can smell the mold. The A/C and heat are completely dis functional. The middle floor and bottom floor work off the same unit and temperature control so when the temperature is 70 degrees on the middle floor the bottom floor is 62 degrees. It’s impossible to make everyone satisfied with this type of set up. Each floor needs its own unit.
We bought steaks to cookout and the propane tank was completely empty. There’s no toilet paper in the house so this should’ve been disclosed to us. Out of all the homes on this road this one is in the worst condition.

name: Allen Neuschwander
text:
On the outside the house looks amazing. On the inside, it is in complete disrepair. Nothing works as it should, and what does work needs serious attention. From the broken tile to the non working double oven (since 2007), horrific paint, light fixtures not working (plus regular bulbs in the can lights), horrible furniture, squeaky beds (every one of them), broken TV, and mold growing in the garage from a leaky shower above. While we were there the upstairs bathroom was leaking (severely) into the middle of the downstairs living room. The owner was notified the week prior about the leak but didn't care to address the problem, but instructed us to "just put a bucket under it, it will be fine".

The house looks like a fraternity house on the inside. As much as we paid, we deserved more effort owners instead of a deceiving description.

name: Paula Riddle Wright
text:
Absolutely love staying at Sugar Beach Condos we always rent from Don Taylor
We’ve been coming for yeas well at least 24 years wouldn’t stay no place friendly
courtesy we love staying Wish I could retire there someday soon Don’t Forget to try
Lartigues acroos the road they’re food is #delicious

name: Karen S
text: We have been very happy with anchor vacations.  The girls in the office are always helpful and friendly.  We had a couple issues of things that needed fixing.  It was dealt with quickly.

name: StanCulpepper
text: Great place to stay on the beach . Very clean place for the family

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Hope you return for another visit next year:)

name: Emily Bell
text: The staff at Anchor is FABULOUS! They went above and beyond for me when my reservations with Meyer Realty was cancelled last minute. Then, my husband had unexpected surgery just 4 days before our trip, and they were MORE than accommodating to our situation. I cannot recommend them enough and will definitely be staying with them again!

resp.text:
Emily,
We are happy to hear that our staff members took priority in helping you find alternate accommodations. Hope your husband is recovering and doing well. We look forward to hearing from you when you are ready to book your next vacation:)

Thank you so much for the review!
Anchor Vacations

name: Mary Mathis
text: I just read a review done years ago by another Google user.  I had to add here that I have been using Anchor for 3 years now and I have been amazed at the quick response one gets to any inquiry by email or phone.  Not only was I pleased with the home we stayed in, all the family loved it too.  I found each home, we have used in the last few years to be exactly as pictured, clean, up-to-date furnishings and would recommend highly to any looking for a sweet, quiet stay at the beach.  These are good people and they work to make your stay really comfortable.  I have been really REALLY pleased each year!

resp.text:
Mary,

I would like to take a moment to thank you for your very kind review. I am so happy to hear how pleased you have been with each rental you have stayed in. We enjoy working with you and look forward to your next visit!

Sincerely,
The Anchor Vacations Team

name: Jonathon Kerr
text: They just cancelled my reservation, now with 8 weeks until my reservation. They tryed to help by offering a more expensive play to stay. And they really could have tried by offering some type of discount for my troubles. I would look elsewhere before renting through anchor vacations!

resp.text:
Jonathon,

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. Unfortunately, this is out of our control as this particular unit sold. The Owner will be renting later in the year but is having the unit completely remodeling!

name: Dawn Luther
text: We stayed a couple of weeks ago and the view and condo was great! Air worked perfect (saw some older reviews). And the updates were absolutely beautiful! Old pics online do not do it justice! Beware of the awful answering service if after hours but the place is really nice! Will stay again.

resp.text:
Dawn,

We are so glad to hear you enjoyed the condo and your stay. We will be sure to address issues with the answering service as well. Thanks for the review and we hope you return for a visit soon!

name: Rick Lawson
text: Could not have found a more pleasant vacation home.  Clean and comfortable with  a cordial expression throughout.  We were impressed with the detail furnished by the owner, such as extra light bulbs, pillows, and comforters.  Obviously, professionally decorated with a beachy feel and welcoming ambiance, we took pictures to consider changes back home.  Though we didn't cook much, the kitchen was fully furnished right down to the appropriate stemware.  Traveling almost 200 days a year, we have no reservations about recommending this condo and look forward to a return visit in the winter.

resp.text:
Mr. Lawson,

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and your accommodations. We look forward to working with you again!

name: Allie Caldwell
text: We stayed in a condo located in Orange Beach through this company, and I would not recommend. The dishes were not clean upon arrival. The air conditioning was entirely too loud, to the point it startled you when it would come on. The microwave also sounded like it was going to blow up. The Anchor Vacations workers were not helpful either. This was not worth almost a thousand dollars, at all.

resp.text: We sincerely apologize for the issues. Please note that any housekeeping issues can be addressed if reported to us. We will notify maintenance to check the microwave so we can get that replaced. As for the ac, it was replaced last year so the unit is new. We did have a similar complaint so we did send an ac tech to check the issue. There were no issues reported by the ac tech. We do sincerely apologize and appreciate your review.

name: Melly Ann
text: Stayed here a year ago. They were perfect! Addressed any issues we had and were a great company to use! Will be using them again!

name: Dustin C
text: Great rental and very nice people.  Took advantage of all additional amenities.  I will rent from again in the future.

name: Susan Moorefield
text:
when we first arrived at our home we noticed trash and such underneath the house apparently vagabonds were making good use of this place apparently while the house wasnt being checked on.
When contacting the office to alert them of the situation we were told a maintenance person would be there to take care of all the debris, that was not the case. We waited for hours for them to clean and we ended up doing it our selves. Another interesting piece is the neighbors on both sides of us came to us to warn us that vagabonds had indeed been camping out there underneath and showering, we were also told that Anchor vacations was alerted to this. According to Anchor of course they say they were not alerted, but Im inclined to believe the neighbors afterall there was trash and showering items stating apparently someone was utilizing said underneath.
When I called to express how I felt about this, I was only given a $40.00 cleaning refund.
So this goes without saying this is my first and last time booking with Anchor.  My feeling is had they checked on this place before we got there they would of seen the mess an hurried an cleaned it up, it states to me that they really dont care about the properties. I would venture to say that today unless someone else alerts them that vagabonds our indeed camping out there they are not the wiser. We felt very unsafe at the Happy Clam.

name: Google Account
text: The lady who handles booking is very rude! We were trying to book for an available rental, then when we called she said that she couldnt accommodate are needs. But, she told us through several emails that she would be able too...We never had this issue with other property managements.We will never use them or refer this management to anyone...We are frequent renters too!!They need to fire the booking agent for lack of knowledge!

name: Sierrah Puckett
text: We stayed here in room 409 this past weekend from May 25th-May 28th.  Overall I cant say a whole lot about the accommodations. When we booked the room, being as it is to sleep up to 6/7 people, we were told that two parking spots came along with the booking. When we got there to check in, we found out that we had to pay additional fees for any vehicles. Not a single one was included in the booking cost. Not even 24 hours in we had problems with the room keys not wanting to let us in. Some times it would blink red, sometimes it didnt register at all. We had to go to the office 4/5 times to fix the issue. Finally they replaced the batteries in the main lock. The office staff was rude, pissy, and didnt have much interested in helping their guest. Lastly, upon leaving, we did the courteous thing by sweeping majority of the tracked in sand up,  wiped down counters, made sure all dishes had been ran and washed, and so forth. Left, turned out keys in. And headed home. Today May 31st we are charged $110!! after speaking with someone at anchor, who didnt know why, she contacted the condo then gave us a call. These people are trying to say that they have pictures of ashes and cigarettes butts all over the room, and claiming they had to strip everything down due to the smell of smoke. Mind you we have small children in this room under the age of 5!!!!! Not once was a cigarette brought into that room and we are extremely disappointed with the way this is going. Might I add we were also charged another $40 for them to wash the comforter! The cleaning policy clearly says fresh linens are included and any additional cleaning will be extra. There was not reason to be charged extra! We will be doing everything in our power to have our bank reverse the charges as they are FAULTY!!! We will not be booking again, and would never recommend the condo to anyone!!!!

resp.text:
Sierrah,

We sincerely apologize about the issues you faced with the key cards to the condo and the onsite office staff. We will be sure to talk to them about how they speak/deal with guests directly. We do appreciate you taking the time to clean up upon departure. However, we were notified by housekeeping and given pictures with proof of ashes in the bedroom. Therefore, we did charge for the smoke elimination and to have the comforter washed as we had a guest due in the very next day. Upon your request, we did email these photos to you immediately. Please know housekeeping staff is required to take photos for proof if any additional charges are going to be charged towards the guest. As for the parking, it does state online in the description that the complex allows up to 2 vehicles except for during holidays and big events then it is limited to one. Parking is to be purchased onsite at the main office. We apologize for the confusion.

name: Seth McGuinness
text:
We rented a house from them that had the A/C unit out and the house was 93 degrees inside. The house also had many issues that were conveniently left out of the pictures - bathtubs had mildew and refrigerator was stained and dented. They sent an A/C repairman to fix it and he said the A/C was shot, but he patched it temporarily.

We had a 3 mo. with us, that we were concerned about and the heat index was 110 all week we were there. They ultimately moved us to a new house, of there choosing, but attempted to force us to move back upon our objection that we did not feel the house was safe for us to stay in because of the A/C and the extreme heat and the danger it could pose to our daughter if it went out as the A/C man said it could. Also, we were not excited to be dealing with the situation throughout our entire vacation.

I mentioned that they moved us, but it was to a more expensive house, which they chose. We just asked to be moved. They attempted to force us to move, or pay the additional price. We said that was not what we were comfortable with and that we'd use our trip insurance or ask for a refund. Their response was to show us the rental agreement that said A/C is not guaranteed and would not be eligible for a refund or insurance.

The employees who we talked to always said it was not their decision but someone named "Donna". We never were able to talk to Donna, even though they said she was the owner. We requested several times and were told she would call us, but the employees would call us back.

They were borderline harassing us about this and ultimately, quit harassing us when they charged my card for an additional balance I did not authorize. It was an absolute mess of a trip because of them and I do not recommend them at all.

resp.text:
Mr. MCGuinness,

I do apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay. Once we were notified of the issue with the A/C, our employees sent out the A/C repairman to resolve the issue. As a courtesy, you were moved to a gulf front unit for two nights until we were sure the repairs to the A/C were complete, with the understanding that you would be moved back to the unit you rented. Once the issue was resolved, you were asked to move back to the property rented or pay for the gulf front unit. You chose to stay in the gulf front property which then resulted in the additional charge to your credit card.

name: Ron DeYoung
text: Good  place do deal with

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!

name: Scott Manuwai
text: Epic view with a "killer' cabin/refuge.  Truly special!

name: Lee Stevenson
text:
Exceeded all our expectations.
Most comfortable bed ever in a cabin.
Cottage is just the right size with the right amenities.
We won't wait to return next year, we'll try to get back this year.
You get a full size bar of soap!
Located next to a park I thought it might get loud and crowded, that was not the case, very quiet and comfortable.
Views are incredible and plentiful.
Mentone was a sleepy town during our stay during the week and that's what we wanted.
We walked in the door to pleasant music playing and the cottage was cool and comfortable.

name: Joe Miller
text: Romantic cottage with artisan decor and luxury bedding.  Highly recommended!

name: Ken Hays
text: Great place to stay if you want to relax and unwind. Great for a couple. Sits right on the brow. Screened in back porch is awesome to sit and take in the views. Sunsets are amazing. Cottage is well furnished and very comfortable. Owners are great to work with.  This is our 6th time to stay here and we will be back. Cannot say enough about this cottage as a great place to get away from it all. Hot tub is great too

name: Kitty Hays
text: Exquisite cottage with breathtaking view.

name: Chris Collins
text: Great. It was beautiful! Great view. Old house was decorated beautifully.The hot tub never really warmed up. But we are definitely coming back.

name: Randell Hill
text: Stayed this week in Cottage 2. Awesome place for our get away. Will definitely book again.

name: Mark Ceraso
text: Very quiet and serene. Beautiful valley view and grounds. Close to center of Mentone

name: Porkchopranch
text: I may have drove by it but dont have a clue as to where it is at

name: Sharon Sides
text: Wonderful, relaxing charming, reasonable price, breathtaking views!

name: Melanie Gingerich
text: Adorable, tastefully decorated, clean, great location

name: Bryant Gilmer
text: LG

name: Russ G
text: This is a little piece of paradise. Right across the street from the beach. Great view of the lagoon, and just minutes away from great restaurants and activities.

name: Alesia Holt
text: Great customer service!  Every time I contacted them I heard back right away! Very professional and they stand behind their word. I would definitely book with them again

name: Jenny Ho
text: I booked with Alabama Getaway via Airbnb and we did have a few complications at first, but in the end they really showed that they care about their customers. Elizabeth did a great job at rectifying the issues we were having. She truly went above and beyond to ensure that I had a great experience with them. Will be booking with them again in the near future. Highly recommend

name: Roger Brawner
text: Wonderful accomodations.professional company

name: LILLIAN TURNER
text:
I wish I could give a higher rating! We worked with Elizabeth and Kendall and were so pleased with the level of service and care they exhibited! They took our satisfaction personally and went above and beyond to make sure everything during our stay was perfect. Communication via text and phone was quick and seamless. I love the 24/7 availability!
We stayed at Seawind condos and the accommodations were amazing. Our unit was 3BR/2BA and easily housed our group of 6 with room to spare. Everything was white-glove clean, the kitchen was well-stocked, the pool and private beach areas were gorgeous, and chick-in/check-out was a breeze. We had difficulty when we were trying to book our rental, but Elizabeth and Kendall both stepped in to be sure all details worked out perfectly.
We will definitely use this company every time we travel to the area! Thank you so much for the perfect getaway! It was just what we needed!

name: Carina Cosby
text: Alabama Getaway Vacation Rental is an amazing company to work with!  Answered the few questions I had concerning my upcoming trip quickly and cordially.   Due to the pandemic this spring, I did have to cancel our spring break trip, unfortunately.  Alabama Getaway was amazing in giving a full refund, even though it was past the cancellation cutoff date.  Can’t wait to rebook once the world gets back to normal!!  Can’t thank them enough for being so wonderful!!

name: Karen Yarbrough
text: Because of the covid-19 of course we had to cancel our vacation plans. Alabama Getaway was so very nice and helpful even with the all the cancellations they were handling. They gave me a time that my money would be refunded 100% and it was. I have used them many times to book travel and always satisfied.

name: Janis Coggins
text: Due to the virus we had to cancel. The customer service was perfect. No issues no delay, great communication.  When this passes we will definitely book with you again.

name: Paul Mitchell
text: Our location was great and we liked our condo very much (except for the furnace in the unit). However, the staff at Alabama Vacations was not very responsive.  We didn’t receive our parking pass until the third day we were there. We also didn’t get the code for the gate to the swimming pool for several days. This was after texting several times and speaking to someone on the phone.  Also, at the end of our stay, I asked for information about the cost of the condo for the next year and other properties that we might consider. Again, after several text messages and a voicemail, no one provided any information. I did get a couple responses saying someone would get back with me, but they didn’t.  On a better note, they did send someone over the next day when we had a problem with the heat.

name: Tracey Young
text: Loved the place and service.

name: Olivia Gonzalez
text: very helpful and nice

name: Jackson Hawley
text: We LOVED our time in this property (Sunrise Village unit 110) in Gulf Shores! Just literally steps away from the sand and toes in the water. Our unit was ready to check in before our arrival time! We will never stay anywhere else while in Gulf Shores.

name: Dusti Baldridge
text:
We have had one of the condos reserved for over a year it was recently bought by this company. We were told they would
Honor our reservation, when we called to Secure it we were then told it is now 3700 and not the price we paid over a year ago. They changed the amount of people allowed to stay which is less then what we have and the guy was very rude. Mind you this was done 25 days before we are to be leaving for vacation. There is nothing available now for anywhere close to what we paid and they had no try to help resolve except pay the price that is way more then what we had it booked and paid for it.This is horrible business to basically throw someone’s whole vacation out the window 25 days before they are to leave and not try to honor or work with the customer.

resp.text: Please disregard this review, as this is not a guest or a renter of ours.  We do not buy condos, nor do we own any unit referenced.  The condo was purchased by an individual and anyone can rent it. The buyer instructed us to rent it at market rates and not permit substantial overloading, which is their right and we cannot tell the owner what to do.  This person called and berated our employee who was following the new owner's instructions.

name: Kim Cole
text: My family and I stayed in Shoalwater 1106 in July 2020.  The check-in & out process was easy, and the staff was always friendly.  The condo was roomy and well stocked. We really enjoyed the 3 bathrooms and the roominess of the condo.  We are looking forward to staying there again this year!

name: Nikki Costelloe
text:
Great location. Balcony is over the Holiday Inn pool so there is noise from that. However, likely always over a pool when on the beach. The only difference with the Holiday Inn pool is they alway have water splaying into the pool so there is always a spray noise. This is very minor but could be an annoyance by some.
Very well stocked!! Always had the dish or utensil we needed. Beautiful view with the windows on both the back and side! Would stay here again.

name: Joe Doyle
text:
Broken washer, dirty water, cockroaches, and terrible customer service.

I'll start by saying Gulfsands Rentals offered to compensate me $30 for my trouble, but in my mind is totally unacceptable for the situation. I requested 1 night be reimbursed out of the 7 that we stayed - then after two more emails they never responded.  And apparently this is regarded as a threat by them.

We arrived and the first thing we noticed is the washer door is open and about 1 foot full of filthy dark brown water. We called and got somebody trying to fix it but was unsuccessful. Repair man was great but stated they have been unable to fix washer over past weeks. I left to go to the beach and let him do his work. After 2 days of not hearing anything back I had to call office and ask about what they were going to do about the water. Somebody came to drain it. After a couple more days of not hearing about repair status I asked and they said it's unfixable.

The troublesome part about the washer is they knew it was having issues for weeks and never notified us we would be unable to do laundry. A family of 4 on a beach vacation needs this. I would have found another option. The attitude was consistently like we were a burden and it's no big deal to not have a washer. I'm on vacation and last thing I want to do is spend hours at the laundromat - but apparently that's only worth $30 of trouble.

Additionally there was never anything in the ad about the washer being broken.  Only after my numerous complaints did Gulfsands update their descriptions to say washer did not work.  If you look at other reviews online apparently this has been an issue for months.

Also we found two huge dead cockroaches each about 2.5 inches long. I guess this was the result of the exterminators that arrived unannounced to apply poison in our condo. Between the washer and the exterminator we had 3 visits from maintenance personnel while we are trying to relax on vacation.

Also 2 of the 3 TVs were unable to connect to the Wi-Fi. Not a big deal on beach vacation but worth mentioning. Cable doesn't work in 1 bedroom too.

Also even though Covid restrictions are lifted, Gulfsands is still doing a "remote" check in that is cumbersome. It feels like they are using the situation as an excuse to not have to interact with people. The office you pick your keys up at resembles a maximum security prison with all the cameras and just seems over the top.

Positives were tons of hot water, good location across from Waves (groceries, beer, ice, fishing, etc), and normally an OK value if these problems would have been resolved. Condo is certainly dated.

Overall I can't recommend based on my experiences with how the company is managed and the troubles I described with the condo.

*Update*  I think all you need to do is read the response from the owner below to validate they are unreasonable and probably not worth your business :)

resp.text: Please disregard this review.  This was a guest who threatened us with reviews if we did not pay them a free night for their washer being out of service.  This is a $30 credit item, which is the highest to any guest, as most were $10.  This is for groups of 6.  The guest told staff to 'keep it', as we learned after departure that they wanted more than $200.  This is called post exit rental extortion and is common in the market, especially this year.  We did confirm with the guest that if we didn't pay that amount, he would go on web sites to write negative reviews?  As you can see, this is the result.  The other issues appeared only after the request for money, which is also how this game works.  We don't play, as most other agents have stopped as well.  BTW, a large bug as described is a palmetto bug, and it is not from the condo, as it simply walked in an open door to escape the heat.  That's where they come from, outside.  We wish the guest the best, and hope they enjoy our beaches another time.  The water in the washer was soapy, and emptied as soon as requested, as we had to purchase a pump.  We also treated unit with bleach so it smelled clean.  Pest control comes once every 90 days, and not to poison their condo, but to treat pests, as with every condo in the city.  The new washer was on order, and was noted as not functioning in the rental ad since March 2021.  A new timer was installed for the prior guest to gain some life from the unit, and the unit was working for them, then failed again, as we waited several weeks for the new washer to arrive, which it since has.  Stack units were in high demand due to damages from Hurricane Sally and new construction, so they were not available from any source.  We had to wait weeks for it, but compensated each guest fairly.  This is a review done to intentionally hurt us for non payment of an amount that was not going to happen.

name: Cindy Pinson
text: Stayed here for a week in August and it was fantastic. Place was clean, roomy and had all the comforts of home.
