More than enough cookware for any kind of cooking you want to do (even a big pot for making a seafood boil). Great beach access and a nice grill. Everything was as described and the books and puzzles were a really nice touch! Communication was perfect from start to finish. Will definitely stay here on any future trips to Gulf Shores. Thanks for a wonderful stay!

name: Emily White
text: We had a great stay!  Communication and booking with Gulfsands Rentals was super easy.  Emails detailed everything we need to know and bring with us.  Check in and out was easy and simple.  Unit 503 was very clean, had new and stylish furnishings, and was very spacious for our family.  Definitely recommend and will still again.

name: Cheri Rash
text: I made reservations for October 22-25, we got there and got our things unpacked. I received a phone call that my mother had passed away and I had to leave the same day. I asked about rescheduling and they will only reschedule for this year even though my work will not let me off during November and December as I work retail. Will not give a refund and I can’t let someone else go in my place. I would think under the circumstances they would work with me because I would love to go back. But definitely do not recommend this company with this kind of service.

name: Hollie Bright
text: We stayed at harbor house B17 everything was great! But the master king size bed needs a new mattress! There is a big dip in the bottom of it which doesn’t make for a good nights rest! Other than that we will definitely stay again!

name: Susan White
text: We stayed at the Blue Atlantis in Gulf Shores July 4-11.  This beach house was perfect for our family.  We loved the kitchen!  There was a problem with a sanitation concern, but it was taken care of a day later.  The beach was wonderful with just a few people from the row of homes...like having a private beach.   The upstairs media room was occupied every day.  If you have a large family of adults and children, you need to check out this home.

name: Michele Kuntz
text: We have used Gulf Sands for 5 years and we are getting ready to book our next vacation. They took care of us each time we had questions or concerns and went above and beyond. As long as well keep coming we will use them to book.

resp.text: Michele, thank you for your kind words and for your continued, repeat business.  -Gulfsands Rentals Team

name: Jeremy Chrastina
text: We have stayed at Southern Sands multiple times over the past few years.  We love the accessibility to everything and the smaller feel of the building.  Very easy in and out of the parking garage as well as the units.  Beachfront is a huge plus.  Walk right out into the beach.  Great views of the coast and sunsets. We tried out a different spot last year and the whole time we were all saying how we wished we had booked at Southern Sands.  We are heading back to Southern Sands this year for sure.

name: Michael Durio
text: We loved our stay for the Labor Day Holiday everything was just as they said it would be.  The condo was well stocked with the essentials, great location and the beach was not to crowded even though it was a holiday weekend.

name: Dianne Epperson
text: Castaways 9C was a good place to stay. Very clean.  Beds were very comfortable.  Only problem was the parking spaces were way to small.  Everything else was just fine.

name: Darci Reeves
text: Stayed at Sunrise Village RM 104 and it was comfortable.  Could use some updating on the mattress but besides that it was fine. 3rd time to stay at Sunrise Village and love the location! Will be back!

name: Kelly Bordelon
text: We stayed at Sunrise village 103 and we were very pleased with our stay. 3 adult and 3 children and it was the PERFECT location right on the beach. It was so convenient here for carrying things on the beach and as well as the store right across the street. The only thing to note would be the screen on the window in the bedroom by the kitchen was ripped off and in that same room there were clothes tags behind the nightstand and a hanger that i seen when inspecting the room (i once was a hotel manager with superb inspecting skills lol). Evidence of previous guest was a bummer but not a big issue since it was just clothes tags because everything else was clean and wonderful. I hope they continue to keep this property up it is way too convenient and we will be back!! The kids loved it here as well! Thanks for an amazing last minute stay!

name: David Mcelhaney
text: This was the perfect location for a family getaway.  The townhouse is directly on the beach which is nice considering it's surrounded by highrises.  Being on the beach allowed for us to come and go as we pleased without having the hassle of going up and down flights of stairs or elevators.  We had 8 in our party and we were all comfortable the entire time with plenty of room to spread out.  We have already recommended to other family and friends and will be back the next time we come to Gulf Shores.

name: Rebecca Payne Rodriguez
text: We stayed at Seaside 3104 and was very pleased. We have stayed at the same place for the last 10 years. Different condos within the same building. You just can’t beat the location. The  building has great parking, sometimes right up to your door. The condo is on the ground floor so no elevators to deal with. Pool is just a few feet away. The master mattress needs to be changed out as it lumpy and hard to sleep on. Floors could have been cleaner upon arrival and there was a dead cockroach on the kitchen floor upon arrival when it should have been just cleaned. Nothing to ruin or stay but those two things need to be addressed.

name: Jeffrey Geddes
text: Excellent service. Loved our stay in Gulf Shores. Very responsive and helpful office. Highly recommended! We love this location as it is more family friendly than other locations appear to be. Being right on the beach at Sunchase was incredible.

resp.text: Thanks so much and we look forward to your next trip!

name: sally randall
text: loved how responsive and helpful they were . Made us feel like they really wanted us to be happy . Nice to feel that way. Very personable and we were not expecting that - as busy as we know they were and are. Really nice people .

name: Cindy Green
text: Harbor House sits on the beach and was wonderful for our stay. The condo itself was a little small but we stayed on the beach all day. It was a wonderful get away!

name: Brandy warden
text: Stayed at the hangout B duplex! Awesome view easy access to the beach and walking distance to the hangout and several shopping places! Customer Service for GulfSand rentals was also excellent they answered all my questions and was very patient. I will be booking again with them when we go back to Gulf Shores.

name: Randi Cialdella
text: Great beach access!  Kitchen updates were beautiful!  Had a little bit of a bathroom issue, and maintenance was quick to respond.  We will be back!

name: Charlene Naramore
text: Absolutely loved everything about our stay.  Gulfsands Rental had contactless service which went perfect.  Our condo was so clean and we will be using Gulfsands again for our future stay!

name: Brooke Walkup
text: This rental company was very unresponsive to my needs. I did not receive  the codes I needed to get into the condo on time. The after hours gentleman on the phone was the only helpful person I ever spoke with. Then once we were finally in; the A/C unit was not working. We spent the first night with NO A/C.  We called for someone to come out that night, but no one ever showed up. I had to call again the next day, then they sent someone out to take care of the problem. I was never compensated or even given a phone call to make sure everything was ok. I even e-mailed them once we were home, they have not responded. Overall this company was very poor! If I owned a condo I would NOT use them as a rental company!

resp.text: Regrettably, we have no one with this name on file.  All check ins receive their box codes as soon as their unit is ready, via email, contactless check in with Covid mandates.  All guests receive detailed instructions the day prior to check in, so they are always on the lookout for the check in email.  We be sure to prepare all guests well in advance due to required state mandates currently in place.  We hope you visit our beaches again and wish you the best.

name: Ginny Duren
text: This was our 4th stay at Southern Sands 305 and it was great as always. Favorite thing about this condo is the balcony. It's huge! We love staying here!

name: Dianne Joy
text: The keyless entry! It’s a must!!! The last thing you want to have to carry with you to the beach is keys.... thank you for having a keyless entry!! The room was spacious and clean and the beds very comfortable! we had an issue with a toilet but we were taken care of immediately! Thank you!!

name: Kevin Green
text: We stayed at Royal Palms next to the state park. Customer service was great! Very prompt response and courteous on the phone. The day we arrived we did a walk through and noticed hair on the floor in the bathroom inside the master bedroom, and there was a strong odor of urine. After raising the toilet seat cover we noticed there was urine on the seat, the rim, and the back of the toilet. We went to the store and bought some cleaner to clean up the mess but could not get the urine smell to dissipate so we closed the door and only used the hall bathroom. It seemed the previous renters had left various children's toys and McDonalds cups in the condo as well. While this wasn't really an issue it made for a disorganized appearance. The A/C was cold, the water was hot, and the view was perfect. I believe your cleaning contractor leaves a lot to be desired and could do a much better job. Knowing that you have various people renting, as a condo owner I would suggest purchasing matching dinner and flatware as well as all cookware. While the appliances were all in working order the dishwasher and washer/dryer were very dated and the stove elements were crooked and awkward to cook on. We absolutely loved the leather/vinyl couch and strongly recommend getting away from fabric furniture unless it is professionally cleaned. I understand the costs of owning beachfront property to be quite expensive, but for the price it could use some updating. You could utilize the cleaning company to check inventory of everything on the day of checkout and charge the renter for anything missing or broken items. Also I strongly encourage you to purchase darkout curtains for the master bedroom as the outside lights and early sunrise made it very cumbersome to sleep. The only reason this got 4 stars was due to the nastiness of the room. We would definitely give this company and owner another chance in the future because we love Gulf Shores and it is our favorite vacation destination so we will be back.

name: Jennifer Boudreaux
text: Very nice place.. comfy beds and convenient location! We will be back. Great value for your money!

name: William Tashie
text: We just finished our 4th year renting at Ocean Reef thru Gulfsands. They always respond quickly and accommodated our request to clean our unti early as we have young kids that nap early in the afternoon. The recent updates to yhe until we're a nice surprise and the new deck was also very nice to have for.our small kids. We will be staying again and hopefully for many years to come. Thanks Gulfsands for accommodating our family!

name: Arnelis Pitre
text: Horrible and rude people to work with. They don't represent the southern hospitality. They don't had any courtesy or consideration to my family. They run their business horribly!! They have a horrible and unsafe "welcome package" set up in where other people can get access to your information. We felt treat by the staff of this place. The people who may recommend  may know them.

resp.text: We always deeply regret any review below 5 stars, and we wish this guest the best for their future.  With the pandemic, our lobby is closed, so we provide detailed check in instructions, and even a laminated sign concealing the check in boxes (so it must be reviewed) reminding guests to only take your package, as there is another one in the same box.  This guest unfortunately took their check in package, and another guest's check in package, so they had 2.  The guest called and told us they had another package, and we needed them to  return the package for the other guest.  This is when the guest became upset with us and did not wish to return it.  The guest did return the package later. The guest then called indicating they could not get into the condo, and became more upset.  The guests were at the wrong door (they were at the unit storage locker).  We got them to the right spot once we figured out where they were.  We do regret this, but during COVID-19, our lobby is not open, and we do all we can to show guests what to do, and we will walk you thru any issue with a call, which we did when we understood where they were.   We did nothing wrong except give a super deal on a last minute 2 night stay with 15% off on top, and an Early Check-In too!  We only wish the guest had taken only their package, as we know this is what created the tension.  Our check in process is very safe, as we've been using it for 25 years without issue.  No one has access to any info about another guest, except their name if they happen to take that guest's package, as the check in boxes are combination locked, and only the guest has the combination.  There is no personal info in any check in package, other than name.

name: Jason Busby
text: We stayed at  Harbor House B20 and could not have been more pleased. Location was great. The condo was very clean and up to date. You cannot beat the beach access, just a short walk across the parking lot. Parking was very convenient. There is a small store directly across the road from the condos. I highly suggest paying just a little more and go there instead of trying to fight the crowd at Walmart!! My family and I will definitely stay here again.

resp.text: Hi Jason, we are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at Harbor House B20!  Thank you for your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

name: Chip Gebert
text: Great people to deal with! Stayed with them before and will stay with them in the future!

name: Dustin Davis
text: Stayed at Crystal Shores West 905. This agency made booking, paying, and checking in so easy and accommodating. Couldnt have worked out any better and been any easier. Thank you. Although we had to cut our trip a day short for family reasons, this particular condo and location were perfect for us. Zero complaints.

name: Carson Dabbs
text: We stayed at Gulfside Townhomes 13. The unit was great and we had no complaints at all. I would like to say thank you to the staff at Gulfsands for making our family vacation so great! The entire process was wonderful from booking to checkout. You won't go wrong if you plan your vacation through Gulfsands!

name: Rachael Myers
text: I am the Kennel Manager for the Baldwin County Humane Society(BARC) and Gulf Sands made a HUGE, very much appreciated donation today of many supplies we desperately needed. They are a wholesome, local company that has our utmost gratitude. Thank You Gulf Sands!

name: Dayvault Robert
text: Stayed at Sunrise Village unit 110. Carpet dirty, no ones vacuumed under beds or under furniture in who knows. Mold on shower curtain. No hangers for clothes. Huge gap under door lets in everything including the cockroaches we killed in the kitchen. Everything worked thank God. Cold A/C, hot water adequate. Lack of kitchen utensils was a challenge cooking. The major thing was I think I paid for a pool and I just couldn't find it anywhere? So it's buyer beware, location is the only thing that saves this place. Even that won't bring me back there other properties close by just as cheap and nicer, I looked.

resp.text: We always appreciate guests taking the time to write comments, but we'd ask readers to please discount this review.  This guest was occupying the unit (mid stay) when he posted this review and never contacted us about any issue.  We emailed, called, and left VM to instruct guest where the pool is located and help to improve his stay.  We dispatched maintenance to address any issues and to show the guest the pool location; however, he was told to leave..but we did provide more hangers to add to those already there.  We honestly don't know if he found the pool, but it's on the north side of the complex in the fenced pool area.  This unit is booked solid, with no open in-season dates due to extreme popularity, and great reviews for value and location.  We tried hard here to assist with any issue.  The bedrooms are very small in Sunrise, so a standard vacuum will not fit under beds there, just a broom, and if any items were missed from prior guest, we'd always address an issue immediately, but we called off the housekeeping crew after maintenance was shown the door.  After the guest departed, we reviewed for issues, found standard pots/pans for cooking, and did address a gap under the front door with a custom door sweep.

name: Ellie Kelsey
text: I have used gulfsands rentals for about 6 Years now and have absolutely loved our stays. We’ve stayed at a few. The staff is great and we look forward to every year... sincerely, the Kelsey’s

name: Drew Deshotels
text: Everything was great, we really enjoyed our visit and the staff at Gulf Sands we're very helpful and efficient. Checking in and out couldn't have been easier. Thanks for a wonderful visit, can't wait to come back!

name: Ronald Woods
text: Found a huge cockroach in the bathroom. I killed it and took a picture, called the office. (Unit- Ocean Reef 702) Explained that this was unacceptable and I would be leaving with my family because of this. Lady said it was “just a bug.” Refused to give any type of refund. This was day 1 of a 4 day stay. Also very musty in the unit, floors were super dirty. When I walked across with my bare feet they were super dirty from the buildup.

resp.text: Hi, we did investigate and noted to the guest we'd be back to them, but they filed this regardless, after noting they'd leave a terrible review if we did not give them money.  As expected, the critter was a palmetto bug, and it likely walked in from an open door, not an issue anyone could correct or anticipate.  It was in the front closet by the main door, and not the bathroom. This is common during our heat wave, as these are large bugs trying to get into the cool unit from an open door, as they hang out by the beach.  No issues of cleaning were mentioned. We will always address any issue for any guest at any time, but we weren't notified of anything until after the guest had left the following day.  No issues were found with the unit, and the palmetto was simply removed.  Renovated, popular, 5-star gulf front townhome.

name: Andrew More
text: I've worked with Gulfsands Rentals since May 2009 and I've been very pleased with the quality of service provided. They are a full-service rental company, trust worthy, and I highly recommend them. My experience was consistently strong rents year-over-year and good communication regarding maintenance items. Great team to work with.

name: rachel saunders
text: The room and accommodations were good for the price, but the cleanliness left something to be desired. The place hadn't been dusted in a long time, the walls had dirt and grime on them, the window glass was dirty, there were dirty dishes in the cupboard upon arrival. I would have loved it if It would have just been clean. I left information for the manager detailing these concerns when I turned my key in. As well priced and convenient as it was,I doubt we will return.

name: DeShunta Wright-Fields
text: My family and I visit Gulf Shores every six months because we love Gulf Shores so much and every visit we use Gulf Sands Rentals. In fact, my husband and I celebrate our wedding anniversary here every year. We have never had any problems with this company. In fact, we love them! We won't rent from any place else. Stephanie is always so accommodating. Her customer service skills are exemplary! We've stayed in a few of their units at Island Sunrise and we completely satisfied. I'm not sure where all the bad reviews are coming from but I can't agree with any of them. My husband and I are visiting Gulf Shores in two weeks for my husband's birthday and our 5th wedding anniversary, we hope this trip is as good as our previous trips! Thank Gulf Sands Rentals for always making our trips to Gulf Shores so relaxing and worry-free!

name: Kathryn Williams
text: What A Scam!! We traveled from the great Northwest to Gulf Shores for the first time. We booked a "condo" in February based on photos on the internet. We were not allowed to see the property until this despicable "businessman" had all our money which was a total of $920. The place was a complete dump! The railing was falling apart. The steps were very dangerous and there was trash around the property. The unit was old and rundown with old furniture and a strange smell. When we rejected the reservation we were told that we would not be getting a refund. What a scam! So, we spent $920 for nothing!! What a rotten way to run a business. I don't know how you sleep at night!  We moved on to a clean, well-kept hotel room right on the beach. You have ruined a beautiful place for us.  We will be telling everyone we know of our experience. "What goes around comes around". You will "get yours" one of these days. Scumbag!

resp.text: We have over 15,000 guests per year, and in business for 20 yrs.  We had seen any items on this page before, so working to reply.  These guests broke all policy, and apparently departed in the middle of the night, but never spoke to anyone.  They booked many months in advance, and saw this cute, economy property online, the actual unit, long before arrival.  Please note, that if this were true, their credit card company would have quickly refunded them, as we work closely to comply with all credit card policies.  Please see our website for accurate reviews, as we have been in business a very long time. 'A' rating on Better Business Bureau also.  Regrettably, we will work to resolve any issue with any guest.  We never spoke to these people, but they use the Internet in regrettably ways, which has become all to common today.  We wish them well regardless.

name: jason testa
text: Top Notch Service! Made the whole reservation a breeze. Very Pleased with our Selection. We stayed at their beach house "Toto" and I must say the view was absolutely stunning. Just A few steps from the back door and You are in the Sand! Could not be Happier. We will be back this summer! Thank you!

name: Krista Haugland
text: I have stayed at sunrise village 7-8 times over the past 8 years.  I love the location, the area is quite and the rooms are always clean. I feel safe at this location and the beach isn't overly full.

name: Kim Terry
text: The Condo is a little dated and worn but clean and close to the beach.

name: Chris
text: Hung up on me when I called in for the first time. Unbelievable

resp.text: Hi Chris, regrettably we did not hear anyone on the other end of the line.  We repeatedly noted ‘gulfsands’ but heard no reply. Likely a connection issue on your end or ours. Any issue was technical and nothing intentional. These things can happen, but never are we trying to disconnect. Hope to hear back in the future!

name: Rachel Frey
text: We love Sunrise Village! Perfect location right on the beach. We will continue to stay here year after year!

name: Tracey Tracey
text: Just getting back from a most wonderful vacation.  Thank you to Gulfsands Rentals for your beautiful accommodations - everything was perfect!!!  We are already planning our trip next year!

name: Sarah Chenault
text:
I rented from Gulfsands Rentals, condo Royal Palms 1202. Although the accommodations were sufficient, they were not as advertised. To begin, we were under the assumption, based on the listing descriptions, that our condo 1202 was penthouse level. Upon arrival we were the last floor before penthouse, but the view was amazing.

This condo is listed to sleep 6 people. The accommodations read king size bed, sofa sleeper and two bunk beds. Specifications should have said children size bunks. The fold out still had plastic on the mattress and sounded like sleeping in a bag of potato chips.  The couch was more comfortable to sleep on as a sofa.

The first two showers that were taken in the hall bathroom were ice cold, as turning the knob to H made the water remain cold leading us to believe the hot water heater was broken. Upon calling Gulfsands Rental, we were informed that the hot/cold was reversed, meaning H was cold and C was hot. The exact words of the agent were, "Oh, that is reversed, try keeping the knob on cold." There was nothing posted to this affect in the bathroom, even though this as a known issue by the rental company.

In the master bedroom, the ceiling fan was not working. When calling the rental company they stated it worked only with a remote of which there was not one. A maintenance request was put in. When the guy showed up to look at it he said the motor was blown and he would have to either order a new part or a new fan. It was not fixed during our 5 night stay. We called on day one about the fan.

Other minor issues were the floor was not clean when we arrived, the wifi connection was unreliable and when eating, the only place for multiple people to eat was on the balcony, 3 deep on the soft or perched on the most uncomfortable bar stools ever created.

To sum up the review, the rental company should have been more forthcoming about known issues prior to booking. We feel we did not get what we paid for. I

I tried to post this on their website, but all reviews are moderated by them so the likelihood of it being seen on their website is slim to none.

resp.text: We regret this review, as the guest was looking at unit 1306 initially, but that unit was not available...penthouse level 1306...and 1202 was and offered with a link to view this unit.  This unit is not, and has never been noted as penthouse level, this was a guest mistake.  Unit 1202 is one level below the penthouse level and 12th floor is no different otherwise.  Nothing special is available on the penthouse floor.  Bunks are photo'd online and ARE described for children.  Sounds like the stay was very good, but not indicated as such.  The shower is actually correct, but we have found the simplest way to note how it works to the guests that have issues is to say its reversed.  There is an arrow on the rounded side of shower arm pointing to the H and C, but most folks miss it, so they assume the arm is to point to H or C.  We regret the issue, but it's just how it was manufactured.  The stools are brand new and heavy duty.  Don't know what else we can say.  This is a wonderful, updated condo with a great view.  We did report the fan not working to the owner, and he is fedexing his replacement for arrival today, as they are special units.  Light worked, and the AC makes the unit very cold, but one fan did not turn during the stay, and we did everything we could to repair it.  We received a 2 star review.  We view this review as inappropriate, as we have great deals and this is a very nice condo.  We feel reviews like this have no place on the web, but they have become commonplace as people will go out of their way to damage a company's reputation with little issue, but the thousands of happy guest won't take the time to note the great time they had.  We have had 12,000 guests just this season....in 20 years we have 8 posts on google.  We always let the reader decide.

name: Patricia Mcwhorter
text: We have used Gulf Sands for years and have been thoroughly pleased with our experiences!  Great rentals at good prices, friendly/efficient staff, and gorgeous beaches - what more could you want?!?!

resp.text: Hey Patricia! Thank you so much for this amazing review! We appreciate your business and we are so happy to hear that you are enjoying your experiences with us! We look forward to host your next vacation rental! - Gulfsands Team

name: Jim Turner
text: Just left today...awesome weather, great spot.  Had one issue, but they sent someone out fast and all got fixed quick.  Thanks guys...back again next year!!

name: Stacey Morgan
text: The whole process with them was like pulling teeth. We are two families that have booked a vacation together the past 3 years. We have been able to list both families and each pay our own part separately with no issue except for here. They will only let 1 person be on the contract and that is the only person that can pick up the keys. It's really inconvenient and aggravating when we travel in separate vehicles and arrive at different times. I stated such to the guy in the office and his attitude was like those at the DMV "oh well, this is how it is,  you have no choice but to get over it". Again, as an owner of the condo, I would want a different company dealing with my renters.

resp.text: Hi Stacey, thanks for your note.  We regret that our credit card policy created your review, as we hope your vacation was enjoyable and you felt you got a good deal (we have the best agent pricing in that complex).  Our policy is provided up front in our rental agreement and also on our Policies page on our web site to keep folks informed.  Card policies in the accommodations industry continually change and have become quite strict.  We follow all Visa, MC, AMEX and Discover policies as they protect both you and the condo owner.  We did offer the option of sending checks from multiple parties, since we can only accept CC payment from the person signing the agreement, and you did send checks from 2 different parties for payment.  We hope that helped.  With check in, our policy is the same as a hotel, and only the person on the reservation can check in.  We can add an additional tenant prior to check in, but they need to sign an agreement and also have a card on file.  Please know that our goal is to make your stay enjoyable, but we do note our policies up front and have to abide by them.

name: Connie Moody
text: Great,family owned rental company! Best rates in Gulf Shores(compared several others)! Always enjoy our trips of many years,now!

name: Sharon Haugen
text: We have rented from them for 8 years you would think that means something but we were treated very bad this tshaugen@frontiernet.net we have got the problem fixed and we will be renting from them again this year.

resp.text: We regret this review from a customer, but this was simply the guest wishing us to provide free nights for extending their stay, and we offered a 50% off rate, which was super and the guests indicated they would call us back.  When they did, they noted how badly we treated them, did not take the big discount, and left on time.  We regret they didn't wish take the discount, but we did not deserve this review for offering a great deal.

name: Susan Frederick
text: Really pleased with our stay. Our condo was right on the beach, well equipped  and very clean. Helpful staff- seamless service

name: Ashley Marotta
text: Great experience with Gulfsand Rentals! Loved our stay here and the whole process was quick and easy, will totally be back!

name: Trese Mashburn
text:
Regatta 203C -
While we absolutely LOVE this property and this will be our 3rd year in a row to stay in this unit, the reservation process this time was beyond ridiculous. This new management company was difficult to reach, several calls were made to attempt to reserve the unit during "normal business hours", but was met with a message that the office was closed during said hours. We always make this trip with family friends and we split the cost and deposit. This management team made that process nearly impossible and the young lady that I dealt with was rude, kept repeating herself without making herself clear, AND talked over me constantly. The previous management company for this property was friendly, helpful and accomodating with the separate payments - unfortunately this management company was anything but. It should not be this difficult to give a business my money. Still looking forward to our stay however, and will continue to stay in this unit as long as it is available because we love the unit and it's location with proximity to everything.

name: Jim Thompson
text: Great company we've used for years.

name: Sarah Daigle
text: There was absolutely nothing to like about Island Sunrise #556 but the view! This had to be the most disgusting condo I have ever walked into. There were missing and burned out lights throughout the unit. The linens and towels were poorly laundered. Before we could ever eat, we had to wash all of the silverware and dishes. There was hair all over the floors and when we tried to use the vacuum in the unit, all it did was spray sand everywhere and smell like a wet dog. Even the cushions on the couch and chairs felt wet and smelled like mildew. I have spent MANY vacations along the Gulf Coast and this one was truly regrettable. We checked out 2 days early because of the filthy conditions in the condo!

name: perin elliott
text:
First of all, sent payment in the form of a cashier's check, and just because it wasn't a "postal money order" they wouldn't accept it, so I had to go back to my credit union, withdraw another $200 and take cash down there with us and get the cashier's check back from them.  Ridiculous.  Any cashier's check is as good as cash.

Secondly, got to the condo and it was nothing like the photos or as described.  They say in the literature they send you there are "beach balls, beach chairs and umbrella" at the condo.  No such thing.  And no information at the condo on where or how to rent any.  Condo was much smaller than described and much older.  Some of the steps leading up to the second floor were dangerously high and some of the floor on the balcony outside is wet and apparently about to cave in.

First night there my husband needed to work on some homework for school and the internet was down.  Had to wait until the next day, then had to drive to their office to get it fixed - this after several calls to customer support.

Remote to main t.v. is broken.  They have a bad ant problem in the kitchen.  They give you NO extra towels or garbage liners.

We were VERY disappointed in this place and will NOT be using them again.

resp.text: We regret our guest would post this review, as the information noted is simply not accurate, and the guest never complained about any issued presented, with the exception of an Internet log in issue, which we helped to resolve with the utility provider.  To note each: payment submitted was not a cashiers check, which we did our best to accurately note to the guest. All payment options are sent to guests at time of booking.  A bank check is not certified funds, as this was not a cashier's check.  Beach balls are not in any unit, and no such items are noted in any information we provide.  Beach chair/umbrella rental info is provided with check in docs, including cost, vendor name on the beach and phone number for contact/reserving. Photos are exactly unit 205 which was completely remodeled from scratch...100% new interior rebuilt in February 2015, including all cabinets, interior doors..everything in the unit, except the shower stall.   Remote works fine, and no issue reported.  We provide 6 towels and a washer/dryer.  Condo is advertised as 600 sq ft, and it is just that also. We provide every guest with 'Things to Remember to Bring' and tell them at the time of booking. No ants were reported and nothing was found.  Guest WALKED into our office, to report Internet issues, which is provided by a 3rd party utility, and we called for them and appear to have gotten login issue resolved.   None of the items above were reported at that time or at anytime until now. This review should not be posted, as this is an extremely popular condo, and the guest appears to be confusing someone else's ad or info with this unit.  We honestly don't know how to reply to this...as its simply wrong.  We believe this guest was venting at us since we did not accept their payment.  No other issues were noted at any time.  Stairs are common size, so not sure how to reply there, and no items at all are about to cave in, and the facility had just received brand new aluminum railings too.

name: cindi robbins
text: Bldg needs EXTREME  maintenance.  Elevator was down most of our stay. Fire dept had to come over twice get people out. View was lovely. Small bldg so beach wasn't over crowded,  which was nice

name: Kim Dixon
text: We stay over 4th of July. Our condo was clean great view. 3D unit

name: Rob Forsgren
text: Great condo. Great location and price.

name: JJ Walker
text: The condo that we are currently renting is ok.... not great.  The owners have been very attentive to our concerns.  This is an old building which really requires major updating but  outside of that..... the building is filthy.  The one elevator either smelled like pee or fish the entire week.   The elevator doors on the 6th floor look like someone has thrown something sticky and it was never cleaned .  Again.... just because a building is old doesn't mean it has to be filthy and not taken of at all.  Will not stay here again.  Could post many more things that were neglected.

name: Ty Lopez
text: The building isn't impressive from the outside, but the unit we stayed in was great.  Very nice.  Great beach access.

name: Lonie646 KENWORTH
text: 1 c very nice place all updated nice view

name: Justin Glodoski
text: Great spot on the beach

name: Patty Ollis
text: When we arrived it supposedly was cleaned however we had to purchase cleaning supplies to clean the place, definitely not worth the money you have to pay

name: Kim Harrod
text: Location: PERFECT. Views: AMAZING! Amenities: Pretty good. Housekeeping: Ehhh.... Mattresses: from HELL! The most uncomfortable things ever, esp the sleeper sofa. They are waayyyy past due to be replaced. As a guest with a back issues, this one thing made the trip regretful. We were in 4B so I can't speak on the other condos.

name: Cassie Franklin
text: Perfect views, beach literally 30 seconds away and the pool was awesome , we have enjoyed our stay and plan to be back in the future😀😀

name: Alisa Hardee
text: Gorgeous condo with a beautiful view right on the beach! Has everything you could want and more!

name: Audrey L Morehead
text: Wonderful retreat for relaxation! Great ocean view--close enough to hear the waves lap the Shores! Convenient to the beach. Nice amenities, like elevator and carts to carry luggage & supplies to condo. Clean pool. We enjoyed our time at the Whaler!

name: Jackson Gatgens
text: The view of the beach is great

name: Brandy Brackett
text: Just okay. One very slow elevator for entire building & uncovered parking. Old building, old amenities. No boardwalk to beach. Good location. 7C was much nicer inside, spacious for a condo. Perfect for family of 6 on a budget. Clean.

name: Linda Loftin
text: Teeny tiny condo. Tiny bathrooms, awkward kitchen and when you sat on the sofa, you almost went to the floor. I'm glad I wasn't staying overnight.   Sorry but that is my personal opinion.

name: Matt Ford
text: Great location condo was Beach front, walk straight out to the ocean. Not a bad price either

name: Rich Hursh
text: This building is wonderful? Only 28 units and a pool never have to wait on the elevator plenty of parking.

name: Debra Upshaw
text: We had a terrible experience renting from Susan Porterfield. Within our stay of 6days in condo 6c we lost one day with no electricity and two days and nights with no air conditioner. The furniture was all broken and terribly worn. After asking for a refund due to our wasted beach time trying to get the air fixed we asked for our $250 check refund back that she said She would not cash. After a month she cashed our check after agreeing that she wouldn't. Please do not rent a condo from this lady. Lesson learned. Should have stopped the check a month ago at the bank. But we thought we could trust her word. Lesson learned. The hard way. I have photos of the broken furniture. I planned a beautiful supper for family and it was too hot inside to even enjoy it. Just a little common courtesy lady. The building is not the best but its people like thus that ruin your trip

name: Joe Johnson
text: Love this place!!! Very quite

name: Roger Pashby
text: This is an older condo unit, comfortable, good beach view for all units, but needs better maintenance control. It is sided by two taller condos, which block sunsets and sunrises.

name: Kenny Barett
text: Great rental property!

name: Delbert Funk
text: Very nice condo

name: Linda Duren
text: Beautiful home. Perfect beach rental.

name: BalaRina
text: Amazing experience, everything is beyond our expectations

name: A Google User
text: Nice vacation spot private fishing pier. Not a private beach but even on memorial day weekend it wasn't packed like you would think. Clean white beaches and quiet.

name: A Google User
text: It's great we've been coming down for the past 30 years and we look forward to coming back every year, fishing this year has been better than it has in the last 4 years

name: A Google User
text: Absolutely love the private pier!Lots of wonderful family memories made!You are within distance to many great places to eat and fun for all!

name: A Google User
text: We did a annual Girls Trip this year in condo 602  lovely condo and loved the pier. Just wished we could of enjoyed it more unfortunately we were there when the hurricane Sally came to town. Was just a little concerned that we lost power and were on 6th floor 96 stairs up and 96 stairs down and none of the emergency lights worked in the stairwells and it made it very dangerous to go up and down. I hope that get this matter taken care of. Bummed we didn’t get to enjoy more of the town had to offer.

name: A Google User
text: Th view from our balcony was amazing. The private pier was awesome. We could see dolphins playing in the mornings and little fish along the side at night. The beach was perfect. The inside pool was great for rainy days. It was too cool for us to use the outdoor pool, but it looked very nice. We would definitely go back.

name: A Google User
text: We’ve been coming here for years. We love the location and love the private pier. The pool is small but refreshing and never full. We booked a trip pre COVID 19 and we were promised that they were doing a deep clean in between stays, so we went ahead and went down for our family vacation. Let’s just say the cleaning was a complete joke. The place had not been dusted in a while. We found press on nails in one bedrooms window, there were a ton of fruit flies, and we found panties under the bed. The balcony door attached to the master did not work. The fan in the living room did not work. Our party of 8 was given 4 towels, when we called to ask for more the lady was confrontational. We understand security has a job to do and we respect that but they should care less about people hanging towels over the pool rails to dry them off in the sun while they swim, and more about drunk people throwing the pier net in the ocean, fishing off the balcony and putting the pool chairs in the pool.

name: A Google User
text:
If being harassed by overzealous security sounds relaxing to you, this is the condo for you! We purchased a second parking pass from our rental company. Don’t! It is worthless. The security will inform you that you are only allowed one vehicle (even though we had nine people we were still only allowed to park one vehicle so rent a van if you want to stay here). We had two and were told we could park one of them offsite. When we attempted to park our second vehicle in the condo parking lot with the parking pass visible, we watched as security would leave the gate and circle our car. They left a “ticket” stating our car would be towed if we parked in the condo parking again. My husband counted thirty empty parking spaces when this occurred. You are allowed to park one car and they will harass you coming and going if you Break this rule! Note: nowhere on our rental agreement was this disclosed to us. They told us it is explained on their website. It was not.

Don’t attempt to park in the public beach parking next door. My nephew found his spotless truck like this the morning after he did. A grocery store on the opposite side of the road and several minutes away will allow you to park. So, if having to drive to go get your car and come back to retrieve your family doesn’t bother you anytime you choose to leave the condo, this is your place! The pier is cool and our condo was clean but we will NEVER rent a condo here as we don’t enjoy being harassed by security!

name: A Google User
text: My sister lives there. Its not for rent .

name: Lisa Cochran
text: 501 West is immaculate, well furnished and decorate d.

name: Doris Dellinger
text: We recently stayed at this condo and found it to be in a great location.  Having the pier on site was a great plus.  The condo we stayed in had 3 bedrooms 3 baths and the layout was wonderful because you had a front view of the ocean from living area and two of the 3 bedrooms.  Would book this condo again in the future.

name: Beck Stults
text: If the security had some training in manners and communication I would give 4 stars. If the rules state that security is to give a parking pass at check in they should do that instead of waiting and confronting guests in a confrontational manner 2 days later for not having the pass. If security leaves a note of a violation, such as leaving a chair outside the door, simply listing the violation is enough. The note doesn’t have to include a threat of taking the property.  You are security at a high priced family condo not a 70 year old bouncer at a wild college bar.

name: Lauren Windle
text: The private pier was super cool.

name: Tracy Whitaker
text: This is a great place to stay with a pier that goes out on the beach. It is relaxing and the people are nice and friendly.

name: Teresa Robinson
text: Nice condo. On the beach. Will definitely stay here again. Indoor pool wasnt heated but they were trying to get it fixed.

name: Angela Futrell
text: Very nice we will definitely return for our next getaway.

name: Elijah Whitehead
text: The condos are great! Our coworker owns a condo here and I'm able to go any time I want! Awesome experience!

name: Brian Loper
text:
We rented 203W from 3Palms Real Estate for an extended stay.  We have rented 4 other different units in the past and 203W was by far the worst.  The main TV was a tube and you couldn’t read the score of football games as it was very cloudy/unclear, the dishwasher leaked rust on dishes, the clothes dryer took most of two full 60 minute cycles to dry towels, the master shower had mold in the tile corners and the toilets needed cleaning under the rim, the stove top was old element electric which did not sit flat so cooking was a challenge.
The condo as a whole is great although security wasn't keeping kids in check running around on the pier.

name: Rickey Mullins
text:
We rented 903E. It is a wonderful condo and exactly as described. The space is beautifully decorated.
The security staff are very courteous and helpful.
The amenities are wondrful especially the indoor pool and the private pier directly off the property.
The only improvements could be to add a hot tub and raise the temp on the indoor pool to accomdate us older tenants.
Great place!

name: Whitney Vittor
text: Best condo in OB! We have stayed here every year for the past 10 years. The pier sets it apart and the indoor pool makes the kiddos happy year round!

name: Michael Sulprizio
text: Nice rooms, no hot tub but the do have a nice pier. Family friendly....

name: David Long
text: Very nice views and amenities staff is always helpful post everything on the beach just an all-around nice place to stay

name: Mike Thompson
text: Beautiful beach condos with two pools and a massive pier.

name: Kathleen Dutton
text: Great place to enjoy the beach or the pier. Beautiful view,

name: AmyLawson09
text: Save your money don't rent 201E, just checked out today & it was the worst condo! We had to call maintenance daily. The water facet fell off in one of the bathrooms, the handle came off the oven, every door handle was loose but not anymore my dad fixed those, the garde tube leaked, found a couple of roaches & nats coming from the garbage disposal, and the fact that we called 3 times about fire ants in the room & the property didn't send anyone out topped it off, we reaquested pest control cause we had toddlers in the room and when know one showed by 9pm we handled ourselves. If you are considering renting 201E look for another room!

name: jody haid
text: Missed the party by 2 days will there be another one sep9th -17th

name: Adeva Wilson
text: IPSC Security guard was rude. We have reported this to IPSC. The condo itself is beautiful.

name: CC Naegele
text: My favorite place so far.  The pier and sunrise views set it apart!

name: Nellie Baughman
text: Enjoyed..friendly..Clean..

name: Tribble Carter
text: Great place to stay on vacation

name: phil white
text: Best place on the beach

name: Linda “Linda Mullis” Mullis
text: Great place to stay and live

name: David Haden
text: IT WENT UP THERE AND I LIKE IT

name: Jim White
text: mobile website difficult to  navigate

name: William Immonen
text: Love it

name: Dr. Tameka Lee
text:
Crystal Tower 1409
We went to Gulf Shores for vacation.  It is the first time that I have ever arrived at a condo and it WAS NOT CLEAN!  I was told by Mr. Bender that no one would be coming that evening, so I was left to clean it to give my family a comfortable place to stay.  At further request, they did send maids to mop, leave facecloths, and clean the filthy oven. We were not reimbursed for these related fees....seeing I'm the one who tidied the place up (vacuming chips from under the table, picking up left over items of the previous guest, and wiping down surfaces).
To their credit, they did replace the hot water heater while we were there as it was leaking into the floor, and I explained that I wouldn't lift another finger.
The condo is not bad, corner unit/nice layout.  However, the primary bedroom mattress is not for those with a bad back; it is hard and not comfortable. But their biggest problem is their property management.
I would not rent from them again.

name: James Maulden
text: Nice condo, we had two minor maintenance issues that were taken care of as soon as we let them know. Would have been 5 stars but the cleaning was a little lax. We would definitely stay with them again.

name: Susan Gonzales
text: Awesome room.  Right on beach. 1402, beautiful,  very clean room and everything you need.  Jenny was great at Bender Reality. Beautiful sunrises and wonderful sunsets.

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your stay!  Surf Side Shores 1402 is a terrific condo with wonderful views and so conveniently located to local restaurants and attractions!

name: Dona Freeman
text: Highly recommend Bender, we have used them numerous times and never been disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind remarks!  We're thankful for your repeat patronage and look forward to your next visit.

name: Jeannie Bowen
text: Cannot say enough about the staff who assisted us while in one of their condos while hurricane Sally was approaching.  They were very helpful and even contacted me multiple times after we left to make certain we had filed a travel insurance claim and that the claim had been processed to our satisfaction.  So very courteous, helpful and friendly.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind remarks!  We regret that the hurricane affected your stay, and we're so glad that you were refunded through travel insurance.  Please give Bender Realty a call when you are ready for your next Gulf Coast getaway!

name: Lindsay LaCue Abels
text: Bender realty is wonderful. My family and I had a trip planned well in advance however we declined the travel insurance. Hurricane Sally hit and we were contacted by Bender that our condo was damaged and unable to be rented. Bender was gracious to offer us our unit at a later date this season with 100% paid or 50% towards next years vacation. I have read many unfair reviews and that is simply not the case. It was poor decision making on the renters behalf not Bender. The rental policy was clear and non-refundable. Bender has gone above and beyond. We are praying and hoping for a quick recovery to Gulf Shores community and residents during this difficult time.

resp.text: Thank you for your very kind response.  Even with our policies as they are, we still want to help our guests as much as possible.  You are very important to us!

name: justin abels
text: Bender realty has been absolutely amazing. Our family has been using them for 6 years and we will always use this company. We have never had any complaints. The condos are always clean, comfortable, well maintained, and priced well. Thank you Bender!

resp.text: We truly appreciate your repeat patronage, and we look forward to 2021 for many reasons, but certainly one is to have you back in Gulf Shores at the Sandpiper!

name: Autumn Bond
text: They were amazing. The original reservation on booking.com said our condo would have enough beds to accommodate us on our girls long weekend and when I got there it didn't come close. The ladies at Bender not only got us a condo that had enough beds but it was a major upgrade from the place we were originally booked for. I went from being major disappointed with booking.com to i will forever be dealing with Bender vacation rentals directly in the future for all of our future family vacations which will be in a house from now on that is beachfront now that we know what to expect and how it is all laid out .  We will have our few days of girls only time and then let the boys come up and stay the rest of the week and wknd with us that way its all hands on deck w the youngest ones and we can fish at night.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!  This trip was very important to you for so many reasons, and we were thankful to be able to help you make it a memorable one.  We look forward to many future visits from you and your famil.

name: Steven Gimenez
text:
Can't say enough how outstanding this company has been to rent with and their willingness to look out for their patrons.

Sorry that we had to cancel this year, but we will be back as soon as we can!

Incredible customer service and professionalism!

Thank you and stay healthy!

resp.text: We truly appreciate your repeat patronage and could do no less during this very stressful time.  We look forward to seeing you next year!

name: Jerry Lee Boatner
text: We've been renting from Bender twice a year for the last 10 years. They are without a doubt the nicest people I have ever dealt with for vacation rentals. We had to change our reservation due to the virus shutdown and the took care of everything without any charges. I like them even more now.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.  We appreciate all of our guests, and are gratified by your repeat patronage.

name: Dave Juergens
text: This is a great vacation rental place for Gulf Shores

resp.text: Thank you, Dave!  We surely appreciate your repeat patronage.  Have a wonderful 2021, and we hope to see you soon!

name: Kim Cox
text: Because Bender Vacation Rentals stepped.up.and did refund my family i must ammend my review. Although we didn't stay at the property, due to hurricane, they responded to our plea for a refund with with a yes.

resp.text: Thank you for your amendment!  Bender Vacation Rentals always wants to do the right thing by our guests.

name: Madison Scudder
text: If you want to plan a vacation always go through bender. They are the best. They care about the renters and their experience.

resp.text: Thank you; we DO care about your and helping make your beach vacation a memorable one.

name: Matthew Leggett
text: Very nice people. Rates were very reasonable. Condo was small but comfortable and we were only using it to sleep anyway. Only complaint about trip was that we ended up next to a weekend long bachelor party and got zero sleep the entire trip! Can't blame Bender though, they didn't operate the party condo.

name: MartyWheeler Burnett
text: Excellent, personal customer service. Our rental condo was exactly as pictured, clean, and comfortable. The kitchen was completely furnished with everything needed. Beachfront units have terrific views, and the beaches are clean and well maintained. The staff at Bender goes above and beyond to meet your needs, which is why I'm a return customer.

name: j culver
text: Mrs Betty is an awesome person. I will definitely recommend

resp.text: You're so right!  The reservation team at Bender Vacation Rentals is so friendly and helpful that they've been dubbed "The Jewels of the Beach!"

name: Brenda Trautman
text: The best company we have ever worked with.....and we have used several.    Friendliest women ever in the office!    They go above and beyond !!!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words!  It's a pleasure to help great folks like yourself book and enjoy a visit to our beautiful beaches.  Be sure to call Bender Vacation Rentals when you're ready for your next Gulf Coast getaway!

name: Nancy Hicks
text: We are having a wonderful vacation rental experience.  The people we've dealt with couldn't be nicer or more helpful.  Everything has been extremely organized and well thought out.  We'll hate to leave!

name: Constance Fitzsimmons
text:
I have stayed here a few times in the past and really loved my visits. This time was a different experience.
When booking I asked specifically if the unit was the one directly on the beach. I asked very specifically and was told that yes, it was the unit directly on the beach.
Imagine my surprise when I found that I was instead directly on the ROAD and farthest from the beach.
I was further disappointed in the cleanliness and in the supplies in the unit. What a sad decline. What a disappointment for my vacation.

resp.text: Constance, while Sandpiper 1A is a very nice condo, I can imagine your disappointment at the discovery that your condo was on the beach, but not beachfront. The view is different, as are the rates. There must have been a mix-up on your choice of condo.  We constantly strive to exceed in all areas, including housekeeping. If ever you have checked in a condo where cleanliness does not meet your standards, please let us know. We will correct any housekeeping issues brought to our attention.

name: Steve Fair
text: I have vacationed and owned property on the Alabama Gulf Coast for many years and can say that the employees of Bender Realty are the greatest to do business with!  Experienced and friendly, whether you are an owner or a renter, they always put the customer first and strive to give you the best experience possible.

name: Kiel Hughes
text: Masters of the bait and switch. We come here every year for the Hangout Music Fest, and we've rented from them 3 years in a row. In 2012, we paid for a 2 bedroom condo under a mile from the festival. We were then  moved to a studio over a mile and a half away when the 2 bed SUPPOSEDLY went into foreclosure. They offered us $200 off our rental to appease us. This year, we had a friend traveling down a day late to the festival. We communicated with the booking agent (Lisa?) about getting parking for our friend, and were told she would be able to park. When we arrived, this was completely untrue. It went from being first come first serve, to needing a prearranged parking pass. We were then advised to pay to park our friends car at the sons house of one of the front desk people. No thanks. We will be taking our money to one of the more professional, reputable companies next year. We are done with your shady business practices and blatant lies.

resp.text:
I was unable to locate any reservations in your name.  However, the studio you mentioned left this review on our website after their stay:

"I have to say, I was pleasantly surprised with this condo. We had originally booked a different condo that was closer to the Hangout Festival. There was a problem with the owners of that condo, and we were moved to this one. I was a bit upset because we were staying with another couple, and we were now sharing a studio apartment. There was ZERO privacy. It would be a great condo for just one couple or a small family, though. I also have to say that Bender was very sweet about it, and refunded me some of my money for the inconvenience.  I was also scared when I saw the pictures of the place. The pictures DEFINITELY need to be updated. It looks much better in person. It is very very clean, but it needs to be updated. There is no dishwasher, which was a bit of a pain. Also all of the dishes were ceramic and glass, which were not allowed at the pool or anything- I'd recommend bringing some plastic cups and paper plates. The location was AMAZING. Right on the beach. I really enjoyed the patio in the mornings. The pool was lovely, and the beach was perfection. If you are renting this place for Hangout Fest, know that this is quite the walk! We were told it was a mile away but it was actually  1.4 miles, which means that its about a 3 mile walk every day. So be prepared! Overall our stay was much better than expected, but the condo could use some updating and it was a little further than I had hoped for.  Brittany"

The condo was sold and was no longer in our rental inventory over two months ahead of your scheduled arrival date.  Since this occurred several weeks prior to your arrival, we were able to find you accommodations to fit your needs based on the information provided by you.  Thank you for staying with Bender Realty!

name: Sheila Hayes
text: Love using Bender. We have always had great service. So helpful everytime.

name: Dalton Roberson
text: My whole family loves this place! We go there every summer!

name: Greg Allison
text: The ladies are amazing! From Greg with 1 G. 😁

name: Jordan Ashley
text: Excellent service adminustered here.

name: David Storey
text: Great for family camping

name: GARY Busby
text: Great place

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your stay!  Be sure to call Bender Vacation Rentals when you are ready for your next Gulf Coast getaway!

name: Uriel Matos Matos
text:
(Translated by Google) I love him

(Original)
Lo Amo

name: Julie E
text: Such a great house in a great location. It was very clean when we arrived, the kitchen was stocked with everything you need at the beach. There is both a Keurig style and regular coffee pot style coffee makers. We will definitely be returning.

name: Patrick Reed
text: Spacious house with a ton of outdoor lounging space with a dock in the back on the back bay and only a short walk from the beach. Lots of charm inside with updated amenities and great furniture. Four bedrooms with five beds and a pull out couch and three bathrooms.  We stay here every Memorial Day and look forward to continuing the tradition.

name: K. Allen Foster
text: This is a wonderful, very comfortable property that is very well maintained and appointed. The rental management go to great lengths to care for everything imaginable.

name: Kenneth Floyd
text: Very nice place. Right on the beach. The house needs a few updates and repairs however, we enjoyed our stay. It was a total of 27 of us. The Floyd family enjoyed the house. By the way Erica Sandpiper sits right on a private beach, with a private pool. We enjoyed the house from 8/1/20 until 8/8/20. Would definitely stay there again.

name: Kimberly Boykin
text: Worked out really well for our family

name: Tweet Flo (Tweet)
text:
Thinking of you, Erica's Sandpiper and Family!!! We hope that you escaped the bad weather over the last few months with little to no damage. Our hearts hurt seeing the devastation around the community. We're looking forward to planning our next vacation.

On a happier note, I'd like to share our experience with the rest of the Google Community.

Everyone, in all 6 of our families, enjoyed our stay at Erica's Sandpiper during the 1st week of August 2020, during Covid-19. The experience was beyond what we imagined when we first started our family vacation planning. We can tell that there is a lot of love surrounding this house.
Although we didn't use many of the extra gadgets available, we did notice the variety and how well kept these items were. I was shocked to see the sparkling new utensils in the drawer. I certainly didn't expect to find that in a beach house.  The 2 refrigerators were definitely a necessity. They got filled up within the 1st hour we were there. The 2 dining rooms made it very comfortable for everyone to enjoy their meals.

We loved having the pool option with chairs and tables under the house. It was the perfect size for our family and the depth of the pool allowed us to sit back and relax when the kids took over. The outside shower was a fabulous idea. I looked forward to that after leaving the beach and realized I was carrying half of the ocean's sand back to the house with me. 😉

The unlimited access to the beach with only our family surrounding us was definitely an added bonus. We didn't have to "fight" with others over space. I don't think we'll ever be able to return to another beach after being spoiled with our private area.
I found it interesting to see who the pool lovers and beach lovers were. Being able to go between the two gave everyone lots to do throughout the day.

Many of us took advantage of the deck. So many different things to see: dolphins, family members swimming, waves crashing, sunrise and sunset, special red colored moons and lots of stars. Some of looked forward to just sitting out there for some quiet time at different times of the day. Very relaxing.

We were able to purchase 2 charcoal grills at $20 each from Walmart, which allowed us to have our BBQ style family dinners. My sister also cooked pizzas on the grills!!!

The house was the perfect size for our family. There was plenty of room to just walk around on the inside and for the kids to travel around to visit different family members in different rooms. I never felt smothered even at full capacity. We used every room and enjoyed all of the televisions.
Having a bathroom in EVERY room was a life saver. Such a marvelous idea!!! The fans in the room were greatly appreciated as well as allowing us to control the temperature in both sections of the house. We learned who the hot bodied and freezing bodied people were very quickly.
We had the chance to chat with the neighbors. They were extremely nice. In fact, we found that most of our experiences with visitors and locals were very pleasant. Prior to our departure, we had a very special delivery from Erica's Sandpiper's owner, CHEESECAKE!!! What a very kind gesture and a nice surprise.

I know we all would love to visit Erica's Sandpiper again or venture to one of your other houses. We'll definitely consider returning on our next visit to the Gulf Shores. Thank you for allowing us to make memories in your lovely home!

Sincerely,
J. Floyd and the Rest of the Floyd Family

name: Susan Morrison
text: If you are thinking about booking this, just go ahead and do it! It was fantastic!

name: Elizabeth McGee
text:
We had our wedding there! It was a great place to host so many people! Maintenance was quick to respond to fix storm damage and other issues that occurred when we first got there! I didn't have to get married with siding missing from the house.

I will say though, a little more attention to detail in the upkeep (deck is full of nails that are not well hammered in) and it could have been better cleaned before we got there. The pictures on the website need to be updated as well! Then it would be 5 star for sure! However, the other definitely makes up for it! We would definitely stay there again!

name: Tracy Clark
text: The house was less than clean. Walls were dirty, floors were dirty, hair and a dirty band aid found in one sink. 2 refrigerators neither with a working ice maker. In the master bedroom there was electrical tape all around the sliding door and the blinds didn’t open and the door didn’t lock.  One of the bigger televisions is not hooked up to the cable  There were no blankets on any of the beds. The ones that were brought to us were horrible. Think hospital blankets but thinner. The owner locks the thermostat at 72. This house was never cool. We were there the first week of October. I can’t imagine what June or July would be like. The decking had nails that were popped up every where. If you are looking for amenities that match the cost you are in the wrong place. Keep searching and spend your vacation dollars elsewhere. The 5 star rental price doesn’t deliver 5 star amenities.

name: Shiree Wilson
text: What a wonderful stay. My husband and I went for a week for my birthday and it was exactly what we were looking for. Cozy, quiet, and adorable. Across the street from the beach, a small grocery store a block away, you couldn't really ask for more. The host was responsive and friendly for any questions I had. I will be returning here in the future.

name: Annette Sundholm
text: Bad weekend .. Weather !! Pier closed for repairs . nothing much to do cut vacation short and went home..

resp.text:
Sorry you had bad weather for your vacation. I'm also sorry you gave my property a poor review when you weren't even a registered guest with us. My guests booked through Airbnb and remained throughout their vacations.

To see real reviews (5 star) of our properties by real guests, please visit us on Airbnb, listing numbers 27468129 and 5811350.

name: Sandra Murdock
text: Gulf shores is a great place to stay if you like short walks on the beach because every 500 ft is another private beach. If you like a beach that's crowded it's awesome. If you don't want to fish it's great. If you like to spend outrageous prices for a place to stay or food this is the place for you!!!

resp.text: This person was not a guest at Gone Coastal at Sea & Sun in Gulf Shores. To see reviews by actual registered guests, visit our listing at Airbnb.com.

name: T Jordan
text: Served all our purposes. The air works great, lots of hot water, the place is clean and all the appliances work.Good location to the beach. But it could use some updates. Especially the couch.

resp.text: The guest leaving this review did not stay at Gone Coastal at Sea & Sun in Gulf Shores. The unit does not have a couch, and we are continually making improvements . To see reviews by actual registered guests, please visit our listing at Airbnb.com.

name: Sarah Lewis Hodge
text: Me and my fiance stayed here last year to get married on the beach.  We both loved it here.  Nice owners and clean rooms and very close walk to the beach.  We would definitely stay here again!

resp.text: So happy you enjoyed your time in our beach home! We appreciate great guests and thoughtful reviews. We look forward to accommodating you and your husband on future travels. Here's to a great marriage and a very happy life together! - Laurel

name: Daniel Johnson
text: Saw dolphins saw a crab there is an arcade named fat daddy shrimp basket I amazing it was just awesome

name: Jeremy Mccarter
text: Clean and really nice place as always

name: Dale Jackson
text: Clean , affordable, and conveniently located.

name: Tim Randall
text: Love this place

resp.text: Thank you for your five-star review! We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again. Have a great summer!

name: Kim M
text: Never mind.

resp.text: Who are you?

name: Simon Ranagan
text:
I found Dave on accident while looking for a place to stay on super short notice.  Not only did he personally call me to ensure everything went smoothly with renting, he continued to be personally involved in my stay, routinely checking to make sure I had everything I needed and was comfortable.  The few times I had any issues, like a small incident with the city dumping tree trimmings where I would park, he was super responsive and helpful in resolving the issue almost immediately.

The house itself was great and the location was super convenient.  It was a less than 10 minute drive to downtown, grocery stores, and the mall by exit ten, but also a quiet enough neighborhood that I could feel at home at the end of my day.  It was also a two block walk to Lakebottom Park, which really can't be beat.

Probably the best part of my experience with renting from Dave though, was that he is 100% serious about looking out for people who have rented from him.  While moving to a new duty station, I contacted him asking if he wouldn't mind being a reference on a lease application.  He had the reference forms filled out and sent back to me just a couple hours later.  He is seriously awesome.

If I'm every back in the Columbus area again, he is the first person I would contact to rent from, without hesitation.

resp.text: It was my pleasure to host you Simon, good luck to you with everything. -Dave

text: I enjoyed  working with Dave at Going Places. He is very helpful, understanding, and strives to assist renters in every way possible! 5/5 stars for sure! Would give more if I could! Thanks again for all your hard work!

name: Drew Brewer
text:
This place may be nice and all and I’m sure your looking through the reviews if this is a good place to stay. First things first go ahead and save yourself from endearing a horrible experience.

I booked this room for my soon to be wife’s company’s brand rep photo shoot. We checked in and we all bought parking passes and everything they required. Got to the room and boom right off the bat the pullout bed was completely broken, the ice make was making loud sounds and did not produce one ice cube, the screen door was hanging by a tread about to fall off the balcony. I messaged them about theses things the day we got here and did not get a reply!

Well things got worse. We had an extra girl coming and she got here a few nights after our first nights stay. She arrived at 1 in the morning the guard waved her through so she parked and slept until they had to be at a photo shoot early in the morning at sea side (3 hours away) well before she got back here car had a boot on it and two tickets. No warnings just two tickets and a boot. Less then 20 hours and boom they hit her with this and a $250 fine. We talked to the mannager the next day and he was rude and could careless. Had the guard been doing his job and actually checked to see if she had a parking pass non of this would of happened!

This entire say was a big bust and couldn’t of gotten any worse!

Find a place that wants you to stay there and that will treat you with respect and not be rude and ruthless about the parking situation I mean I understand why they have to be strict but right now with COVID-19 going on there’s tones of empty parking spots and they were not hurting on parking spots!

Very dissatisfied will not recommend this to anyone. If you stay here your crazy!

resp.text: Drew, we are so sorry to hear about your recent visit. After looking into the situation our management team has determined you did not book through us at Brett/Robinson Vacations as the unit & situation described is not part of our rental program. We agree this sounds like a very frustrating station,  and it is our hope you will consider booking with us at Brett/Robinson in the future. We highly value our guest's choice to vacation with us, and have dedicated staff members in our call center who are here to help you find the best unit on the coast for your specific needs and desires. Please give us a call at 1-800-211-7892.We hope to welcome  you back soon!
