The owners of the units are actually the ones that handle deep cleans of rugs, carpets, furniture, etc at the end of the summer season due to wear and tear of summer guests. Unfortunately, the owner of your unit just has not been able to do this for your unit yet. We apologize that the quality of the unit was not up to par for your stay this year.

name: J Minniear
text: We booked a stay at one of their condos.  Nothing in the description stated that the facility was under construction. A week after booking we received a text message to call regarding the reservation. They stated that we needed to sign a waiver because the building was under construction and some amenities, including the pool may not be available. We asked why this was not stated in the listing description and they said it was because we used VRBO to book. Needless to say, we cancelled.

resp.text: We are so sorry for this! The past few months have been very hard on us in our little beach town after Hurricane Sally. As a local business, many of our employees were directly impacted by this terrible storm as well. Unfortunately, many condo buildings are still working on construction projects and working with insurance claims, red tape, and changes of construction schedules - not to mention working around the weather. All of this construction is being handled by the condo buildings and the HOAs of those buildings. Due to the ever-changing construction schedules out of our control, we are not able to include it in the descriptions of the condos we manage. However, we have in our records that you only booked your condo yesterday, and our team reached out immediately to let you know of the potential construction at your condo at the time of your stay. We did this so you would have the opportunity to reschedule somewhere else should you choose.

name: Marcus Vidrine
text: Gave it two stars because we had a great time in Orange Beach, but the condo wasn't what I expected. First got there the kitchen smelled like old alcohol on the floor, there was no curtain on the door going out to the balcony and they only had two wash clothes in the bathrooms one for each bathroom for six people and when we asked for a couple more they said that's all we're allowed to get. Overall we had a great time at the beach but as for Liquid Life, I'll be using using another rental company.

resp.text: We are so sorry you feel this way, Marcus! We would love the chance to give you a better experience at the beach on your next Gulf Coast vacation.

name: Brett Hughes
text:
Sorry not only was the place gorgeous customer service and text responsiveness was excellent!
The master bedroom in condo 614 of The Palms  Faced the ocean Which made it a great place to spend 4 days.
Balcony is huge.
Will stay again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Brett! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation.

name: Kim Taylor
text: We were very impressed with this Condo. Beautiful view, great beach access and beautiful pool. Everything was wonderful. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back as well as recommend to our friends and family.  Hope to make this a yearly vacation!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Kim! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Ashley Janes
text: Just left from our beach vacation in Orange Beach! We stayed at Pelican pointe, and we had a corner condo. The balcony was SO BIG and wrapped around the condo. Every room had a door to the balcony as well. The property is right on the beach, so we had no issues going back and forth from the condo for food and to relax. The condo is perfect for a family. There’s a king bed, a queen, and 2 twin beds. There might also be a pull out bed, but I’m not sure. We had an awesome time, and we will definitely be back to visit!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Ashley! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Gerard Dickneite
text: The condo was very nice and spacious for our stay.  The beach was awesome and no problems with social distancing.  Upon arrival, our condo was dirtier than expected with the amount of sand on the floods and rugs, but Liquid Life did offer to send cleaning staff to do further cleaning. By booking direct with Liquid Life we were able to save some $$ on booking.  Thanks.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Gerard! We are glad you were able to work with our team in sending someone to help with the sand. We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the beach!

name: Orellana Rauda
text:
The condo #503 was very welcoming and felt like home until you do a walk through.
Pros:
*New appliances very well kept
*Organized living and kitchen
*Clean patio

Conns:
*Bed was the worst I've ever laid on. (I couldn't tell if I was laying in a hammock or a mattress, my son's (4yr) slightest movement would rock the whole bed side to side, pillows all shifted and not evenly spread.
* the bathrooms smell like mildew,  the s H over curtains we're wrinkled and smell so bad like they washed them and let them sat in a bucket wet for days proline to hanging in bathroom.
* not enough linen

Overall it was ok, there could be better places for the same price.

resp.text: Orellana, we are glad you enjoyed your stay. Although the owners pick out their own bedding, we would have happily addressed your other concerns during your stay. We do not see where you reported any issues, however. We would love the chance to give you a better experience for your next beach vacation!

name: Steve “Speed” Nowell
text: Great location, amenities were as expected and staff was friendly and helpful on all questions.  Other than a dishwasher not able to wash the dishes on the way out and a toilet tank flapper not quite right we had a perfect stay (simple fixes).  It was very clean and ready for us when we arrived.  Will be back for a perfect 5 star stay next time!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Steve! We are so glad you enjoy your beach vacation with Liquid Life. We are so sorry for your minor maintenance issues, but our team is fixing these on the unit as we speak. We look forward to helping you book your next visit!

name: Sarah Dillard
text:
$984 spent and only provided ONE cheap roll of single ply toilet paper for a condo that sleeps 6!

There were only two face cloths provided as well, again for a place that sleeps 6. I expect limited towels and trash bags but one roll of toilet paper for a 4 night stay is CHEAP!

I had to contact the rental company two days prior to arriving because I never received check in or parking instructions. I received an email one day prior which did not include parking details. Again, I had to reach out to the rental company. But yet I received unwanted spam email and text offers to start my trip earlier or extend it.

The company also never bothered to update their checkout instructions left on the table which list a DIFFERENT check out time and had the previous rental property manager's contact information. I can't imagine how many unnecessary calls the previous manager has received because of that oversight.

Stop cheaping out on the small things (paper towels, toilet paper, trash bags, and dish soap).

resp.text: Sarah,  The starter packets of paper goods are standard for the entire condo rental industry.  This post is more about the difference between staying in a full service hotel, vs a vacation rental property.  The win, is you have a full condo with kitchen and over 1100 sq ft of space of Gulf Front views.   Hotel rooms are usually 400 sq ft and they provide what you are looking for in paper goods.   We hope it in the future you will enjoy the extra space and features of the condo, often at the same or lower price than a hotel room.  Best Wishes

name: Sara Metroka
text: The condo was exactly as pictured. Lots of space and seating for our family, with an awesome view from the balcony. Kitchen was fully stocked with crockpot, pans, utensils, everything we could need for the week (and we cooked in most nights)! Would absolutely stay here again!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sara! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next visit to the Gulf Coast!

name: Susan Fowlkes
text: Thank you liquid life for providing a great condo for our 2020 Family trip. Summerhouse 504B was clean, everything worked properly, has nice decor and an awesome view!  Liquid life's communication was excellent. We will use y'all again.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Susan! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to you visiting the Gulf Coast again!

name: Gib Ford
text: We stayed at the Palms in Orange Beach( actually we leave tomorrow). Our rental condo is spacious, clean, well appointed and just beautiful. Liquid Life has made it all easy. We are a party of 6, old friends, who last vacationed together in 1977. We came together again 43 years later for this trip. We will come back next year!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Gib! We are so glad we were able to provide a great place for your friends to reunite again! We look forward to helping you book next year's trip as well!

name: JellyRoll6907
text: We were very pleased with this condo. The decor is gorgeous with a luxury feel. The location is near numerous grocery stores and restaurants. Check in was a breeze. The complex as a whole was a nice family environment. Vacationing during COVID was not as bad as we expected. We would just wait for the next elevator and most everyone was respectful with keeping distance in pool. It really was pleasant and would return without question.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Terrah Emmons
text: We had a great time. The condo was perfect and we adore the patio!! The owner had video games and board games so that was a plus on rainy days. The decor was pretty and comfortable. We loved the shower in the master as well as the extra ice maker in the wet bar. We will be staying again.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Terrah! We love this condo as well :) We are so glad you had a great time!

name: Jenny Crowe
text:
The Good: The condo we stayed in, Caribe 914C, was bright and spacious, and only showed minimum everyday wear and tear.  The balcony is large with a view of the resort entrance and of the beach. We enjoyed drinking our coffee and eating our breakfast on the balcony each morning. The washer and dryer really came in handy for towels and swimwear and the icemaker was super convenient for making big pitchers of ice water. We had a couple of concerns of which I called Liquid Life about, and they were quick to resolve these issues. Of major concern was that the A/C was not working at all when we arrived, but Liquid Life got maintenance to the condo within a couple of hours and that problem was resolved.

The not so Good: The cleaning staff needs careful monitoring. For the most part, the condo was clean, but there were a couple of glaring issues. The living room furniture is of cloth upholstery and had stains which should be treated with upholstery cleaner by the cleaning staff. There was also some sort of child's cereal, looked like Fruity Pebbles, scattered on the living room sectional and also under the balcony dining table, which I cleaned up. The bedspread in one of the guest bedrooms had a fairly long brown streak running across it. I called Liquid Life and they notified housekeeping to come change out all of the linens in that particular room.

I am giving this condo a four out of five rating only because of the cleaning issues. Had the condo been cleaned properly, I would have easily given it a five. I have no complaints about Liquid Life Vacation Rentals. They took my concerns seriously and made everything right for us. I would, however,  like to see them follow up on the cleaning staff in the future. But, having said all that, I would definitely stay in this condo again, and I would definitely book through Liquid Life again.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Jenny! We always love to hear guest feedback and the ways in which we can improve the entire experience for our guests. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, and we look forward to helping you book your next vacation!

name: Rhonda Holden
text: Absolutely amazing trip! We stayed at Lighthouse in Gulf shores and the condo was perfect! Super clean and had everything we needed! 2 beautiful pools and easy to get to the beach with all our stuff! We'll definitely use Liquid Life to book our next trip!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Rhonda! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Veronica Drumheller
text: We love Turquoise Place. Unit 1601C was gorgeous and we enjoyed our stay as usual. We were checked on via text and any issues were taken care of promptly. Great stay!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Veronica! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Ginger Hattaway
text: My husband and I spent seven lovely days with our 2 grown children, their husbands, and our  4 grandchildren ages 6 weeks, 2, 4, and 9 at Turquoise Place.  The venue was amazing....short access to the beach, all appliances worked, pool was great, and the weather was perfect.  We created great family memories that will be cherished for a lifetime!!  Thank you for a easy wonderful week!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review, Ginger! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life at our beautiful Turquoise Place condo. We look forward to helping you book your next stay at the beach!

name: Christopher Hemmer
text: Very nice condo. Clean. Beachfront with beautiful ocean views. Less busy than typical high rise units. Very responsive when scheduling and processing rental. One suggestion is to include entry gate code with information package prior to arrival ( we had to call to get gate code) but worked out quickly.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Christopher! We appreciate your feedback regarding your gate code. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: CARY LEE NEAL
text: Stayed in unit 1907 Phoenix West.  Unit was very clean.  Lots of towels.  4 bathrooms definitely a plus.  Linens and furniture needs updates.   Overall room quality was great. Gulf-view with lazy river was nice.   Elevators were slow with high waits times during high traffic times and had to wait for several rounds of elevators sometimes.  But the most frustrating point staying here is parking... they only allowed 2 parking passes for a 3 bedroom, sleeping 10.  It’s hard to fit 10 people, with all Luggage and necessities to bring to a condo in 2 vehicles.  It also cost $35 for a parking pass.  There is NO other parking anywhere... this would deter me from coming back here.   They absolutely would NOT sell me another parking pass.  Good luck!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Cary! We are glad you enjoyed your stay. Unfortunately, the elevators and parking are all managed by the HOA at the complex buildings. We wish we could help! We will be sure to pass your comments along to them, however. We hope to see you again next time you're at the beach!

name: Elizabeth Arnold
text: We stayed at Summerchase, which is in a great location for spending the days at the beach and going out to eat at night. The unit was a little run down as far as paint and furniture, but we didn’t spend a lot of time inside. Before our stay, the rental company called to let me know the dryer was not working, but that they had a work order in for it to be fixed. A few days into our stay, the dryer was still not fixed, so they said they would put in another work order. The dryer never got fixed, which made it difficult for us because we have 4 kids and it would have been helpful to be able to wash and dry clothes, towels, and suits.  Being a large rental company, I assumed they could fix or replace it quickly, but that was not the case.

resp.text: We are so sorry we were unable to get your dryer fixed during your stay, Elizabeth! Unfortunately, some maintenance issues have to be taken care of by specialty companies, and we are at the mercy of their schedules. We hope you were still able to enjoy your beach vacation!

name: hannamarie1991
text:
We stayed in a condo at The Palms in Orange Beach, AL for 6 days. It was a lot of money to spend to listen to construction in the building the whole time, sand in the bed sheets BEFORE anyone slept in them, cabinets in need of repair, the whole place needing a good cleaning, killing roaches and gnats, and uncomfortable furniture and beds. Also, don’t plan on washing/drying anything within about 5 hours if you needing it because you have to run the dryer at least 3 times through. We called Liquid Life to address the issue and get a partial refund For the major inconvenience. They acted like they didn’t care at all and did nothing to solve the issues we were having with our stay. We will never stay at any condo manager by Liquid Life and we don’t recommend anyone we care about use them either. Their customer service is by far some of the worst most uncaring that I’ve ever dealt with. Avoid them at all costs!

Edit: we have video where you can clearly hear the unit across from us chiseling up tile with heavy machinery. We’ve been looking at them all week. We can come show you in person if you like to keep deleting our negative Reviews.

resp.text: We are sorry you feel this way Hanna. Our team has checked with on-site security and the HOA of the condo complex you were staying in, and there is no construction in your building at this time nor was there during your stay. The HOA even checked with the surrounding units, and they have not complained nor reported anything about construction. This is why you were not given a refund by our team. We care very much about the happiness of our guests, and unfortunately, this case did not warrant a refund. None of the other issues you stated in this review were reported to our team, and we would have gladly sent housekeeping or maintenance to help with these had we been informed about them.

name: Amanda Canape
text: We stayed at Seawind 1207 for a Girls/Mom trip. The place was clean very spacious and the view was fabulous! Had no problems at all and the staff was VERY friendly and helpful.  Elevator security guys were all very friendly- our favorite was Bill! Would definitely stay here again! Also close to everything.

resp.text: Thank you, Amanda! We are so glad you had such a great time at our Seawind condo! We love it as well! We look forward to helping you book your next stay with us.

name: Jo Baudoin
text:
Though it is a difficult time we were not well informed of unnecessary limits at Turquoise.  In that it is one of the higher end buildings and was kept well cleaned there was little else to lure us to return at the price differential.  No lounge chairs at our pool due to lack of staff to put them back out which were removed due to storms that had long passed. Chairs at the other pool were in place as well as the beach front chairs and umbrellas which makes little sense.  The hot tub being turned off to Covid was understandable but the tarp covering it and the barricades  in disarray made it seem the entire indoor pool was shut down which was not true but certainly not inviting to enjoy the remaining  area. The large waterfalls outside also shut down with no explanation.
Though the gym was open there were no free weights due to Covid which also makes little sense as the machines and those weights were accessible. The ice maker in our condo was broken and it was suggested we leave to buy our own and be reimbursed as the rental agent was short staffed. Overall we did enjoy the condo itself but are not pleased with the renal management company nor the development.

resp.text: We are so sorry for these inconveniences during your stay, Jo! Unfortunately, these are all issues handled by Turquoise Place themselves, and they do not inform us when they do minor things like these. So we were unable to provide that information to you, as we did not know ourselves. We do hope that you were able to still enjoy your beach vacation!

name: Walinda Thompson
text: My husband and I stayed at Summerchase in 1102 Sept. 14-17 which was beautiful, but the floors were not clean. Before we ever went down we called twice to get our dates changed due to Hurricane Sally looming. We were told no and that if we did not show we just lost our money. Once at the condo the hurricane hit and we had no contact with anyone from Liquid Life even when we called the emergency number. We had no power and had been in the stair well due to fire alarms going off during the storm, then we get a text telling us to leave, but we couldn’t because we had a busted windshield. You didn’t know that because you didn’t answer any phone call we made to you. We were left to figure it all out for ourselves even though you said someone would answer if we had any problems. Then we wake up to no water and no elevators and still no help from you. We couldn’t even open the storm shades after the storm to get air in the condo. You should be ashamed you pretty much forced us to come down because we didn’t want to lose the money (we were not offered trip insurance when we booked- we talked to others that this was the same case for them) then just abandon us not knowing what to do with a hurricane hitting.

resp.text: Walinda, we are so incredibly sorry this happened to you. As all of our local authorities were telling us, Hurricane Sally was absolutely not expected to hit us in this way nor impact our beach town in the way that is has. Every team member we have was in the dark and our phones went down (and are still down) due to the storm. We now only have two team members working through the hundreds of guests we had staying with us and coming in the upcoming days to contact you regarding refunds. We promise you will be taken care of. We are trying our best to get to everyone as quickly as possible.

name: Shelby Williams
text: Place had construction the whole time!! Also sheets were not cleaned. Had sand in the beds from previous guest. When we talked to the manager she did not seem to care. DO NOT USE THESE PEOPLE.. *EDIT: I see you say there was no construction anywhere around then why do I have a video of it. They are/were ripping up tiles. I’ll gladly send or post it for you if you’d like. :)

resp.text: We are sorry you feel this way Shelby. As we responded to your friend, our team has checked with on-site security and the HOA of the condo complex you were staying in, and there is no construction in your building at this time nor was there during your stay. The HOA even checked with the surrounding units, and they have not complained nor reported anything about construction. This is why you were not given a refund by our team. We care very much about the happiness of our guests, and unfortunately, this case did not warrant a refund. None of the other issues you stated in this review were reported to our team, and we would have gladly sent housekeeping or maintenance to help with these had we been informed about them.

name: Dixxie B
text: The condo was nice, the coffeemaker was broken, they were supposed to fix it, they never did, even after calling twice; therefore we had no coffee. Beautiful view from the Caribe 9th floor condo though. One bed was comfortable, the other two were too firm, but the condo is beautifully decorated.

resp.text: Thank you so much, CG! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We are so sorry about your coffee pot and will absolutely follow up with our maintenance team to see what happened. We look forward to helping you book your next visit to the Gulf Coast!

name: Amy Euting
text: The rental experience was very smooth. The team at Liquid Life were very responsive and thorough in answering questions. My only complaint was the cleanliness of the condo. There was a build up of sand in the showers (like they were never touched with any cleaner) and pieces of food on the area rug (like it was never vacuumed). Overall,  it was a great trip and everyone at Liquid Life was wonderful!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Amy! We greatly appreciate your feedback and will be sure to pass that message along to the correct managers for you. We are so glad you enjoyed your beach vacation!

name: Angela Watson
text: Conveniently doesn’t tell you about the non refundable charges until after you cancel and then when I told them the person I talked to never told me about it they said that she’s the only person that doesn’t have her calls recorded so they can’t prove that. They are liars.

name: Amy May
text:
Condo was very clean, well stocked kitchen, and beautiful!  The beds were so comfortable. The balcony had the best views and furniture.
We had a girls trip and loved every part of it!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Amy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to you visiting the Gulf Coast again!

name: Sharonica Phillips
text: Though I'm not the one to complain, I expected quite a bit for the price I paid. To start, the parking at this place is slim to none. There are more living quarters than parking.....horrible. There seems to be alot of small things wrong with the unit. The cabinets, the shower heads, the ironing board, the blinds all need to be repaired. There aren't a whole lot of pots and pans to choose from. Not a bad stay but a few things need some attention. However, I did enjoy the balcony, the indoor pool when it was raining and the easy access to the beach.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Sharonica! We take all guest suggestions seriously. Although there is not much we can do to improve parking (as this is all handled by the actual building complex itself), we will be sure to pass along your upgrade suggestions for the unit to the owner. Thanks again, and we look forward to helping you book your next stay at the beach!

name: Vickie D
text:
Speaking to Becky and her team this morning has been an absolute pleasure and great experience. Very courteous, kind, friendly, helpful!!!! My family can not wait to spend our vacation at one of their properties. She and her staff made it easy for me to rent since I am not tech savy and accommodated our needs. Great job and keep up the awesome work you and your team are doing. Kindness and compassion will take you far in life!
Thank you!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your ind review, Vickie! Our team was happy to help, and we look forward to hosting you for your vacation at the beach!

name: Lauren Simmons
text: We had a wonderful experience at Regency Isle Condo Unit 309. It was decorated so beautifully and very accommodating to guests. We loved the huge balcony and how clean everything was. The elevator access was quick and smooth which is a huge plus for someone that doesn’t like elevators. All of the decor and furniture was new and comfortable. We loved the couch in the living room and all of the bright and fun accents. I can’t leave out the master bathroom either because it is so nice and I loved all the mirrors and counter space.  We didn’t want to leave! Thanks for such a wonderful stay in Orange Beach. We will be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Lauren! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Regency Isle. We are excited to help you plan your next trip to the beach!

name: Katelyn Youngsma
text: This place is great! The view from the balcony is incredible! It’s right on the beach and is on the end which makes it way less crowded! Very clean and nice place. We loved our stay and would highly recommend it to anyone staying in Gulf Shores!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Katelyn! We are so glad you enjoyed your beach vacation with Liquid Life & look forward to helping you book your next stay.

name: Brittany Pennebaker
text: This has been the BEST EXPERIENCE!!! Wonderful place very responsive! Beautiful view!! Neat place for kids love love love!!! We will definitely be back! Have nothing bad to say 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

resp.text: Thank you, Brittany! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life! We love hearing about guests' experiences at our beautiful beaches. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Patricia Cochran
text:
The condo was nice and had what we needed to have a fun family vacation. However, sheets were not included for the fold out couch. We made do with a mattress cover and a duvet topper. The blinds in the living area were designed to close but, even after contacting Liquid Life twice, a request for a remote to lose the blinds was ignored. The couple sleeping there were awakened at daylight each morning!
The remote to turn the light/fan off in the front bedroom was missing a battery. When I requested a battery the remote was just removed...so we couldn’t turn the overhead light on again. In the day time that was fine but at night one little lamp didn’t provide enough light.
We love Orange Beach and were disappointed in these inconveniences!

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your stay in Orange Beach, Patrica. We are, however, deeply sorry for your inconveniences during your stay! We will be reaching out to our team to inform them of your experiences to help with future guests. We hope that you were still able to enjoy your stay, and we hope you help you book your next beach vacation.

name: Carrie Easterling
text: If I could give a zero I would.  We were booked and excited for our spring break there.  We go every year for our girls softball tournament.  But this year it was sadly cancelled due to a GLOBAL PANDEMIC and I was happy with the response that we would be able to re book with a 20% discount once the beaches opened back up.  We were just going to use it for the tourney next year.  But today in the mail I received a check from them.  It was for $700 less than what I paid.  So instead of getting to rebook and get a 20% refund.  They are just keeping $700 of my money...I guess they feel they need it more than their loyal guests due during this trying time in the world right now.  Way to go liquid life.  I have a feeling you guys are losing several loyal guests.  Good to see what kind of company you are before I spend another dime there.

resp.text:
Hi Carrie,

Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry for the inconvenience this might have caused you and your family’s plans for a beach vacation. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Leslie Smith
text: This is a very nicely decorated condo with awesome access right by the elevator.  A/C is nice & cold. Everything you need is in the kitchen. The shower is nice & warm & drains well. However, the bed is very uncomfortable!!! The top bunk looks to be falling into the bottom bunk. The walls are dirty (especially in the kitchen & by the sliding door) & the 2 cloth chairs have an odor to them. The ceiling is moldy looking in spots & sliding door is difficult to close.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Leslie! We are glad you enjoyed your stay, and we will be sure to share your suggestions for the condo with the owner. Thanks again!

name: Dawn McBee
text:
Check in was extremely easy. Liquid Life kept us very informed. Condo was extremely clean. Kitchen had everything we needed. Elevator ran smoothly. Had plenty of room for the four of us.
I would recommend #31 at The Breakers and recommend Liquid Life Realty. I’ve rented with them 2 years in a row and have had no problems. Had a wonderful time!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Dawn! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life! We love The Breakers as well! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Lisa Savage
text: Great location and nice condo! Clean but maintenance was slow to respond when called. Indoor pool and hot tubs were not available as advertised. Pools and beach were very nice. Good stay until we were hustled out the last morning before checkout time. Will try somewhere else next time.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback on your stay, Lisa! We apologize about the delay with maintenance. Sometimes our team has to prioritize the high-level issues first, and that can cause a delay. We are, however, glad that we were able to resolve your issues. Unfortunately, many pools and hot tubs are closed (by the complex and HOA of the building) due to COVID, and we have urged everyone to check with us about what is open before booking (since we have to constantly follow up with the opening and closing of pools for 350 properties along the coast.) We are glad that you enjoyed your condo, the pools and the beach!

name: Chris Davis
text: We just returned from an epic family vacation at a Liquid Life property on the beach in Orange Beach, AL.The condo was impeccable and it had everything we needed and more. My 3 kids had the time of their life. Liquid Life's communication with me was seamless through email and text messages and they made checking in and out a breeze allowing me to focus on my family instead of the technicalities of using a rental property. I can't recommend them enough. I am already planning our next trip.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, Chris! Thank you so much for your kind review about your stay. We look forward to helping you book your next vacation at the beach!

name: Amy Sapia
text:
Caribe is always so nice, but this time the room was just O.K. When we arrived the check in was easy , per usual. When we got to our room we were disappointed in the cleanliness and up keep of this room.C713
Everything was just dirty . Bathtubs weren’t  cleaned , the vent in the master wasn’t there and all debris from where they were working was
In the tub. They had a large fan in the room upon arrival- which makes me think they were working right  before we got there and forgot to remove it .  The carpets were all very old and had marks all over. Baseboards were missing. We called to let them know and they offered to clean place again . But let’s be honest , no one wants people to clean while your there. Overall great stay because of the pools but next time I’ll do more research on a clean room.

resp.text: We are so sorry for your experience, Amy! We are always more than happy to have someone come out to make things right should you wish during your stay. We are glad you were still able to enjoy your stay!

name: Dan Goodfellow
text: Great condo in a great area! The staff at Liquid Life does a wonderful job and there was no disappointment. This was our third year booking with them and we will definitely be back again soon!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Dan! We love having you visit with is us on the Gulf Coast. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: michelle cash
text:
The place overall was a great place to stay.  There is plenty of room for 9 people, the balcony was great!  Lots of space for everyone to hang out.   We had a plumbing issue and the maintenance crew showed up and got it taken care of.  The tvs were not working and they fixed them too.
The building elevators worked but are slow because of all the traffic in the building.  The outdoor pool was nice, I didn't go to the indoor pool or the gym.  There were carts they supply for hauling our luggage up to the condo and that was a great thing!

The only downfall was the parking.  I have a 3/4 ton truck and parking was limited.  It won't fit up in the upper levels as it is only 6'8" clearance.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Michelle! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life! We will be sure to pass along your suggestion about parking to the complex you stayed in. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Kaylie
text: Let me start by saying my condo was immaculately clean and beautiful! BUT... I was extremely disappointed to find out the inside pool and hot tubs were closed. We also were very disappointed there was not a single extra blanket in the condo. If you get cold, better grab one from home. We also had a “noise complaint” filled on us that led the workers to ring our doorbell at 12:30am. We were all asleep! Well, awake after that. I personally would never stay here again.

resp.text: Thank you for your comments about the cleanliness of your condo! Unfortunately, due to COVID-19, we have had to remove all extra blankets that cannot be laundered between each visitor. We apologize for that inconvenience. We would love for the world to be back to normal, but unfortunately, this is something we must all deal with for now. We apologize for the report being called on you! This type of thing is all handled by the actual condo complex itself, not the rental company. But we hope that you were still able to enjoy your stay on the Gulf Coast!

name: Michael Warden
text: Stayed at Phoenix 10,room 1202 . The room looked very nice but AC didnt work for almost 2 days. Mechanical contractor had to change whole ac unit. No one answerd our emails.No one called and apologized or even offered to stay a extra night with the room not even booked after us. Maintance was just poor. Tub also wouldnt drain.

resp.text: Michael, we are so very sorry about your AC! It looks as though our maintenance director was in communication with you directly on this issue and it was fixed very promptly. Our team sent you a concern form (which is how we offer compensation, etc for issues). So, if that form is filled out, our management team will be in contact with you!

name: Wontywn Montgomery
text: From day one of visiting this office...The owner and his team of associates really demonstrates superb business. They really care about the guests who chooses their properties. You will not be disappointed...I place everything on this

resp.text: Thank you so much, Wontywn!

name: Hunter Cain
text: Love their Seaside Beach & Racquet Club Property

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Hunter! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life!

name: Kim Johnson
text: We just checked in. Our balcony door won’t open. No air in our condo. Called Liquid Life... HOA problem.. won’t move us to another unit. Don’t know when it will be fixed. No phone call to let us know any of this was going on. Though the maintenance guy said we were called. The representative from this place said they were getting around to calling us! Will NEVER book through them again

resp.text: Sorry for your experience, Kim! This is a very unfortunate situation that we are working on with the HOA of your condo. The air in your condo isn't broken, it's simply because the balcony door was opened despite signs that it needed to remain closed temporarily while it is being fixed. Our team is trying their best to take care of this situation for you despite having to have two managers come to your unit due to how our employees were being treated - while they were trying to help resolve these issues for you. Once again, our team is working with the HOA to try our best to resolve these issues for you.

name: Leslie Zeringue
text: Great location. Extremely clean upon arrival. Lovely balcony, comfy beds, overall excellent unit. Phoenix VI has some parking issues, and doesn't seem to have enough elevators for the number of units especially at high traffic times.  We had a wonderful time. Highly recommend this accomodation.

resp.text: Thank you, Leslie! We are grateful that we were able to make your beach vacation the best it can be! We look forward to helping you book your next stay on the Gulf Coast.

name: Tina Thompson
text: Psalms 914- The location of the condo is great- the deck faces to ocean and a beautiful picture. The furniture is in much need of replacing.  It is old and it looks dirty.  The decor on the walls are great and the beds are not comfortable. We have stay at the Psalms in the past and was very pleased.  They  need to upgrade this one.

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your stay, Tina! We will be sure to pass along the suggestions about upgrades to the owner for you!

name: kimberly phillips
text: Me and my family are checking out tomorrow morning. There are 8 of us. We all fit comfortably in had plenty of places for us to sleep. We really have no complaints at all other than running out of toilet paper and no stores around had any at all. Was only left 2 rolls in the room for 4 kids and 4 adults that went by very fast. Other than that we really enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back next year I recommend this to anyone wanting to stay and not worried about a small walk to the beach. Love love love it!!!!! Very beautiful place.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Kimberly! We are so sorry about the toilet paper (this is a strange time 😜) but we are so glad you enjoyed your stay! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Belinda Swafford
text:
Pros:
View was beautiful and awesome from balcony, ocean, beach and weather couldn’t have been any better. This part made our trip much more enjoyable!
4 - Showers on boardwalk coming from beach was a great convenience coming off beach.
Condo plenty of room. Price not bad.

Cons:
Building older and in need of many repairs. Pool concrete breaking off in several places around pool edge area. HotTub wasn’t cleaned the whole week. Solution/Chemicals were put in but not cleaned around walls or floor and seats.
Concrete that surrounds pool decking dirty- needs pressure washing. No bathrooms or showers at pool area.
Showers on boardwalk coming from beach.
Building only has two elevators and they just happened to have been in repair several hours one or days that we needed them. Needless to say I’m out of shape to climb to 6 flights of stairs.
Elevator ‘a were very hot inside no fans in them.
Condo- in need of a good cleaning, and several repairs need to be done.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Belinda! Unfortunately, we only manage the condo you stayed in, not the building. So we are unable to help with the suggestions you have for the building itself, but feel free to notify the complex building themselves about your feedback as well! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us!

name: JHAUN SANSING
text: We booked Four Winds 104 via VRBO for a short family vacation with my husband and 2 small kids. It’s on the 1st level, bear entrance, just steps from the pool, hot tub, and kiddie pool, and beach! Our unit was super CLEAN and perfect for our size! There was plenty of room, plenty of kitchen items, and had washer and dryer so very minimal dirty clothes to bring home! We were able to have most of the morning at the beach and walk right in to the pool for a short dip then off to lunch and nap then back out with ease! My favorite part was the balcony looked right at the pool and beach. This was the best unit we have ever stayed at as far as an all in one!! We hope to be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jhaun! We are glad your stay with Liquid Life was everything you dreamed of. We look forward to helping you book your next stay!

name: Amanda Newcomb
text: We love staying at Crystal Shores West! Liquid Life Vacation Rentals made it easy to book, pay, check in (without going anywhere except straight to the condo), and easy checkout too! We went straight from home to condo! Our condo was clean and comfortable, just as described! Thank you for a great stay!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Amanda! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Ashley Justison
text:
THE PALMS ORANGE BEACH ROOM 415. Walking into the condo it really looked pretty. It was very clean!! It was definitely big enough for my family. The balcony was my our favorite place to hang out since we could fit 10 of us comfortably on it.

Issues started when my son fell through a top bunk onto the bottom bunk. Yes he is fine but if an adult would have been up there the people sleeping underneath could have been hurt. Maintenance came out right away and fixed it but we still weren’t comfortable using the top bunks anymore and had to go purchase air mattresses for the rest of the trip. The dryer is either broke or just needs to be replaced. It takes a few times to get things dried. There isn’t enough towels in the bathrooms for 12 people. We also had a bit of a roach problem in the kitchen. It needs to be updated in the kitchen for sure. My father went to put a spatula away in the drawer and the whole drawer broke and fell on top of his foot. Minor cut but he is fine. The sliding door in the master bedroom isn’t working either. The price for this place was cheap. I was super surprised it was so cheap by looking at the pictures. I think the owners need to do some fixer uppers.

resp.text: Thank you for your suggestions, Ashley! We are, once again, so sorry you had the issues with the bunk beds, and we are so happy no one got hurt. We will be sure to pass along your suggestions to the owner so we can make some upgrades for the future. We hope you enjoyed your stay at the beach!

name: Gina Woodcock
text: Liquid Life made everything so easy from booking until checkout. Thank you for a painless experience! I definitely recommend this company.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Gina! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to you visiting the Gulf Coast again!

name: Emilee Jackson Burdine
text: Super friendly and helpful! We stayed a extra night due to their prompt awareness of a additional night that was available. We will use them again and recommend them! Super fun office also , gift shop inside.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Emilee! You are so glad you had a great vacation experience with Liquid Life! We look forward to helping you book your next stay!

name: Ashton Leppert
text:
The layout and size of the condo was great.  I gave 3 stars because the drains to the bathtub and sink in the master would not drain, which was not a big deal,  but we called to get them fixed and were told maintenance would be there that evening or that morning.  They never came, and we stayed 5 nights.  The pull out couch was broken and worse than sleeping on the floor.  There was only one TV channel that worked,  several lamps with no light bulbs, kitchen facet was loose, and there were no provided coffee filters.
I hope this helps Liquid Life Vacation Rental to provide better service because the condo itself was amazing.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Ashton! We will be sure to report these issues to the owner and our maintenance team so they can be taken care of. We, as always, appreciate the feedback of each guest & use it to improve the experience. Thank you, and we hope to help you book your next stay at the beach!

name: johnny caldwell
text:
Made reservations in a unit that slept 12
Made for 11 in group with 2 being left doubtful.
Call from Ann from Liquid Life informing that sleeper sofa changed out & sleeping accommodations now 10. No problem for us since we have 2 elementary age children who would sleep on air mattress. About 2 weeks later call saying owner would now not rent to 11 people.  Again I said 2 probably would not come but would not honor reservation even for  9 .This was for a 10th floor condo in after Christmas. Was offered a 23th floor condo with different sleeping arrangements which were not practical for us.
Very disappointed in Liquid Life not honoring reservations made months ago. Blamed owner.

resp.text: Hi Johnny, we apologize that your reservation was canceled for 12/26/2020. We contacted you as soon as we knew to let you know that the unit will no longer sleep 11 people, because the owner is having their furniture replaced. We apologize for this inconvenience since you needed a condo that slept 11 people,  and we offered you a full refund for your paid deposit. Unfortunately, we are not legally allowed to over occupy a unit, and the number of people on your reservation would do just that. There is even a chance that the damage done by Hurricane Sally would not have allowed the complex to be open until 2021. We are in the midst of Hurricane Sally clean up on the Gulf Coast, and we are trying our best to still offer the best customer service we can to our guests. We do hope that you will be able to find another condo for your beach vacation, and we wish you and your family the best.

name: Jessica Eagerton
text:
W
We had a condo booked for a week in October thru Liquid Life Rentals. This was our first time going with this particular company. Hurricane Sally hit and devasted Gulf Shores! We called and was going to reschedule our stay til next year but they didn't have the schedule for that far ahead. They kindly cancelled our reservation for us and told us how to get in touch with the travel insurance company. We have always took out the insurance but never had to use it. The travel insurance, Red Sky, was a whole other story. I done the claim on 9/24. I called and they said it could take up to 30 days to hear from the claim. I emailed them and never heard from them by email. I called on 10/2 and 10/14 and was told both times that it was being processed and I would hear from them as soon as a decision had been made. I received and email on 10/16 stating that my claim had been denied. I immediately called and was told since it had been 30 days since the hurricane hit, which was on 9/16, that the 30 days window had expired. It just seems odd how it was exactly 30 days since it hit that I receive the email. After talking with multiple people, including managers, I was just getting the run around and no answers. As I was on the phone with them, I had a missed called. It was Anita from Liquid Life and asked me to call them back. I called and before I could say anything, she said they received notification from Red Sky that our claim had been denied and she was just letting me know that Liquid Life was cutting me a check for the refund amount. This people shows how great of a company this is. Liquid Life was always helpful and made things right even when they didn't have too and they done it on their own. I will be going thru them all the time now for our yearly trips to the Gulf! I know the area is still struggling with the aftermath of Sally but if you decide to travel, please use Liquid Life!!

resp.text: Jessica, we are so glad that we could help make it right for you when your insurance claim was denied. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Audra Grace Naylor
text: This company is so amazing and wonderful. They made my vacation so sun shiney and beautiful! Everyone that I talked to from Liquid Life put up with all of my questions and were very patient and considerate. I will definitely be looking forward to my next vacation with the Liquid Life team.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Audra! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life!

name: Christina Vice
text: Liquid Life was so easy to book with, and they were super easy to communicate with as well.  No long hold times on the phone, and we even texted someone at their local office with questions and they replied right away.  We were disappointed that we had to buy a second parking pass for $33, as 2 passes are typically the norm with other rental companies.  That issue aside, we would book again.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Christina! We are so glad you enjoy your beach vacation with Liquid Life. In regards to your parking pass, we do include one parking pass in the price of your rental. Only additional passes cost extra. Other companies do charge you for your passes, but they do it up front. We just like to give our guests the option to choose if they would like additional passes :) We look forward to helping you book your next visit to the Gulf Coast!

name: Charles Chamblee
text: The condo was very nice with great amenities and a great view. The  condo was clean and well equipped. The only reason that i am not rating 5 stars is due to the mattress on the king bed in the master bedroom. The mattress was very worn and has sunken places on both sides where you sleep. This was reported to Liquid Life the first week of our month long stay and with no response to this problem.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Charles! We appreciate your feedback, and we are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life! We have reported your concerns about the mattress to the owner so they can replace it for future stays. We appreciate your suggestion, and we were happy to pass it along. We look forward to helping you book your next vacation to the beach!

name: Nancy Wimberley
text: Wonderful experience. Our condo was a dream!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Nancy! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Sandy
text: We had a great time here. The condo was clean and roomy.  I would suggest air conditioning in the elevator.  It was so hot in there!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Sandy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us! Unfortunately, the elevator is managed by the complex itself, but we will happily pass along your suggestion to them. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Grant Jacobs
text: The condo was beautifully decorated and just as advertised. Great location very convenient to the beach and local restaurants and businesses. We will definitely stay here again!!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review, Grant! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Joel Thomas
text: We arrived there on Saturday at 3:00p.m.. The paperwork states that 3pm is when you can get into your room unless the cleaning person is still cleaning. I called Liquid Life to let them know we were there and ready to enter the condo. We were told by Liquid Life that the room would be ready at 4:30p.m. and they would give us codes to get in then. At 5:20p.m. I called them back and no one answered. At 5.40 p.m. I finally was able to reach someone and they sent the door code at 5:44p.m. When we got to the door there was no keypad to enter codes as it was a key card only. I called back and told them that we needed key cards and not codes. They seemed confused. Finally the owner of the company came around 6:45p.m. with cards to let us in and only gave us 1 key card. Someone came the next day in the afternoon and gave us 2 more cards. The condo was nice but the appliances were dated. The freezer door on the fridge would not shut properly due to a problem with the ice maker. A toilet seat was very loose and when we walked around on the floor barefoot the bottoms of our feet were black implying the floors had not been properly cleaned. When it was time to check out I asked Liquid Life if they could give us 2 more hours to check out so normal checkout is 10:00a.m. and I requested check out at 12:00pm since they had shorted us at least 2 hours at the beginning of the stay. They refused to allow us to check out at 12:00p.m. and said we had to be out by 10:a.m. All I received was a "Sorry". I will not be using Liquid Life in the future for any rental needs.

resp.text:
Hi Joel,

Thank you for your feedback. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome, and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Our policies do say check-in is at 3pm, and under some circumstances, we fall short of that exact time frame. We try to allow ample time to get our units clean, especially under these trying times. Regrettably, you and your family had to wait quite a bit longer than usual to get into your unit. Yes, there was some confusion as to if the unit was equipped with either a key card or Kaba lock. We’ve been making adjustments to all of our units to have Kaba locks installed on each one. However, COVID-19 prevented our maintenance department from finishing installment of these locks, thus our reservation system had that unit marked with incorrect or unfinished key locks. I would like to point out that the owner of the company did, in fact, make time afterhours to bring an appropriate key card directly to you. We also had a member of our team bring you a set of keys the next morning.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point, we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward, we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Ralph Gillespie
text: Loved the unit, stayed 2 straight years and never let us down. Had a dryer issue, simple fix and they responded within an hour. Liquid Life is our go to from here on!

name: Christine Finck
text: Liquid Life is a great company to rent through!  Very happy with the company.  Some of the condos need updating so check the website and photos.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Christine! We suggest all of our condo owners to update their condos in the Fall & Winter. Thank you for your suggestions, though!

name: Jaci Bates
text: Nice place very clean.  Pulled out about 4 kitchen drawers and couldn’t get them back in.  Also I suggest more kitchen utensils and bathroom towels and wash clothes.  Light in the guest bathroom kept blowing so we just took the bulb out.loved how close it was to the beach.  Very comfortable beds.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Jaci! We will be sure to pass along these suggestions to the owner. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay!!

name: Jeff Isenhower
text: We had reservations for Spring Break 2020. This was definitely trying times for everyone. We received an email from Liquid Life stating that we would receive a full credit plus 20% off our next rental, wow this is great right? Well a month later we received a check in the mail minus over 20% of what we paid them with a letter stating that this is all they are giving us. We had other families rent with other vacation properties near us who received a full refund within a week. Don’t use Liquid Life Vacation Rentals. There are to many other great options.

resp.text:
Hi Jeff,

Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry for the inconvenience this might have caused you and your family’s plans for a beach vacation. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Mary Vorndran
text: View was great condo also! (Need oven mitts) the condo was clean and always saw cleaning crews throughout the complex. This time of year was very busy! Very loud in the pool area kids and music until after the 1030 end time. We couldn't have the deck doors open with all the noise. We will go back just at a different time of year! Wifi was very spotty asked for a password and never heard back.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, Mary! We are sorry you had to deal with the noise. This area does tend to be busier this time of year, and, unfortunately, comes with some extra noise. We will be sure to pass along your suggestions about the oven mitts and wifi. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Todd Drummer
text:
Very nice updated condo. Floor plan is laid out well and the décor is not your over the top nauseating beach theme. Very tastefully done. Appliances are updated also.
The only cons, which weren't enough to deduct a star, were the mattresses. While I don't know how new they are, I feel a little more comfort should have been afforded. The other con is a safety concern. The balcony furniture was two high chairs and a high table. Any toddler that used this furniture would be only a mere tipping point from going over the rail. I think the owner should replace these. Also they were not at all comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Todd! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay in your Liquid Life condo! We will be happy to pass your furniture suggestions along to the owner as well. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Rhonda King
text:
The condo is very nice updated....that’s all the positive I can say....we had some of the same
Minor problems the above had but, the biggest
Problem we had is we paid for a week Sunday to Sunday and could not use the main balcony door
Very poor communication with liquid life we had to chase this problem each day with barley any communication the door honestly looks like it should have been fixed way before our stay. I have stayed with VRBO before and never ever had this problem .
Not happy guests!

name: Lynne Korpal
text:
We rented Caribe 702B from August1-8, 2020.   We were to check in at 3 PM. I called earlier in the afternoon to inform Liquid Life we had arrived and was told I would get a text when our condo was ready.  We had gone grocery shopping for our week and now had $400 in groceries in our car for two hours. At 5 PM I called Liquid Life and inquired as to when the condo would be ready. I was told maintenance was tending to several issues so that the condo would be “perfect” for our arrival.  We got our text at 5:30 PM.   Even though I registered 10 guests we were given 5 keys but only 4 worked.  I was told by Liquid Life that I should check with the Caribe and they could give me more.  I had to buy more for $5 each.  We had to have maintenance come and fix the lock on the door.
Once in the condo as we were putting groceries away the refrigerator door would not stay shut.  The cleaning people had not put the drawers in properly.  I was going to cook dinner but the condo had no fry pans, a broken electric can opener, no manual can opener. There were no baking sheets, no pot holders, no spatulas.  The oven took 40 minutes to preheat to 400 degrees.   The blender had no lid.  I called Liquid Life to complain and the next day they did bring a new blender, fry pans, pot holders, can opener and baking sheets.
The bed in room 2 is a joke.  They actually have a mattress laying on a metal bed frame with no box spring or support.  The metal bed frame was also broken.  There is no way any one could sleep on this bed.  Liquid Life came and looked at it on Monday but did nothing to replace it.  We were told that it was furniture and it had to be approved by the owner.
The toilet in bedroom one would not quit running.  The toilet in the master bathroom overflowed all over the floor on Sunday morning. Maintenance came and fixed both but left the wet plastic he had in the trash.  We cleaned up the floor.  No one from housekeeping came to clean up the floor and sanitize it.  We used our towels, paper towels and disinfecting spray.
When I booked the condo I registered 10 people.  Upon arrival we had 8 towels and washcloths in the unit.  I had to call and request more the first night. .  They brought 2 towels.   I must say they brought more after the toilet overflowed since I had to use ours to wipe up the floor.
Each condo rental with Liquid Life is charged $189 cleaning fee.  Bedroom one has a shower curtain full of mold!!!  The shower in the master bedroom has mold all along the shower door and in corners.  We did take pictures and shared them with Liquid Life. Obviously things are not cleaned as they should be. There should be a checklist so nothing is missed.
Liquid life offered me a $250 refund but to receive it I would have to sign an agreement that I and my family would not post any negative comments on any review, social media or Better Business Bureau. If I did they would charge my credit card on file for $250.  I declined.  I feel others need to beware of this condo and future rentals with Liquid Life.

resp.text: We are so sorry you feel this way, Lynne. It seems like we actually never heard from you during your stay. Your daughter is the one that contacted us. And while some of your issues are absolutely legitimate and we do apologize for the inconvenience on your stay, we were never made aware of a good bit of the issues that you list in this review. Should you decide to move forward with your refund, please reach back out to our Customer Service Manager, and she would be happy to do so.

name: Jacob Nimble
text: This was the easiest vacation i have ever been on thanks to liquid life and their team. I have been coming to this area for 20+ years and this is my first time (definitely not the last) I have used this company. First class service!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jacob! We love having you, and we can't wait to help you book your next vacation to the beach!

name: Mark Raper
text: Our experience was excellent. Everything went very smooth and immediately answered any concerns. Highly recommend. Very professional and helpful staff. Made our vacation easier to plan.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mark! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life!

name: ronnie sullivan
text: We had a wonderful time for the 2 weeks we stayed in  unit 104 at Four Winds. The condo was clean and beautiful, thanks so much!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Ronnie! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to you visiting the Gulf Coast again!

name: Sugar Crush143
text: very beautiful & clean condo located right on the beach!! will definitely book again and recommend to friends!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Audrey Smith
text: Buyer beware!   I had to file a complaint with the BBB and VRBO had to do a month long investigation in order to receive my refund which took 2 separate snail mail checks.

resp.text: Audrey, we are sorry you feel this way, but we did give you a 100% refund on your stay.

name: Ben Bleicken
text:
Horrible people. A pandemic closed the beaches combined with state stay at home orders resulted in no beach trip for my family. What do these dirt bags do? Return slightly more than half of our full week's required up front payment.

Avoid these people like the plague (pun intended). I hate business people like this due to their greedy, unethical behaviour. My family and I will certainly never try Alabama beaches again. We'll just stick with Florida and South Carolina to beach vacation for a week or two each year.

resp.text:
Ben,

Thank you for your feedback. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome, and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude. And we have had no control over Government decisions in closing our beaches.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point, we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward, we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: John Garner
text: View is outstanding, right on the beach. Location is amazing, just outside of the hustle and bustle of the Gulf Shores crowd. Quieter atmosphere for those not looking to deal with noisy, crowded beaches. Our visit was durning Spring Break, and the crowds were very manageable. Excellent property with helpful staff. Would recommend for families.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, John! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay on the Gulf with us. (We are partial, but we love it too!) We look forward to helping you book your stay stay on the beach.

name: Leah Christy
text: We booked through Liquid Life and stayed in the Lighthouse Condominum (#516). Price was great and our room ready early, which was great! The condo itself needs some work. We received a text from Liquid Life asking if everything was good or if there were concerns. We sent concerns about the tv not working properly and our dissatisfaction about the dirty carpet (turned our feet black), but never heard back from anyone. Not sure what the point of reaching out was. The bottom bunk bed bedding was also dirty (hair and sand) upon arrival.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Leah! We are glad you enjoyed your stay. We take guest feedback very seriously and will be sure to pass along your suggestions to our reservations and maintenance teams.

name: Megan Henry
text:
IF I COULD RATE A ZERO I WOULD.
This company is absolutely awful, extremely rude and unreasonable.
Will NEVR give them my money again.

Your terms and conditions state word for word: “No property will be rented to anyone under the age of 25. Parents must check-in and occupy the condominium or beach house with their children during the entire rental period.”

1. We rented the property and it was completely paid for by someone over the age of 25 upon arrival.
2. No where does it state that you have to be 25 years old to be able to check in.  We have multiple 25+ year olds staying with us, but you made me wait for 4 hours after an 8 hour drive with nowhere to go until someone 25 years of age arrived.
3. I am 23 years old, married and own a home. I am in no way a “child” that needs to be accompanied by a “parent” my entire stay.
4. You guys were extremely rude. My mom called to speak with someone about what was going on and was hung up on when she was in mid sentence.
My 25 yr old sister also called to confirm that she was on the way and you guys were extremely rude. The lady also hung up on her when she was trying to speak.

Just please respect and have some empathy for your customers next time.

resp.text: We are sorry you feel this way, Megan. Unfortunately as you are under the age of 25, we - by law as a vacation rental company - are not allowed to allow you access to the condo your mother rented. Someone over the age of 25 must be the one to check in to the condo. All of these policies are stated when you book online in our terms and conditions, and are emailed to you if you book over the phone. Our team was not rude to you or anyone in your party. We simply continued to explain to you that there was legally nothing we could do until someone over the age of 25 was with you. We hope you are able to enjoy the rest of your vacation with your family.

name: Walinda Thompson
text: So we were not offered insurance when we books our trip then Sally headed in. We tried to reschedule twice, but they would not do that. So we get down to Orange Beach on Monday night the 18th and Sally makes a turn to hit us on Tuesday. We tried to call the office with no answer and we tried the emergency number with no answer. We are from Tennessee and have never had to deal with this and had no clue as to do we stay on the 11th floor or do we need to go somewhere. Only problem was Liquid Life wouldn't answer and there was no one working in the office at the condo. On Wednesday we get a text from Liquid life saying we need to evacuate the property never asking if we were ok or anything. Well we couldn't leave because part of the building had went through our windshield and we could not get it fixed until Thursday. Today we get a call that they are going to refund 1 night! Really, we had no lights for 3 days and no water for 1 and you want to only give a 1 night refund? Not to mention the over 10,000 dollars in damages to our car because luggage carts, trash cans, road signs and parts of the building  were breaking off hitting our car. Horrible response time and just all around a dirty cheating company.

resp.text: Walinda, this is the second time that you have left a review on this page. We believe we know what reservation you are speaking of, but we are not sure as we do not have you listed as the primary resident. Based on the information we have, it shows that you booked your stay on VRBO, and when you book on VRBO, you must accept or decline Travel Insurance on your stay. You also verify on VRBO that you accept our Guest Terms & Conditions, which outlines travel insurance and weather related issues. At the time you tried to reschedule, the storm was not even headed towards us - that changed within hours of the storm hitting land. No one expected this type of effect on our community. We also have on your file that you arrived on the 14th and were to depart on the 18th, so you only left one day early - which is why you were refunded for one day. Our team also did not ignore you while you were here. Our offices are across the street from the beach, very close to your condo complex. Every member of our team works and lives here locally. We all experienced the same storm you did, and there was no power, internet or phone service. However, our After Hours team is in a different location with power and internet, and they would have happily been able to assist had you contacted us.

name: Margie Barlow
text: We had a wonderful week at this condo.  There were 8 of us ladies and with 4 bedroom and 4.5 baths it was perfect.  The kitchen, dining and living area were very spacious and we never ran into each other.  The outdoor patio was wonderful.  Being a corner suite we had the breeze.  You can't go wrong with this unit.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Margie! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life and your condo had everything to make your vacation enjoyable. We look forward to helping you book your next trip to the beach!

name: Paula Wilson
text: Liquid Life vacation rentals has unfortunately shown themselves to be untrustworthy. We had rented a condo at Orange Beach for March 21-31, 2020. Our reservation was canceled due to COVID-19. At the time of cancellation, Liquid Life sent emails telling the customers that they had changed their rental agreement in our favor, and that they would be giving us a credit for almost the full amount we had spent, plus a 20% discount on a future rental. I had spent $2650 for my rental, and they emailed me, promising a credit of $2552. Then last week, when I tried to book my new reservation, they refused to accept my booking, and instead of sent me a check for $1786. That’s $864 less than I gave them. They did offer a 20% discount on a future rental, but they are keeping 35% of my money, so I wouldn’t call that even. Despite many emails back-and-forth, plus complaints to Better Business Bureau and the Attorney General of the state of Alabama, they are holding their position and refusing to honor the credit that they promised me in writing, as well as on their website. I will not rent from them again, because they have reneged on the agreement they made, and if I can’t trust them now, I can’t trust them in the future.

resp.text: COVID has impacted everyone we know. We had zero ability to host people on their vacations, because those decisions were made by government. Our company provides professionally cleaned condos. Linens are cleaned in high temp washers and dryers. We have been exceeding cleaning and disinfecting standards even before Covid. We did not hold you to the full impact of the polices you agreed to in your reservations agreement. We moved significantly in your direction. Maybe we could have handled this better. Things were changing rapidly when we had to make these decisions. We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.
