We are evaluating every practice and policy and seeking to improve our services. The future is bright as we move forward now that the beaches are open. It's a new day.

name: Trisha Robinson
text: I spent a lot of money to stay at this condo, to find that the furniture was incredibly dirty.  Not just kind of dirty, but gross dirty.  I was embarrassed for my guest to see it.  I had to throw sheets from the spare bedroom over the couch and chairs because they were filthy!  Rugs were dirty, bedroom pillow linens had big yellow spots on them.  Just gross.  I took pictures of everything as I was so shocked by it. I have had really good experiences staying at other properties in OBA, this one was horrible.

name: Teri Schmitt
text: My husband and I along with 8 other friends reserved and paid in full for a large condo through Liquid Life. We have had the condo booked for several months.  Our check in was to be in 3 days. We received a call that our reservation had been canceled because they had to do some work in one of the bathrooms.  We asked if they could move our group to another unit and we were told no. We were told that we would receive a full refund in the mail. So now we have 10 people that took vacation time off of work and planned a trip and we can't even get our money back in time to book another property if there are any available in 3 days time. DO NOT USE THIS MANAGEMENT COMPANY!!!!!

name: Cheryl Lockhart
text: The condo was the perfect size for my husband and I with a great view. Had appropriate linens and kitchen was stocked with a basic set of things needed. We were VERY disappointed in the internet speed/service and were unable to conduct any work successfully. There was also a musty smell in the unit.

resp.text: We are so sorry about your troubles with internet, Cheryl! We will be sure to have our maintenance team look into this. Otherwise, we are so glad you enjoyed everything else about your stay!

name: Kaylee Ashford
text: This condo was perfect for us. Literally so close to the beach. A beautiful balcony view. Clean and bright condo. It was everything we wanted it to be!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Kaylee!! We are so glad you enjoyed your beach vacation with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Tim Miller
text: Grand Pointe 605 was a nice condo.  Had AC issues but was resolved.  The only real issues was not Grand Points problem but being the last piece of property before the Jetty, the seaweed and dead marine life was washing up.

resp.text: Sorry about the water near your condo, Tim. But we are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life!

name: Ryan Collins
text: This company does not look after their guest after they get their money. If so they would be willing to refund parking and cleaning fees to a room that was never used during a global pandemic. Unique situations call for unique solutions. If your not willing to keep guest coming back you will not survive as a business after this disaster. The world has changed over the past few months and old business models will not survive. Way to alienate your customer base.

resp.text:
Ryan,

Thank you for your feedback. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome, and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point, we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward, we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Sonia Washington
text:
The condo was a perfect fit for a quick weekend getaway. The furnishings were all up to date and well maintained. I’m actually planning to remodel my master bath just like this. It was located near the grocery store, restaurants and other quick stops for a traveler. Not very expensive but well worth every dime. The view was priceless!
Would gladly stay here again!!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Sonia! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: T Hester
text: We stayed at the Lighthouse using Liquid Life. The room wasn't very clean pop corn under sofa. Someone had left their power cord by the wall. Then my husband left about 4 or 5 shirts in the drawer no one found them.  So we will not be using them again.

resp.text: So sorry for this experience, Mr Hester! Did you report this to our team? Our housekeeping management would have been happy to send someone out to rectify this for you.

name: Nola Shivers
text: Beautiful place.  Immaculately clean, well decorated and equipped. Will definitely come again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Nola! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Brittany Dabkowski
text: I would give 0 stars if I could. THEY cancelled our Spring Break reservations because of Covid-19. They first sent an email that we would receive a full credit to use anytime in the future along with a 20% discount. We could call anytime after the beaches open to rebook. We were pleased with this, and tried to call numerous times to rebook with our credit without any answer and no one would return our messages. Then we received a letter in the mail dated April 30th (which was the same days they opened the beaches) stating that they decided to issue a refund instead of the credit. Sounds great right?? No. The refund was $500 less than the credit they already said we would get, and $600 less than what we paid. We sent them an email (since they won’t answer their phones) and stated that we want to use our credit and do not want the partial refund. They replied stating that it was no longer an option. They never gave us any info how they calculated our refund. We finally got through on the phone and they said that a manager would call us...which he/she never did. I can’t believe that a company would take advantage of their customers in this already difficult time!!

resp.text:
Thank you for your feedback. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome, and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

At this point, we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward, we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Starre Zane
text: We were able to check in early which was a big bonus since we had our fur baby with us!  Clean and conveniently located.  Beach area was not too crowded.

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us, Starre! The fur babies are always first priority! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: cvyblazer
text: Unfortunately, our trip that was scheduled for Alabama Spring Break was ruined due to COVID-19.  The governor closed the beaches and business in Gulf Shores.  Liquid Life offered us a credit on our stay with a 20 percent discount on future rental.  We accepted this offer and received confirmation by email. This week, we received a letter in the mail and a check for a refund that shorted us almost $500 saying they were canceling the credit and issuing a partial refund instead.  I am not happy.  We had an agreement, I expect them to honor it.   I booked with this company because I trusted them.  They breached that trust.  I will not be cashing or depositing the check.  If they did not want to offer the credit, they should not have offered it.  I will be pursuing all legal remedies to this situation and will NEVER EVER use this company again.  Rest assured I will be spreading the word to everyone I know as well.

resp.text: COVID has impacted everyone we know. We had zero ability to host people on their vacations, because those decisions were made by government. Our company provides professionally cleaned condos. Linens are cleaned in high temp washers and dryers. We have been exceeding cleaning and disinfecting standards even before Covid. We did not hold you to the full impact of the polices you agreed to in your reservations agreement. We moved significantly in your direction. Maybe we could have handled this better. Things were changing rapidly when we had to make these decisions. We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again. We are evaluating every practice and policy and seeking to improve our services. The future is bright as we move forward now that the beaches are open. It's a new day.

name: Samuel Stokley
text: We booked a condo stay through Liquid Life for April and another stay in May through another company. Liquid Life moved the rental to August but charged us an additional fee because the rentals were more in August and was very rude when I questioned them about it. The other company (Ocean South Properties) was fabulous and told us that they would honor the original price. They were understanding during this time and I will use them again. I will never book through Liquid Life again.

resp.text:
Hi Samuel,

Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry for the inconvenience this might have caused you and your family’s plans for a beach vacation. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

At this point we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Rachelhtef a avgaaavaadxcaaAaSaxex CD Patterson
text: This is my first experience with Liquid Life vacation rentals. Everything was user friendly through the website and when I called someone was quick to answer my questions. Will definitely use this site again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We look forward to helping you book your next stay at the beach!

name: Shannon Fiscus
text:
Company deserves a negative rating- This Company wants to make excuses for their poor customer service for stealing $700 of our money and other’s and for changing their rental policies when it’s convenient for them, BUYER BEWARE because all they care about is your money not your business. We visit The area yearly but this was going to be our first time with LL, they screwed us and many others than turned it around and play the victim. When the hurricane took out PCB we got our full refund and they definitely had more reason to keep our money but done the right thing and have kept us as customers and it appears that all the others That LL screwed over feel the same way I do from their comments- you changed your rental policy and Then decided not to honor it and gave a bs reason so let’s be clear on one thing you are a despicable business and I would never rent from or refer anyone to you
I wish , no pray that someone decides to sue you over this - believe me I have consulted an attorney and they said I have a case but it will cost more to sue you than it’s worth which I’m sure you banked on. You are a disgrace. If you have any care or concerns you would Do the right thing and had honored your own policy, the one you changed to our favor that actually was NOT

resp.text:
Hi Shannon,

Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry for the inconvenience this might have caused you and your family’s plans for a beach vacation. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Lori Beslin
text: I would definitely NOT recommend this place! From the moment we arrived we had issues. Terrible parking garage and very limited parking. We could not leave to go anywhere because we were afraid we would not have a spot when we returned. The elevators were another nightmare. Only 2 for a 19+ floor complex and much of the time only 1 was working. Additionally they would not always go to all floors. Several times one of us would have to take the stairs 19 floors down to make the elevator go all the way to the 19th floor. Not fun going down 19 flights with small children which we also had to do. Would NOT stay here again!

resp.text: Lori, we are so sorry you had this experience! Seawind Condos had new elevators installed recently.  The HOA has been working with the company to get them working properly.  It is a short term issue.  Liquid Life manages over 300 properties in many different buildings across the Gulf Coast. Unfortunately, the parking and elevators are all managed by the actually complex building you stayed in.   Thank you, and we hope you were sill able to enjoy your stay!

name: Anthony Garcia
text: This is the second time I have rented from Liquid Life but the first at Turquoise Place. Unit 1601C was as expected and very nice. View is amazing and furnishings were great!! I will definitely be renting again. Liquid Life was able to accommodate me arriving a little early which really helped. Our parents live in OBA and we love to come visit. Turquoise Place has great amenities for the kids. Great week!!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Anthony! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Shannon Fiscus
text: DO NOT RENT THROUGH THESE PEOPLE!!! We were cancelled due to the Covid stay at home orders and we were told in an email that they were changing the Guest Policie in our favor and would be given both a credit and a 20% discount for future rental and then when I called to reserve was told I would be getting a letter. I did today with a check for $700 less than what we paid, the amount refunded does not even cover the condo rental fee and a letter stating they had to reevalute the credit policy and due to credit card costs they could not give us a full refund or credit and if we cash said check we accept these terms. This is wrong

Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry for the inconvenience this might have caused you and your family’s plans for a beach vacation. We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Jenny Means
text: Overall enjoyed our stay. We always stay in this area. Condo suited our needs, balcony and view were wonderful. Condo furnishings were good and comfortable. Kitchen was stocked, but needs new pots and pans. Bathrooms were clean, but entire condo needs a good, deep clean. We possibly would stay here again. It met our needs well. Easy beach and pool access. Elevators came quick. We enjoyed our stay.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Jenny! We will be sure to give your suggestions to the owner. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us!!

name: Paula W
text:
We stayed in Summer House 1105A. It looked just like the pictures. It is beautifully decorated and very stylish. It was very clean when we arrived. The elevators are kept clean and are very fast. The outside of the entire property is kept very clean and well-maintained even in this very busy season. The location is fantastic. You could walk to a few restaurants and to shopping.

The shower in the master bathroom is gorgeous. We all liked having the hand sprayer in addition to the regular shower head, especially at the beach. The water pressure is great in both bathrooms. The kitchen was stocked with everything our large group needed. The air conditioner keeps it nice and cold inside. We left our sandy beach stuff outside the door all week, and it was safe there. The balcony is awesome and huge.

We have stayed in condos every year when we go to the beach. This particular condo (1105A at Summer House) will be a repeat next year! It is one of the best we have stayed in.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Paula! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life! Summer House is one of our favorites as well. We look forward to helping you book your next stay at the beach as well!

name: Ross Roberts
text: the online checkin/checkout process is great. Liquid Life does not worry too much about the up-keep on the condos themselves. Ours was filthy. will never book with them again.

name: Tara Taylor
text: The bunk beds were broken. Someone had tried to fix them by taping a 1x4 to it. They were very uncomfortable. Several of the outlets did not work either.  We also had trouble with the freezer. They did send someone out to fix it it but in the end my husband ended up fixing it.  I believe the the issue was mostly condo owners not fixing things correctly.

name: Shannon Marie
text: Not recommended!!!  Our house had multiple issues.  The a/c was broken most of the week.  A speaker flew off the balcony and nearly hit us.  The back door wouldn't lock.  The garage door wouldn't close.  The wonderful part was how we called several times to have the trashed picked up and as we pulled away a week later, the 20 bags of stench and flies still sat there.  The fridge leaked.  The couch in the living room was sunken in.  The surround sound didn't work.  The kitchen faucet wouldn't shut off.  There were not enough bath towels, no laundry basket or dust pan (we bought one).  There was 1 dish towel and 1 wash rag, so we bought more.  It was missing the "basics" a family would need for a week.  We had to buy a bbq grill since the 2 on the back porch were a rusted mess.  The tv in several rooms didn't work (normally wouldn't have been a big deal but the beach was closed for several days and we were stuck in the house).  Several windows on the main floor leaked.  Overall the house was filthy with thick build up on the vents and a heavy layer of sand and dirt under the couch.  I attempted to clean but the vacuum cleaner didn't work.  This house is run down and in bad shape.  The worst part was management not being accountable.  It's obvious the owners don't live locally or care enough to properly give it the updates it sadly needs.  When we addressed the issues, management blew it off.  The maintenance man did fix the door and a/c later in the week but this house was not ready for visitors.  Management tried to validate each issue and offered no apology!  With comments like "had we known the state of the grills, we would've replaced them", it's clear nobody is claiming ownership.  How is a management company not aware that 2 rusted out grills with 1 leg, were shoved in the corner on the back porch?  Come on!!!  Someone should take a tour of the house to assure it's prepared for each guest and give it a deep clean.  Clearly, nobody cares so we don't care to ever rent from this company again.

resp.text: Hi Shannon. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your recent stay. We appreciate and encourage feedback from all of our guests. Our goal is to provide all of our guests with the best possible vacation and we sincerely apologize that this did not happen in your case. We would like to say though that every issue in your review was addressed during your stay as soon as we were notified about them. We never want any of our guest to have to deal with maintenance issues but some times that does happen. We take accountability and ownership of all of our properties and hope in the future you will consider using our company again. Thank you, Guest Services Team at Liquid Life Vacation Rentals.

name: Alex Feltman
text: The room (royal palms 704) was good and clean. Not enough linens for 6 people.  There's a hole in the ceiling in the living room from water damage from somewhere. The dryer was not working great and we called. They obviously sent someone out to fix it which was great but we were out and they did not call back to follow up with repair or schedule.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Alex. We appreciate all guest feedback, and we will definitely look into the maintenance issues you experienced during your stay. We hope that you were still able to enjoy your beach vacation!

name: Ginger Hackett
text:
So easy to book through Liquid Life.  Our condo was in Crystal Tower #1405 in Gulf Shores.  The amenities were great, the furniture comfortable, and the kitchen was well stocked.  The view was phenominal.

Looks like a lot of people are unhappy from COVID-19,  But this unit was great, well priced, and super clean.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ginger! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life! We look forward to hosting you again at the beach!

name: Lucy Steele
text: Not even home yet and giving them 5 stars. We got in at 11AM this morning and the condo was ready! Clean, beautiful condo and my whole family is having a BLAST!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lucy! We are so glad you are having such a great time on your beach vacation!

name: Marsha DuPont
text: Lovely condo and Liquid Life is very attentive. Beds are comfortable, condo was clean and tidy when we checked in. Parked nearby with easy access to our unit. Hot tubs and indoor pool perfect for a winter beach vacation. Next trip we will bring more kitchen utensils but otherwise perfect!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Marsha! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Betty Westberry
text: Clean condo, well stocked with everything we needed. Staff was genuinely helpful. Will not think twice about coming back to this company. 100% recommend this company.

resp.text: Hi Betty, Thank you so much for your great feedback! We are so happy that you were able to come to our beautiful beach and have enjoyed your stay with us!

name: Ginger Hackett
text:
So easy to book through Liquid Life.  Our condo was in Crystal Tower #1405 in Gulf Shores.  The amenities were great, the furniture comfortable, and the kitchen was well stocked.  The view was phenominal.

Looks like a lot of people are unhappy from COVID-19,  But this unit was great, well priced, and super clean.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Ginger! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life! We look forward to hosting you again at the beach!

text: Not even home yet and giving them 5 stars. We got in at 11AM this morning and the condo was ready! Clean, beautiful condo and my whole family is having a BLAST!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lucy! We are so glad you are having such a great time on your beach vacation!

name: Joe Schmidt
text: This company will go above and beyond to fulfill your needs! From making the reservation to when we were actually staying at our condo, they helped us with a smile. Will definitely be rebooking in the future!

resp.text:
Hi Joe,

We certainly appreciate the wonderful feedback and so happy you enjoyed your stay with us!

name: Alex Feltman
text: The room (royal palms 704) was good and clean. Not enough linens for 6 people.  There's a hole in the ceiling in the living room from water damage from somewhere. The dryer was not working great and we called. They obviously sent someone out to fix it which was great but we were out and they did not call back to follow up with repair or schedule.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Alex. We appreciate all guest feedback, and we will definitely look into the maintenance issues you experienced during your stay. We hope that you were still able to enjoy your beach vacation!

name: Cody Pollard
text: We had a great stay, the house was clean and as stated. We would stay again.  We had no problems.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Cody! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us!

name: Tim Dial
text: Everything went really well with Liquid Life and we had no problems with our stay.  Leaving is very easy as all you have to do is put the dishes in the dishwasher and start the cycle and take out the trash and turn the AC to 75

resp.text: Thank you, Tim! We try to make the experience as easy as possible for you. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us!!

name: Amanda Walker
text: Loved our condo but this management company was completely rude. Our check in was at a certain time and they would not allow us in until an hour after. We had to stand outside of our door for an hour in the heat before they let us in. They said it was because it needed a final cleaning inspection. Well, it wasn't very clean. We won't be renting thru this company again.

resp.text: We are so sorry you feel this way about your stay, Amanda! Our check-in time does not begin until after 3pm. Unfortunately during busy season, that means it can be a bit later before guests are able to get into their condos. Each condo must be cleaned and inspected between guests. We hope that you were still able to enjoy your beach vacation!

name: Judy Fair
text: This was our 4th year staying at this property, 3rd year in this particular condo. We have been pleased with the check-in & out process with Liquid Life, pleased with the building, the pool, & the gorgeous beach. The facility is clean & well maintained. Just an FYI: there has been considerable noise for 2 years due to construction next door, but it appears that should be finished in the next few months.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Judy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Jade Ray
text: We LOVED booking through Liquid Life Vacation Rentals this year!  The condo was spacious, the amount of kitchen supplies/utensils was amazing, and the staff was extremely responsive!  I HIGHLY recommend!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you, Jade! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life! We love hearing about guests' experiences at our beautiful beaches. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Mike Vlahos
text:
Not refunding money when there is an ongoing health crisis and the beaches are closed!  Terrible business!

I see you posted a canned response to my original review.   You say you have not held people to the full impact of the policies.  Which is almost a lie.  You did not refund any money to my friend and you refuse to reschedule another date and take his calls when he tries to contact you.  In fact it was eluded that you won't talk to him until he takes down any negative social media posts.  I know for a fact that other rental companies in Orange Beach gave full refunds to their customers instead of dodging their calls and keeping their money will providing no services at all.

resp.text: COVID has impacted everyone we know. We had zero ability to host people on their vacations, because those decisions were made by government. Our company provides professionally cleaned condos. Linens are cleaned in high temp washers and dryers. We have been exceeding cleaning and disinfecting standards even before Covid. We did not hold you to the full impact of the polices you agreed to in your reservations agreement. We moved significantly in your direction. Maybe we could have handled this better. Things were changing rapidly when we had to make these decisions. We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again. We are evaluating every practice and policy and seeking to improve our services. The future is bright as we move forward now that the beaches are open. It's a new day.

name: Rebekah Thompson
text: Great location right on the beach and close to lots of restaurants within walking distance. Very disappointingly dirty unit. Had to wash the bedding due to it not being clean. Floors were also dirty! Loved the location but did not like having to wash all the bedding!

resp.text: So sorry for your experience, Rebekah! We'd love to see what we can do to find out more about your stay. Please reach out to us at reservations@teamliquidlife.com.

name: Syndee Breeze
text: Excellent quality vacation! Couldn't have asked for a better property or a better contactless check in /check out experience during pandemic. We will be using Liquid Life for future vacations!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Sydnee! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

text: We had a great stay, the house was clean and as stated. We would stay again.  We had no problems.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Cody! We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us!

name: Amanda Walker
text: Loved our condo but this management company was completely rude. Our check in was at a certain time and they would not allow us in until an hour after. We had to stand outside of our door for an hour in the heat before they let us in. They said it was because it needed a final cleaning inspection. Well, it wasn't very clean. name: natalie spatafora
text: It would be in anyone's best interest NOT to rent a condo managed by Liquid Life Vacation Rentals. I am sure the owners of the condo would be horrified to know how their condo was being managed.  We arrived on a Friday afternoon.  First problem- dryer broken. A repair guy showed up and said he woud get us a loaner. They did but it did not fit in the closet so it stuck out and we could not close door.. Second problem Refrigerator.  No ice on arrival, We went to grocery store bought $200 worth of groceries. Came back and put the food in the refrig.  Several hours later food warm, still no ice.  Called office and they said that it will take 24 hours for the refrig to get cold. They turn it off between renter. The said dont worry your food wont go bad. HA  We had warm drinks until the next morning. Friday they told me that they would send someone out that evening to look at the refrig. NO ONE ever showed up/ I have NEVER stayed in a condo where the refrig was not ready and working.  Putting groceries away. Kitchen was disgusting. Dried food on cabinets. HAIR and dirt in kitchen drawers. HAIR on top of utensils.  My son went to rest on couch and the throw pillows had dried blood on them. Curtains had dried body fluids -my guess vomit Called and complained and they sent someone to clean the kitchen. They removed the covers off the pillows and put the throw pillows in a closet. The next person that gets to stay there gets bloody throw pillows with a clean covering. They did nothing with the curtains. We got to live with those. Then I was making mac and cheese and found a dead roach in the cabinet. I got to call again!  Bug guy came and sprayed. GROSS>  They told me I had talked to almost everyone in the office and they are resolving our problems and what else do we want. They told me they would reach out Monday to make sure we were happy and things were going well. We checked out on Wednesday and never did we hear from the office staff.  Also the ice maker wasn't working. just dripping water on the floor .  They Sent someone out. They chipped away at some frozen ice around a gear and said it would work. Well it did not the whole time we were there, just dripped water so we just turned off the ice maker because this place is no help,  The last night we were there we saw roaches running in the kitchen by the laundry machine.  I gave up talking to the office because they obviously dont care. They just patch things up and hope people leave them alone.  I could not relax in the condo. It was so stressful. Oh we also were not allowed to hang our towels on the balcony railing. We had security telling us to take them down. Security also banged on our door one other time- they had the wrong condo.  There is no management  on this site. NO one to personally go talk to  Horrible experience. We should be refunded part of our money for all of the above problems. Did not rest the whole time there. I asked for our money back so we could go to another condo but they would not do that either. We were stuck!

name: Kristie Billions
text: There were 4 vehicles in our group and we were told that 2 vehicles were allowed to only park here and the other ones could park at their office, little did we know there were only 8 parking spots available and you had to reserve a spot and the lady didn't bother telling us that so we have nowhere to park now!! We are screwed!! Trying to figure out now what to do!!

resp.text: So sorry for your experience with parking, Kristie. Unfortunately, parking has become an issue across the island, and no company has unlimited parking to offer guests anymore. Most condo complexes won't offer more than 2 parking passes, and most rental companies have very limited overflow parking (overflow that fills up very quickly during our busiest time of year.) Again, we are so so sorry that you had to deal with this, and we wish there was a solution we could offer you.

name: Shelley Schmitt
text:
SeaChase is our go to condo in Orange Beach! We absolutely love 1005C as it was well stocked and absolutely spotless with best ocean view ever! With all this going on in our world it was comforting to know that the staff paid special attention to providing what we felt like was a clean safe environment. Each bedroom was comfortable with king and queen beds, room to move around and a nice TV. We would enjoy staying in this unit again. Thankful for gorgeous weather as well!
Thank you,
Shelley Schmitt

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Shelley! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Dijuana Lewis
text: Unbelievable property. Condo gorgeous. View spectacular. Great service from Liquid Life!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Dijuana! We are so glad you enjoyed your beach vacation with us at Liquid Life! Come back and see us again soon! :)

name: Amber Mathews
text: I have been trying to contact this company for a week for them to honor their previous policy of a full credit and 20% discount due to Covid cancellations and no one has returned my calls. They sent a refund check instead that I didn’t ask for and that is several hundred dollars less than what we paid.  I would like to rebook for this summer at a comparable price that we paid but in order to receive the discount previously offered this has to be done over the phone. Which is impossible when you can’t get a person to answer the phone or return your calls. Looking online the prices now are $1000 to $1500 more than what we paid originally for the same condo. Our family worked hard to make this vacation happen this year and this company’s customer service has been extremely frustrating and disappointing. This is my first and last time using Liquid Life.

resp.text:
Thank you for your feedback. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome, and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point, we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward, we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: John Alvarez
text: We stayed at Summerchase and it is a great location and value. And the beach is not crowded since there aren't any other condos on either side for quite some area. Interior of the unit matched the photos and description. Very friendly office staff who were willing to help out.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, John! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at Summerchase with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation.

name: Remi McDonald
text: Our family just got back from the BEST trip! The condo was SOOO clean! When we had to call the staff they were so sweet and helpful! We stopped by the office to go to the OBA store and they were working like mad trying to help families get checked in! So thankful for a nice break and slice of beach heaven for a few days! We will be back soon!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Remi! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Mandy Donlan
text: One of the best vacation condo's our large family has ever experienced!!! My kids are already asking to book that unit again next year!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review, Mandy! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: luvubuz
text: My husband and I just spent 6 weeks at the Four Winds condominiums in Orange Beach, AL. We stayed in unit 104, the same one we stayed in last winter. It’s located on the first floor, with a balcony that overlooks the pool and the white,  sandy beach. It’s an easy walk to the beach, too. The beautiful sunsets from our balcony never got old. Upon our arrival, we found the unit as immaculately clean as it was last year. The king sized bed is so comfortable and I slept like a rock every night. We were also delighted to find a new and bigger “smart” TV in the living room. We were able to see all of our favorite shows on Netflix, Hulu and Amazon Prime. The kitchen is fully furnished with everything you’ll need during your stay. The rocker/recliner is also very comfortable, especially if you have a bad back. We enjoyed our stay so much it was hard to leave. We’ve already booked this special place for next year. If you’re looking for a quiet and comfortable place to relax, with a beautiful view of the Gulf, reserve unit 104 at the Four Winds. You won’t be disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life at Four Winds, and we look forward to seeing you again next year for your next beach vacation!

name: Shannon Despotoski
text: Had a vacation booked for Spring Break that was canceled due to the beaches closing because of COVID-19. I was originally offered a credit plus a discount for a future stay. I was fine with this but almost a month later the company sent a check for over $400 less than the original credit offered with no explanation. I tried to reach out for an explanation but instead received a not so nice email stating the customer isn’t always right. Lesson learned on my part. I should have reviewed this company prior to booking. They can keep their 20% discount. I will not rebook with them!

resp.text:
Hi Shannon,

Thank you for your feedback. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome, and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point, we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward, we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Carra Janssen
text: Terrible business and customer service. We have a world crisis right now and this company is not willing to refund the customers. The governor of Alabama even closed all the beaches today and they still won't refund us. Offering a credit is not going to work, this crisis is out of everyone's control, the best thing to do is work together right now. We had quite a few families going on this trip, 4 other families booked through different companies in Alabama and they all got full refunds no questions asked. So only Liquid Life Rentals is not refunding their customers. If the governor shut them down, by law they should have to refund us, they can get emergency assistance. With that being said, are they going to keep our money and still ask for assistance??? I wouldn't put it past them.  So disappointed, not only are our families heart broken because we can't go, but now we are out money that we may need since some of us have been out of work. :(

resp.text: COVID has impacted everyone we know. We had zero ability to host people on their vacations, because those decisions were made by government. Our company provides professionally cleaned condos. Linens are cleaned in high temp washers and dryers. We have been exceeding cleaning and disinfecting standards even before Covid. We did not hold you to the full impact of the polices you agreed to in your reservations agreement. We moved significantly in your direction. Maybe we could have handled this better. Things were changing rapidly when we had to make these decisions. We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again. We are evaluating every practice and policy and seeking to improve our services. The future is bright as we move forward now that the beaches are open. It's a new day.

name: Shannon Hood
text: We loved it so much that we are booking here again in July! Everything is so convenient. Right on the beach!

resp.text:
Hi Shannon,

Yay! Glad to have you coming back to visit with us in July. We are ready to share some of our fun in the sun.

name: Ricky Womack
text: We had to call maintenance just about everyday for something.  Chairs on balcony broken and taken. Couch hard and uncomfortable. The view was nice and the maintenance did show up every time we called.  Should not have needed to call so much.

resp.text: So sorry for the inconveniences during your stay, Ricky! We are glad our team was able to help you, but we hope you were still able to enjoy your beach vacation. We'd love the chance to make it up to you on your next stay at the beach.

name: Linda Utter
text: Great location for beach-time! Very clean and within walking distance of beach, restaurants, shopping, grocery store. Very family-friendly and relaxed. Will definitely come again!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Linda! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Brandon Scott
text: Was in town for a concert, this was a quick weekend trip. Check in and out was easy with a door code texted to my cell phone, condo was nice as expected. We did have an issue with the front Desk that is ran by Brett-Robinson not issuing the code needed for the amenities stating "we did not rent through them" I immediately called Liquid Life and I believe her name was Mary called Brett-Robinson and got the code for me and made sure I was taken care of. Will continue to use this company due to their quick response time and prices!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Brandon! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we are happy we were able to help you out with the amenities code in a quick manner. We look forward to helping you book your next trip to the beach!

name: andrea williams
text: Very good experience, the only negative is the WiFi and internet. You can only get a signal in the second bedrooms. The master bedroom And living room has no internet connection at all. You can also only use your phones to talk in those 2 bedrooms. There is no signal in the kitchen, living room or master bedroom. We worked while on vacation and our college age children were enrolled in summer courses so this was a real negative for us. There needs to be routers in the living room and master bedroom. The television is also outdated and had very few channel’s. Since there is bad internet connection, the television should be better. I would say technology overall is what needs some improvement but the place itself is very nice, spacious and comfortable. If you have your own business and work during the day while on vacation, this may not be the rental home for you.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us, Andrea! However, we are truly sorry about your issues with the internet connection and take feedback of this sort very seriously. We will be sure to share these concerns with the condo owner so we can make improvements moving forward. Thanks again, and we look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation.

name: Caroline Scudder
text: Beds are horrible! One bed broke and we called maintenance and no one ever fixed. Daughter slept on floor. Time to replace three out of four beds in the unit we stayed in...otherwise would’ve been great. Ridiculous to pay that much and not have adequate sleeping conditions. And not try to repair situation for guests.

name: Matthew & Shelby Stangle
text:
We rented San Carlos 1505 for 4 days and the views were absolutely amazing. Liquid Life had amazing communication through the entire process. Even though we received two codes for the door that caused slight confusion, their customer service was extremely quick to answer and help us figure it out.

The condo was clean and superbly laid out. We had 5 adults and we weren’t tripping over each other at all. The balcony overlooked the beach and ocean and was spacious with enough sitting room for everyone.

Most of what we wanted to do was within walking distance and/or short driving distance. Easy to find and access.

The best part was the carts that were provided to the condo tenants to haul luggage to and from the rooms...major bonus!

Amazing time, amazing condo, and will definitely be back soon!

resp.text: We are so glad that you enjoyed your visit to the Gulf Coast with Liquid Life Vacation Rentals! We are always happy to hear when we have exceeded the expectations of our guests. We look forward to helping you book your next vacation to the Gulf Coast!

name: Terri Danielson
text: My husband and I stayed in a Turquoise Place Condo rented through Liquid Life this past March. The Condo was amazing and so were the Views. Liquid Life went above and beyond for us. My husband had emergency surgery two days before we were supposed to leave and Liquid Life's Customer Service Manager sprang into action and managed to get our stay extended and took care of everything so I could be by my husband's side. I came back to the condo from the hospital and The Customer Service Manager and Liquid Life had sent a get well card and Dinner to our Condo! My Red Hat Ladies needed a last minute get away two weeks ago and again the reservations employee I dealt with found us the perfect Condo last minute.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Terri! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Tami Cory
text: We arrived to find our unit full of blowers drying the carpet...although we called management, no one ever called back or ever removed the blowers. I don't understand why we weren't notified the unit was not ready for booking? Also, we weren't allowed to check in until 5:30pm but was told we had a 3pm check in...

resp.text: Hi Tami, our team reach out to you last week to try to help with your issues and how we can make this experience better for you! We look forward to hearing back & helping you the best way we can!

name: Brandon Scott
text: Was in town for a concert, this was a quick weekend trip. Check in and out was easy with a door code texted to my cell phone, condo was nice as expected. We did have an issue with the front Desk that is ran by Brett-Robinson not issuing the code needed for the amenities stating "we did not rent through them" I immediately called Liquid Life and I believe her name was Mary called Brett-Robinson and got the code for me and made sure I was taken care of. Will continue to use this company due to their quick response time and prices!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Brandon! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life, and we are happy we were able to help you out with the amenities code in a quick manner. We look forward to helping you book your next trip to the beach!

name: Jennifer Sutberry
text: 1st time using this company.  Rate was great for the condo.  However, in light of the pandemic and government limiting groups of people.  My kids school closing I am wondering about a possible refund.  I am unable to speak to anyone.  I was told from a friend who also booked with you that we are unable to get a refund or even move our dates. In light of the situation, a refund should be done if we are unable to come.

resp.text: Jennifer, we have changed our cancellation policy in light of COVID-19 as of this morning. I believe we have spoken with you to get you taken care of as quickly as possible. We hope you stay safe, and we hope to see you soon!

name: Josh Holley
text: I write this as I sit in Phoenix West II unit 1205 that we rented through Liquid Life.  We are staying here for 11 nights and paid over $4,000.  We came in on Tuesday which was the day Hurricane Gordon was hitting.  We called the office to ask if we could check in early as we had seen on the calendar that no one stayed in the unit Monday night.  The girl I spoke with was not helpful and just kept telling me their policy.  I knew what the policy was, what I was asking for was at least some effort to see if she could check when we would be able to get in.  She would not do it.  I ask to speak with her boss and she said she was out cleaning condos and did not have her number.  I asked to speak to one of the inspectors and she said she didn't have any of their numbers.  She never once offered to go above and beyond other than telling me what the policy was.  I had 3 kids in a car headed towards a tropical storm growing into a Hurricane and just wanted someone to say "let me see what I can do", but that did not happen.  We got the call at 2:45pm that our condo was ready, which we were waiting in the parking garage at the condo as the tropical storm had already began to hit.  Condo was clean and ready and then we noticed the stand alone ice maker was missing, like was not there and was just a blank space.  This is something that we love and use all the time when we stay at Phoenix West II.  I called Liquid Life and they said it was our for maintenance.  I explained that this is something that we use everyday and could they bring a spare one until the other got fixed.  She said they don't have spare ones and her solution was that if the refrigerator ice maker did not keep up, then I could go to the store, buy bagged ice and then bring them the receipt.  Really????  I just paid $4,000 for 11 nights and you want me to leave the condo to go buy bagged ice every time I need to fill the cooler and then bring you the receipt.....  I then called back and got another girl who said she would have maintenance call me the next day.  No one called and we are still here without a separate ice maker.  This is our 7th year to stay at either Phoenix West and/or Phoenix West II and we really enjoyed it.  Things happen and I realize that, but I don't believe stating policy when there is a Hurricane Warning in place and telling someone to go buy bagged ice is the right things to do in these situations.  I am not saying don't rent through Liquid Life, but I did want to share our current situation so you can make an educated decision.  I even mentioned to the front desk here that we were trying to get checked in early due to the approaching storm and when I told them who I rented through they rolled their eyes like there was a history there with Liquid Life and these kind of issues.

resp.text: Josh,  Thanks for writing.  Really glad that you guys made it safely into Orange Beach early in the day.  I am also thankful that you acknowledged that we got you into your condo before 3:00 p.m. as promised in all of the multiple confirmations.   As you might imagine, on the day of your arrival, every member of our team was out on storm prep.    I am very sorry that your calls for an early arrival came in at a time when we were not able to get extra people on the phone with you to discuss an early arrival.  I apologize for the ice maker being out at your arrival.    We hope to serve you at a higher level of excellence as you continue your stay.  The rain and wind creates a million extra things to do.

name: Denese Yancey
text: I wish there was a 3 1/2 star rating...but will go with the 4.  The condo complex is located conveniently close to grocery stores, restaurants, etc.  The entrance can be a bit tricky as it is directly adjacent to a traffic light.  The condo complex is close to the  beach as well, so the boardwalk out to the beach is very short.  Parking was easy as this is a smaller complex.  They offered carts to aid in moving your belongings from the car to the condo.  The complex is older and the condo itself is satisfactory.  Had a wonderful stay and enjoyed Orange Beach so much!

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your stay, Denese! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Brooke Knight
text: I booked an April vacation stay with this company. I paid $1181.67. I got an email on March 29 stating they were giving me a credit of $1083.67 and a 20% discount for my future dates! Then today I get a check in the mail for $758.57 and a letter stating they are refunding my money and they will not refund it all because of credit card fees and “other” non-refundable fees! Where did my money go!??? There shouldn’t have been $423.10 in fees!!! My reservation was cancelled so there was no cleaning fee, no wristbands needed for pool, no parking passes needed, and no need to pay sales tax on my stay. So where is the $423.10!?  I was ok with the credit Issued on March 29, I was looking forward to rescheduling my dates. I am NOT ok with a check for $758.57. I want a credit or full refund! They have been awful at communicating. They are rude, selfish, greedy & non-responsive.  In one email they said.. and I quote “ It seems that everyone contacting  us seems to be operating under a mindset of  “the customer is always right”. “ DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!!!!!!!

resp.text:
Brooke,

Thank you for your feedback. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome, and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point, we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward, we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines. We have been actively improving phone & email systems and hiring fun, friendly professionals to provide the best in customer service to our guests.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Ramsey Huffman
text: This was the third visit in this condo for my wife and I.  Each time we come in somewhat "road weary", but soon find ourselves listening to the waves break on the sand and feeling the tiredness, stress and anxiety melt away.  The food in the area is always great as we look for our old haunts and experience at least one new "discovery" on each visit.  Sometimes a bag of popcorn and a good T.V. movie is all we want and the condo affords us that luxury.

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Ramsey! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Liquid Life. We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Carrie Stepp
text: Taking advantage of people at their most vulnerable and refusing to honor written agreements. Shameful. I will never use them again.

resp.text:
Carrie,

Thank you for your feedback. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome, and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again.

name: Misty Lacey
text: I recently cancelled a reservation bc at the time, on April 22, the beaches were still closed. So I called to cancel my reservation for May 23. They did not put in my cancellation, & I’ve had to make multiple calls & emails to get the refund. And found out today they are still charging me the non refundable amount of $88 even though it was due to Covid19 & beach closures. I could not wait to cancel or it would have been inside the 30 days. I will NEVER book with Liquid Life again!

resp.text:
Hi Misty,

Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry for the inconvenience this might have caused you and your family’s plans for a beach vacation. name: Bella Martin
text: Wonderful company,  everyone is so kind and amazing in the customer service department. Every time I called they were very pleasant. I will recommend Liquid Life to all of my family and friends. Cleanest condo's by far, we have tried many other companies in Orange Beach and they can not hold a candle to Liquid Life!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Bella! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life and look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Dorann Tanner
text: I have always used Liquid Life and recommended them to friends and family. However, never again. Use Brett-Robinson or any other company in the area. This is not an Orange Beach or Gulf Shores issue. We love the beach and people and will be back but I will never use Liquid Life again. We were scheduled to go on our spring break trip starting Sunday. I have been trying since Tuesday to contact the company. I have emailed several times, called, left voicemails...no response.  They have closed down their facebook page. They are not refunding for cancellations even though the beaches have been ordered closed. According to the website, they will give you a chance to reschedule and provide some type of credit. Allegedly, they will send you an email of your credit amount. But again you can’t speak to anyone to clarify. Also, we already have booked and paid for our summer trip (through Liquid Life, unfortunately) so we will not be traveling again.  There are lots of folks in our same situation. My friends who booked through other companies have had no issues with refunds for their reservations. Avoid this company at all cost when you book your vacations!

resp.text: COVID has impacted everyone we know. We had zero ability to host people on their vacations, because those decisions were made by government. Our company provides professionally cleaned condos. Linens are cleaned in high temp washers and dryers. We have been exceeding cleaning and disinfecting standards even before Covid. We did not hold you to the full impact of the polices you agreed to in your reservations agreement. We moved significantly in your direction. Maybe we could have handled this better. Things were changing rapidly when we had to make these decisions. We hope and trust that none of us will be in this situation again. We are evaluating every practice and policy and seeking to improve our services. The future is bright as we move forward now that the beaches are open. It's a new day.

name: Jt Nelms
text:
UPDATE: After leaving this review and seeing the owner response, I reached out to liquid life TWICE THROUGH EMAIL.  NO RESPONSE. CLEARLY it was to save face because they never made it right.

.  When I was on the way to the property they told me the Br ac was broke. We got here both ac was broke. The first night was a hot one. There was Sheetrock ripped off wall. Patch jobs gone wrong on ceiling. You could see the sheet rock because there was no curtains. By this time I had been asking for the Wi-Fi code for two days. Still not got it. A man came at four on Monday and fix the AC’s. They sent two Boys to hang curtains because I had teenage girls changing in the living room since it’s one bedroom. ‪Tuesday morning‬ I woke up went down to my car and it had a notice that it was going to be towed. I contacted the property manager who told me I should have had a packet left in the room which I did not. Now, Still fighting for the wifi on Tuesday. Finally, someone showed up later that day to fix the Wi-Fi problem and bring a welcome packet so we could hang a sticker on her car Mirror. What should have a been a vacation from the stress I’ve been through after recovering from open heart surgery last year along with 4 strokes and months of therapy turned into a stressful situation. Each day of the vacation I woke to a new problem and ended in tears fighting back and forth with liquid life. Anita was kind however. They offered me $250 back of the $1200 I paid. I didn’t take it bc they wanted me to sign something saying I couldn’t leave online reviews or go to social media or bbb. I did not feel that was fair to other people. After all, I still had one day right? What could go wrong? I saved all my washing for that day. When I went to dry the clothes the dryer did not dry. 4 turns on same load STILL not dry. I reported it to liquid life and they didn’t respond. I saved the text just incase they said I didn’t. I’ve literally had tears every day of my vacation. I’ve tried to make the best of it as I’m not suppose to be stressed. In my opinion they owe me a refund. Unit 16 at Perdido skye never should have been rented. I’ve taken pics and hope I’m able to share them. On a positive note it’s convenient to elevator and the property has a nice pool, and is convenient to beach. Nice views. I wondered if it was the story for every unit in the building and it’s not. I saw 54 online which was really nice! Probably managed better. The bottom line is unit 16 SHOULD NOT have been rented until it was ready. after not taking the $250 bc the wanted time to sign something saying I wouldn’t talk on the experience, I reported this same thing to the bbb.  Their response was that they tried to offer me money and I came back 3 times for more.  Lies.  I was offered $205 and I said that wasn’t a fair amount.  On the same phonecall we came up woth $250 just to be done, I Said ok.  The they sent the thing I had to sign saying I couldn’t post anything to anyone on social media or the Better Business Bureau. I felt like this was not enough for me to sit back, shut up And watch other families get ripped off. Then I wake up the next day to a dryer that didn’t work and they never sent anybody out to fix it. Glad I did not sign. I really feel like they owe me a complete refund if they are reputable business.

resp.text: JT, we are so sorry you had so many issues with your stay! After chatting with management and consulting our records, it seems like they tried to talk to you about an amount to help cover your troubles but you never told them an amount that would work for you. If you are still interested, don't hesitate to get back in touch with us directly.

name: Denese Yancey
text: I wish there was a 3 1/2 star rating...but will go with the 4.  The condo complex is located conveniently close to grocery stores, restaurants, etc.  The entrance can be a bit tricky as it is directly adjacent to a traffic light.  The condo complex is close to the  beach as well, so the boardwalk out to the beach is very short.  Parking was easy as this is a smaller complex.  They offered carts to aid in moving your belongings from the car to the condo.  The complex is older and the condo itself is satisfactory.  Had a wonderful stay and enjoyed Orange Beach so much!

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your stay, Denese! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation!

name: Jessica Edwards
text: Liquid Life Vacation was incredibly easy to deal with.  However, unit 704 at Tidewater needs few tweaks. Some of the doors are squeeky,  wd-40 should be used on the door hinges, a new sofa (uncomfortable and loud to sit on) new king size mattress, black out curtains should be hung in the bedroom and on the sliding doors in living room, lighter quilt in master bedroom, cooking sheets, and cooking mitts. The tv should definitely be larger, and the satellite tv equipment needs to be updated.... it's from the 90's. A

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Jessica! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with us. We will be sure to give your feedback to the owner - thank you!

name: Wayne Boshart
text: Condo was great, but I would expect to receive check in details well before the day/time I get there.  I should not have to call when I am there to get the door code.

resp.text: Sorry for your issues, Wayne! Our arrival instructions are generally sent when the unit it booked, one week out, 3 days out, and on the day of arrival. It sometimes gets marked as spam, so maybe that is what happened in this case. Regardless, we are sorry you didn't receive them until the day you arrived!

name: Kathy Paulin
text:
This is the third time we have stayed at Tidewater 1102.  In the 12 plus years we have been coming here,  it is our favorite condo in the Orange Beach/Gulf Shores area.
Liquid Life is an amazing company to work with. We will definitely be back, and will book thru Liquid Life! We highly recommend Liquid Life!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, Kathy! You are so kind. We love working with you for your beach vacation and are so glad you always enjoy your stay with us & at Tidewater.

name: Amber Tinnon
text: I thought liquid life was great! They were super easy to work with and the check in and out process was perfect! I didn’t have to worry about going to a front desk, getting keys or a code, then going to my room. They sent me an email that has all the info I’d need including my door combo and we went straight up. They were right there at the phones if you needed help or had a question. And when we checked out they sent an email the day prior with a link to click when you were ready. All in all a very good stay and we will definitely use Liquid Life in the future!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Amber! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay with Liquid Life & we were able to make your trip to the Gulf Coast seamless and enjoyable! We look forward to helping you book your next beach vacation! (Please note: To recieve your discount, please email marketing@teamliquidlife.com with the name your vacation was booked under. Thank you!)

name: Sharee Burnett
text: The condo at Island Towers was fine. Had everything we needed. The only problem is parking. If you drive a truck you can only park on ground level of parking garage. There are signs for small cars to park up. No one follows the rules. I even payed extra for another parking pass and we had no where to park. Called Liquid life and the lady was so rude. Said we had to talk to security which we only saw the night before we left to come home after being there all week. He said he couldn’t help us either. People there with no parking pass all week and no one did anything about it. So don’t waste your money on a parking pass because it’s not enforced!

resp.text: We are so sorry you had this issue at Island Tower, Sharee! Unfortunately, Liquid Life has no control over how they handle their parking. We only provide the pass for you, which is required at purchase by their HOA. We apologize you seem to have had a bad experience with our staff, and we will address this issue on our end as well. We hope that despite all of this you were still able to enjoy your beach vacation!

name: Julie Gritters
text:
I read reviews before booking so my hope is that this review will help you steer clear from this dishonest company.. We had plans to stay here on April 3 and paid $1500. On March 19, we received an email from them saying that (because of Covid) they were changing their rental agreement and that their new policy was that anyone who cancelled would get a full credit and a 20% discount. We cancelled after this new rental agreement and have proof by email that we would get a full credit.  One month later (without any prior communication) we received a check in the mail for $1000 with the statement that they were not offering the full credit anymore. So they kept $500 for "non-refundable" fees. We tried to see if booking for the same dates next year plus the 20% discount would be a wash, but we still would have to pay hundreds more dollars.. They will NOT pick up their phones to talk about it. Even VRBO agents were frustrated with them (they could not patch me though to them on the phone) VRBO stated that they were encouraging every company to give a full refund and VRBO even refunded VRBOs portion of the fee . But Liquid Life is holding tight to the money and only giving a fraction back...
Every communication with them is through email and pretty nasty. They are standing firm on the fact that they had an agreement that if you cancel within 30 days, there is no refund so they are actually doing us a favor.. They will not even address the fact that they changed that rental agreements to a new one and we cancelled based on the new policy in place.. stay away. I wish we would have...
Update: Check out Yelp reviews and you'll see many more unsatisfied customers...

resp.text:
Hi Julie,

Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry for the inconvenience this might have caused you and your family’s plans for a beach vacation. While COVID-19 has impacted everyone in varying ways, we too have certainly had our own challenges to overcome and we are sorry to see you were caught up in those challenges.

Unfortunately, there wasn’t a guidebook or policy & procedures in place to handle an unforeseen event of this magnitude.

As a result of the rapidly changing COVID-19 environment, we were making quick decisions and operating our offices on a skeleton crew and were not able to react or respond in a way in which was appropriate for all given parties.

We have learned a valuable lesson over the past few months and realize that our responses and actions could have been handled differently. For this we are deeply apologetic to all who have suffered alongside us.

At this point we have taken in all feedback and have made many adjustments to all of our communications, policies and procedures. Going forward we are fully prepared to accommodate many vacationing families with professionally cleaned condos using CDC & local health department guidelines.
