resp.text: Hi Gerald, we hate to hear you had a horrible stay. I researched my reservations and did not see a reservation under your name at any of my properties in the past year.  Possibly the reservation was under a different name or confusion to which company managed the rental booked. Again, we are customer service driven, we would have been happy to assist at anytime during your stay.If you indeed did stay at one of our properties. Thanks Lucky Bird Vacations

name: Beachball Properties
text: Check out our units 221, 305, & 306

name: Howard Hayakawa
text: Quiet, clean, well appointed

name: Amanda Eddington
text: Great location!

name: Derrick Cullen
text: No swimming pool, but the management staff is great.

name: Emily Ramay
text: The cable wouldn't work, no DVD player, the electronics door lock messed up so many times a locksmith had to be called and a regular doorknob put in.

name: Robin Ingram
text: We stayed in room 1007. The booking process was very easy and explanatory. The room and outside storage room (for beach chairs, etc.) had the same keyless entry code, and the gate to access the hotel from the beach also had a keyless entry code. They provided 1 toilet paper roll per toilet and 1 paper towel roll at the kitchen sink, as well as a small bottle of dish soap and 2 dish towels and pot holders. There were plenty of dishes to use.  They were not kidding about needing your own condiments. You'll even need your own salt and pepper. We had 3 bedrooms (2 of which had a king bed  and 1 bedroom had a queen and a full bed) and a queen sleeper sofa. There was a full kitchen, including a dishwasher, ice in the door refrigerator, microwave, toaster oven, toaster, coffee maker, and a sink food disposal. There was also an ice maker for filling your cooler in the dining area. Very accommodating space, so much so that some areas were slightly cramped because they managed to fit in so much. We had 8 people and were very pleased with our stay.

name: R J
text: Changed our unit after booking it knowing it was still under repair from Sally. Be aware this company will not refund your money for any reason. Been renting in Gulf Shores 30 years stay away from this company. Lots of good companies in town.

name: Ryan Skelton
text: Email received 33 days prior to our arrival after booking almost a year in advance: Hi Ryan, the owner of the condo you rented Indies 304 informed us today that the unit will not be ready for rentals until fall. We are in the process of canceling or rescheduling all summer reservations for this condo. We are sorry but we do not have another property available to move your reservation to. We can offer you a full refund or move your reservation dates. Please let us know how you would like to proceed. I did include other rental companies in the area if you would like to see if they have anything available. We are sorry for the inconvenience this has caused you and your family.

name: Megan Harmon
text: Went on a family vacation for a week, worst rental experience ever. None of the sinks had hot water, only the showers. 2 of the bathrooms had fire ants. One of the bedrooms had the fire alarm hanging from the ceiling by exposed wires. 2 of the beds broke while people were sleeping in them and were not repaired during our stay even though maintenance came to look at it. 2 of the chairs on the porch were broken and unusable upon arrival, the wifi was unable to be accessed for 2 days causing a college student to fall behind. The gate code to get to the property did not work and we had to show the security guard on duty our rental paperwork to get in. It took 3-4 days to finally get in touch with the management staff and when discussing the issues our family had experienced they asked "well what would you like me to do about that?" We didn't even get an apology, way to many other companies to rent from in the area.

name: Susan Penn
text: We love this renting from this place! Very nice and friendly!

name: Angela Heitz
text: I only gave this company one star because there is no option for zero stars!  We booked a rental house for a very specific time for a specific event.  Less than 2 weeks before the dates booked, we get an email (not a phone call, but an email) telling us the house is unavailable and casually said just try again at a later date.  The company said it could not provide  another property as an alternative to salvage our vacation.   We asked that they pay the difference in what it would cost to book another house (at this late date) from another agency, and there was not even the courtesy of a response.  This company is far, far below the unprofessional status (as noted above); they could not or would not offer an explanation of where in the contract the company had the legal ability to do this.  If your vacation is important to you, DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!

name: Ashlie Cothren
text: Worst beach house experience. The Aubrey House in Gulf Shores looks nice but the management does not care once they have your money. They knew they had a german roach infestation before we checked in because they informed us about the pest control doing a treat ment before. When we arrived with over five hundred dollars of groceries, my mother inlaw found roaches in the cabinets. Upon futher inspection we found that all cabinets were full of roach droppings and live roaches. We contacted management and they told us they would send someone out to clean and pest control. However it did not get cleaned and the roaches came back and we started finding them in the bedrooms and our groceries. Some of our family was so grossed out that they had to leave and was out there money. We could never reach the owner and management was no further help. 4,600 gone out the window. We spent hours grabbing roaches with napkins to reduce what we were seeing. This can happen I guess anywhere what makes the difference is how they handle it. We will never return and hope you don't either. If management does not care about trying everything to make your stay worth wild there are plenty of beach house owners who do!!! We expect are money back at the very least! If one person would have called to make sure it was handled and we're happy we never would have left this review!!!!!!!!!!!!!! We probably killed at least 30 roaches and are continuing to see more. Also these aren't any roaches these are german roaches people bring these home they can develop a colony at your home.

name: New Life Builders LLC
text: Great Company with good staff.

name: Penny Manuel
text: We booked before hurricane Sally, and canceled 26 days before our scheduled arrival. The whole community is destroyed but they will not refund our money.  Don’t book with them and expect any flexibility, even in case of catastrophic natural disaster.

name: Lynn Christofferson
text:
We had priveledge of working with realtor
Shelly Dzwonkowski on our recent purchase of a condo for our 2nd home in Gulf Shores. Shelly is a awesome realtor, trusting and a knowledgeable person of the area. Her professionalism was outstanding and she went so much further than we ever expected to make sure everything was covered and we understood the every aspect about the property. She took many videos of the property, pool neighborhood. We could never have asked for a better realtor that was there for us through the entire process of purchasing our new home site unseen. She's top notch and we consider her
A very desireable person to recommend to anyone in working with a realtor and person aiding our  purchasing property. She works in Al and Fl areas. She was and is still always available in anything we may have questions on about our property and Condo. Highly recommend Shelly.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: carolyn Barnes
text: Thanks so much for recommending the Caribe penthouse, it was perfect for the bachelorette party we had! Alex made my reservation experience so easy.

name: bobbi closser
text:
I left feeling restored from the mandates of life and like I gained a friend in Taylor and in Bella Beach Properties.

The space was fun and functional (working remote, cooking a meal, ordering in, watching a movie)! The view from the patio of the 15th floor was even better in person!

Taylor and the team were amazing!  From answering general questions to responding to a maintenance request, I felt well taken care of.  I even forgot some items in the medicine cabinet on day of check out and Taylor called immediately to inform me and connected with his staff so I could quickly arrange for pick up.

My only regret is that I didn’t make it to Floribama! (Guess there’s always next time)!!

Bobbi

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We loved having you. I must share a quick story. The day before Bobbie departed, our cleaner arrived to a condo that was left in such a complete disaster that it brought her to tears.  The next day, she went to clean the condo where Bobbi had stayed. Our cleaner said “if every guest was like this person I would be in heaven”. Bobbi left a nice note for the cleaner and left the condo spotless. It made her day. Thank you for being so awesome! We looking forward to your return visit and yes, we too feel we have a new great friend.

name: Comedienne Joy
text: I highly recommend contacting Taylor Means with Bella Beach Properties for your next vacation stay. He over surpassed what I was looking for with my stay at The Palms in Orange Beach, Alabama. The condo was not only clean, but quiet and I felt safe.  Taylor provided excellent customer service when I asked for food recommendations and somewhere to get my external harddrive repaired. I'm using his service for my girl's trip and a family trip later in the year. One of my bff's took his information for a future birding trip she is coordinating. The Palms is a great location as it is in close proximity to shopping and restaurants.

name: Lela Holland
text: It can really get busy during weekdays lunch hours. I usually prefer to order online. The food is really good including their salads, wraps and kebabs. Staff could be more courteous.

resp.text: Unfortunately, this review will lower our rating even though it was not about our business. As much as we love salads, wraps, and kebabs, we don't serve them.

name: Jan Garey
text: Had a horrible experience with AirBnb and Ana grime Tradewinds on my trip to Orange Beach, Al. Taylor, Jeff and Mary are the best to work with. Personal service with integrity, honesty and ethics. I will gladly be using Bella Beach Properties on my return to this area.

name: Tim Frey
text: Bella Beach is always responsive, friendly and honest.  Bella Beach is by far the best rental management company we’ve worked with over the last 20 years.  We will continue to use Bella Beach and recommend them for you and your family.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and glowing review of Bella Beach Properties. Providing friendly, top-notch service to both our clients and our guests is our #1 priority. We are thankful to have you as a loyal client and value our relationship.

name: afzaal lodhi
text: We had joy we had fun staying in your place clean and what a location thanks a mil next visit for sure we are staying with Bella properties thanks again

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you! We loved having you and look forward to your return visit! We appreciate you mentioning the great location and cleanliness of the space.

name: Gabe Johnson
text: Best time of my family's life  perfect view of the ocean 🌊 we will definitely go stay there again

resp.text: It makes us smile and makes our day to get feedback like this. Thank you for entrusting your family vacation to us and we look forward to your return visit.

name: JIM CLATER
text:
We love Orange Beach and Taylor
Means provides great customer service.

name: Tracey Young
text:
If I could give them less than a star I would. I rented a property with them, Plantation, in Gulf Shores. Fifth floor steps from the beach, elevator, and tuns of amenities.  Not what I got.

What I got was a broken elevator carrying bags and extras up 5 flight of stairs not my idea of fun.  Trying to contact our host Mary for hours and got no response.  She could care less that it was 7PM, I had been in the car with kids for 8 hours and I was not happy.

Good thing I rented through Airbnb and they were able to find me another rental. I would not recommend Bella to anyone. They were not professional and the property was not as advertised.

name: Lisa Bogle
text: Easy booking, prompt responses, clean and comfortable rental.

name: Donna Nunnelley
text: Bella Beach Properties is the best property management on the Beach. Call Mary Cain Fowler. You will be pleased that you did.

name: Andrew Voelter
text: Do not book through them!!  The condo we rented was filthy. Over all, completely neglected. Master bed sheets had to be 5 years old, hair and stains on them when we arrived. Real nice to find at 10 pm after a long trip. Leaking toilet, non draining tub, highly stained outdoor couch, broken patio lounge chair on the balcony, missing outlet cover, missing closet door, washing machine noise that sounded like it was going to explode at any minute, highly stained carpet. I could go on. Worst of all...we emailed them with concerns (photos attached to help them, we thought) and not even a response!!!!! Nothing!!!! Even after my wife spoke to them...Nothing!!! They obviously do not care about their renters. Stay away!!

name: Samantha Frasier
text: There were 7 of us that took a girls trip and stayed at the palms unit 304...we all had a great time and really enjoyed this condo. I will definitely use Bella beach properties again!!

name: Mary Edwards
text: Love Bella Beach Properties! Taylor and Cady are so hospitable and knowledgeable! Highly recommend!

name: Dave Lyon
text: Beautiful people helping you vacation.  The staff is awesome.

name: CJ
text:
Mary Cain Fowler is the best. Have used Bella Beach Properties numerous times in Orange Beach and would recommend them to all.
The company is run with the highest standards and I can not Thank Mary and Tyler enough for all that they do for all of their clients. Not so much as clients, but all are treated as family.

name: C W
text: I have written many time asking for details and have only heard. Ack once in the past 6 months and was told they would write me back. I have stayed here many times but as of now will not book anymore with them.

name: Paula Granberry
text: Taylor and Mary were very helpful in finding the perfect condo for our family vacation.  We chose The Tidewater condominiums for its ideal beach location convenient to restaurants and activities for the family.  I would highly recommend the personalized service at Bella Beach.

name: Randy Curry
text: We stayed at the trade winds condos. The property is nice. But the customer service from Bella was awful. We never received an email or any information on how to check In. Only a automatic reservation confirmation payment confirmation. Called several times, left messages, emailed and never got a response or a call back. Finally someone texts from someone on how to get in. They really should provide more information to those who rent a condo.

name: Tonya W (the Sassy Puffin)
text: I had the best getaway to Orange Beach last week! I stayed at The Palms on Perdido Beach Blvd., a spacious 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom condo overlooking the gulf. Nice location. Would definitely go back.

name: Justice Wally
text: Excellent Realtor and very knowledgeable of the Orange Beach and Gulf Shores area.  My wife and I recently purchased a home in Orange Beach and Taylor Means was very helpful and patient in our home search.

name: Denny Harms
text: Bella Beach Properties is amazing. 3rd year in a row booking our Spring family Vacation with these guys and they will be our choice for years to come!!!

name: Amy Barclay
text:
Stayed with Bella Beach.. it was the nasty place I have ever stayed!  We had to go
buy sheets to put over the furniture because they was so dirty and smelled so bad.

name: Jonathan Cannon
text: Our family stays with Bella Beach Properties every time we visit Orange Beach or Gulf Shores, Alabama. Bella Beach Properties always delivers a great condo for our vacation!

name: Taylor Means
text: Bella Beach Properties offers beautiful, clean gulf front condos with excellent customer service!

name: Zac C
text: Very polite, very professional, and the condos are great.

name: Ryan Miller
text: Beyond rude and it was dirty so many difficulties even getting into the right condo. They just kept messing up our reservations then turned into a screaming match and told we were lying and that we are all fine and should just enjoy the beach even the patio doors to the balcony locked us out. I understand the property has wonderful views. However, this is not how you treat the guests. Even if the property owner was at fault, you decided to manage the property, you are responsible for taking care of the guests. Due to the horrible experience we left and stayed somewhere else the second night. Even a simple apology and explanation would’ve helped. Instead we just get called liars and to get deal with it. Should I also mention that there are 3 small kids here and the fridge was full of beer when we arrived? And the balcony door automatically locked if you went outside? How is this a way to manage?? All I wanted was help and what I received, was exactly the opposite.

name: Paige Finson
text: It was a nightmare trip to say the very least. The management has no customer service skills at all and screams and argues with guest. Taylor was the worst never stay with them !! The place was dirty and they couldn’t even get the condo number right. We tried talking about our complaints then told we are wrong and was yelled at and wasn’t allowed to talk. Don’t waste your money for the good views stay else where !

name: Mark Carter
text: Had an awesome time at the beach this week. The condo was great and Taylor was wonderful to work with. We were a little high maintenance but he took great care of us. The last place we stayed in with another company was a disaster. We were so happy we decided to use Bella Beach this time. Would highly recommend. 🏖

name: Mark Emanuelsen
text: Great rental experience and the staff were very responsive on questions we had. Will definitely be rented from them again!

name: Eric Campbell
text: Love this place. Very comfortable and recently updated. Will definitely be back.

name: Andy Nelson
text: Great view and nice and clean condo. Owners checked on us upon arrival which was nice! Already booked our 2nd stay

name: Jenna Qualls
text: We stayed in October 2020 and everything about it was perfect. Very clean, great staff, and amazing views. Going again and staying here in May.

resp.text: We are excited that you all enjoyed your stay! Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

name: Kimberley Lowrey
text: We were over the moon happy here. Close to Bahama Bobs for dinner and it was walking distance. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The security was always around and able to help me find my way around a few ways. Our room had a fantastic view. The beds were nice and clean. What kept the perfect score from happening was the sliding glass door was hard to open and close. My husband had to close it. We will be back next year and ask for this same room!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your rating! However it sounds like though it was an overall positive trip, there were still some issues during your stay. We set high standards here at Brett/Robinson, and highly value your choice to vacation with us. We will forward this to our management team and work to get it right.

name: Harold Huckeby
text: TERRIBLE beach experience and the room is OVER PRICED.  They fill the beach with rental chairs and umbrellas, then if You brought a canopy you are moved behind empty rental chairs. The neighboring building has one row of rentals, which is appropriate.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of Brett/Robinson. Reviews like these help us to adjust, and work hard to improve guests' experience. In these unprecedented times we are working in overdrive to uphold the Brett/Robinson standards. Thanks again, and be well!

name: Darlene Nash
text: I've stayed a lot of places in Gulf Shorest this has to be the worstThe bed is Lumpy the the pillows are rock hard the internet you can forget about watching tv the shower is a little stream other than that it ok.

resp.text:
We're sorry to hear this location wasn't a perfect pairing. We highly value your choice to vacation with us at Brett/Robinson, and have dedicated staff members in our call center who are here to help you find the best place on the coast for your specific needs and desires. Please give us a call at 1-800-211-7892.

We hope to welcome  you back soon!

name: Shane Hric
text: The condo complex is in a great location on the beach and close walking distance to restaurants. The rental company was terrible to deal with concerning Unit #271. Extremely over priced for the run down condo. It wasn't cleaned very well on arrival, all the furniture was old, dated, and worn out. The bedrooms had long thread carpeting which was old dingy, bathrooms had mold, and light switches were taped up! For $2000 for 5 night, complete slum lord type rip-off!

resp.text: We're so sorry to hear about this Shane. We have looked into the situation and do not believe you booked with us at Brett/Robinson, as the unit described is not part of our rental program. We hope you will consider booking with us in the future!

name: J Holmes
text:
These condos are conveniently located on the beach and near dining and shopping options. Many seniors come down for January and February to escape the colder states. I dropped of my parents (who will stay 2 months) and stayed awhile.

Positives: The maintenance team seemed to be extremely responsive to our needs. Most issues were addressed within 24 hrs. In addition, the sales team has gotten to know my parents over the years and is quite good at knowing which properties will fit their needs.

Here are my two biggest complaints: 1. Only one of the two elevators was working the whole two weeks I was there. 2. Some of the hallways had no working lighting. This is especially difficult for the seniors who have low visibility yet have to use a small number pad to open doors.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review of our property.  We hope that your parents will have an enjoyable stay with us.  I have addressed the issues you brought to our attention with our Maintenance Team.
1.  We apologize for only having one elevator, but unfortunately the elevator was severely damaged in Hurricane Sally.  We were not able to get the correct parts very quickly, due to supply lines being down.  We have now completed our Maintenance on the elevator and it is back up and running as of January 8th.  I apologize for the delay and inconvenience.
2.  As for the lighting, I had the Facilities Maintenance Manager inspect it this morning.  He stated that all non working exterior lights have been replaced and are now currently working.  Again, I apologize for this and I really appreciate you bringing it to our attention.
If you have any other questions or issues that we can help with, please email us at info@brettrobinson.com and put ATTN:  Melissa in the subject line.
We appreciate yall, and we will do what ever is necessary to make your parents stay a wonderful vacation.
Best Regards,
Melissa

name: Gaye Ann Fowler
text: I  have rented at Island winds West now my third year. I am very disappointed with unit 473. It was not clean when I arrived and has many problems with the unit. There was food on the back splash behind the sink which  I wiped down the entire kitchen. I went to get the mop to mop the floors and the mop was so dirty that I had to soak it in bleach overnight. After rinsing it several times and obtaining a clean pair of cleaning bleach, I mopped the floor and the water was so dirty there was no way they could’ve mopped it before I arrived. The white shears at the sliding doors are dirty all along the bottom, the furniture looks to be old and dirty. I bought sheets to cover all the furniture. Both showers controls are so loose that water is coming out head and faucet at same time. Electric switch in  Guest bedroom comes on sometimes and another time it doesn’t come on. It’s very temperamental. The light above the dining room table has to be plugged in to come on and the switch appears to have been taped over with black electrical tape. The coffee table leg fell off. This unit needs majorly updating and cleaned. Not happy at all with this rental unit compared to the other two years renting of different units. The only positive thing is view.

name: Jennifer Orvis-Cline
text: Wonderful experiences!  Immaculate condos and very pleasant staff, who are great with tips and suggestions.  The beach is steps from the building and not crowded.  Everything is clean and tidy.  We had one window that was ajar and it was fixed immediately.  There are washers and dryers in the condos and the kitchens are gorgeous!   I felt like I was in my own summer home!  I long to go back every year!  I won’t stay in any other rental, other than the ones by Brett-Robinson!  Truly Magnificent holidays!!!

resp.text:
Jennifer,

Thank you for the review.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your condo and stay with us.  We take pride in all of our staff and glad your window was fixed quickly.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

name: A Rich
text: Older property but very clean and well maintained. Quiet and nice amenities.

resp.text: We are excited that you all enjoyed your stay! Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

name: Shane Hric
text: The condo complex is in a great location on the beach and close walking distance to restaurants. The rental company was terrible to deal with concerning Unit #271. Extremely over priced for the run down condo. It wasn't cleaned very well on arrival, all the furniture was old, dated, and worn out. The bedrooms had long thread carpeting which was old dingy, bathrooms had mold, and light switches were taped up! For $2000 for 5 night, complete slum lord type rip-off!

resp.text: We're so sorry to hear about this Shane. We have looked into the situation and do not believe you booked with us at Brett/Robinson, as the unit described is not part of our rental program. We hope you will consider booking with us in the future!

name: Shelley McCullough
text: Loved the at home feel and being on the beach. Great place for family vacation.

resp.text: We are excited that you all enjoyed your stay! Thank you so much for taking the time to let us know about your experience. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

name: Courtney Morrison Lewis
text: Amazing place to stay!! Close to everything. Have stayed in units 805 and 505 and they’re beautiful and well decorated/comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you Courtney for your great review.  We look forward to seeing you back on the Alabama Gulf Coast real soon!! :)

name: Ginger Vaughn
text:
This is an average condo complex on the beach. Most of these units are individually owned so you can't truly rate the whole place. Our unit was decent, but ceiling is thin. We heard everything from the unit above us with several kids so there was no sleeping in or relaxing. Balcony was nice when when the people below and next door were not outside chain smoking and smoking pot. Someone was not watching their kids and the fire alarm was pulled. Had to evacuate to the parking lot for an hour....
Some positive points are, it is direct beach front, elevators worked and the common areas were mostly clean. Would only go again if price was considerably low.  Having said that, this was the first condo we had rented in over 25 years. We usually rent a private home.

resp.text:
Ginger,

Thank you for the review.  We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us, despite the few issues you experienced during your stay.  We have many other great properties to choose from and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Brett-Robinson Vacation Rentals

name: Tom Fox
text: Not what we were expecting as an “upgrade”for being relocated from a different property. Bathrooms and furniture were dirty and smelled bad. Beds and furniture very worn and uncomfortable. Ripped sheets inadequately supplied baking dishes and utensils. Noisy elevators washer/dryer.

resp.text: Mr. Fox,  I am very sorry that your vacation was not up to your expectations.  At Brett/Robinson we strive to have the highest standards in the Vacation Rental industry.  If you would please send us an email with your reservation #, building name, unit # and the details above to info@brettrobinson.com, we will be glad to follow up with management.  Also, please include the reason why you were relocated to an upgrade, so that we get an a snapshot of the entire picture and can address it correctly.  Again, we apologize for the inconvenience.  We look forward to working out this situation and welcoming you back to the Alabama Gulf Coast in the near future.  Best Regards,  Brett/Robinson Customer Service Team

name: Tony McIlwain
text: Wonderful views, folks at the front desk were very friendly and the place was well kept up.

name: Vincent Scanio
text: We Stay there From October 12th to the 19th.The Room was very Dirty. There was Mold around the Air Conditioner...3 sets of Adult.. The one Bedroom was for Kids..I would NEVER stay there again....

resp.text: Hi Vincent,  Im sorry your visit was not what you expected.  At Brett/Robinson, we strive to provide the upmost best customer service.  If you would kindly email us your Reservation/Confirmation # and the Unit # you stayed in, we want to address this with our Housekeeping Operation.  Please send an email to info@Brett/Robinson.com with that information.  We will be glad to check it out and get back to you ASAP.  Thank you!!

name: Rachael Smith
text: All I can say about Unit 170...hire new cleaning staff!!!!! This was the nastiest unit I’ve ever stayed in on vacation!!! Couldn’t even allow the baby to crawl around the unit due to floors obviously not being mopped. Walked into our “master bedroom” to find a large dehumidifier unit. Contacted the manager and told her I wasn’t happy due to machine in my unit upon arrival. Manager stated someone would be coming to pick up machine and it had been used due to a leak on an upper floor that had caused moisture in our unit. 😏 2 hours later and unit is still here!!!! Sweeper floor when we first arrived and dirt everywhere. Hygiene products from the previous renter where left in the bathroom! I would never suggest renting unit 170 at Island Winds West!!!!

resp.text: Rachel, We're so sorry to hear this. We set high standards here at Brett/Robinson, and highly value your choice to vacation with us. We will forward this to our management team and work to get it right.

name: Becky Benningfield
text: This is a great location right on the beach. However it could def use a remodel. Also signs everywhere NO MASK - NO ENTRY. This was NOT enforced. Maybe 10% wore masks. 😠

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of Brett/Robinson, Becky. Reviews like these help us to adjust, and work hard to improve guests' experience. In these unprecedented times we are working in overdrive to uphold the Brett/Robinson standards, as well as state ordered mandates.

name: Brooke Cantrell
text: check in at 4p or later, 6:30 room still not ready, two beds had dirty sheets, one looked like with dry blood, tp holder loose from wall barely kept tp on, bathroom sink leaking, floors not swept, missing bottom glass shelf in refrigerator (so not as much room for groceries), window leaked cold air, heard dog next door barking (thought no pets), long hair in bathroom drawers where not wiped out, shower/tub missing plug in bottom and looked dirty where you wouldn't want to take a bath in. Gym listed but no bathroom to use in there or water fountain to refill water bottles. Old equipment, only has 2 treadmills, 1 elliptical, and one multi function weight bench with broken leg lift part. Halls and outside of rooms like rough and dirty. I have pictures but no where to upload on here. Gym listed on website but just 4 pieces of equipment old and 1 piece broke not working, no bathroom available in gym for guest, was told its for employees only and kept locked, no water fountain to refill water bottles.

name: Shani Thorson
text: Bath tub doesn't work

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear about your recent visit. Please allow us to look into this situation. Would you mind providing us with your contact and reservation information? Please email info@brett-robinson.com and provide: First and last name, condo building, and unit you stayed in during your trip. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Juan Carlos Ramos
text: Nice secure good service nice view to the beach

resp.text:
Juan Carlos,

Thank you for the review.  We are happy that you enjoyed your condo and stay with us and take pride in our friendly and helpful staff.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

name: Ann Eaton
text: That 5pm check in is unbelievable,  After driving for a distance with Children, We were ready to freshen up and relax, it was dark when We were able to leave and explore the City...smh, Never again

resp.text: Ann, we are so very sorry this was your experience. We have forwarded to our management team so they are aware of your concern. Due to the global pandemic we have had to push back check-in time so that our housekeeping team has time to conduct the additional procedures required. On top of this, the summer months are our busiest time. This fall and winter, our housekeepers will have less rooms to clean because our condos will be much less crowded due to demand. Therefore check in time will be much earlier! The fall is our best kept secret, the water is still warm enough to swim in, and there are no crowds. Consider returning to the coast this fall!

name: David Honeman
text: Good peaceful stay, aside from occasionally hearing people rolling carts to the elevator. The bedroom was right by the entrance to the condo, but we really did not hear any disruptive people as they seem to be fairly strict on their rules. It is an older facility, but kept up. They replaced a battery in the fire alarm promptly. Beautiful view be of the beach and nice pool. Parking may be tight during peak holidays!

resp.text:
David,

Thank you for the review.  We are glad that you had a nice and peaceful stay with us as well as the amazing view of the beach from you balcony!  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

name: Mindy Billings
text: Great view. Nice staff.

resp.text: We are so pleased to hear this Mindy. Come back soon!

name: Matika Boyd
text: Anytime a 6 year old loves it, you know it's great! Enjoyed my stay. It was like home away from home.

resp.text:
Matika,

Thank you for the review.  We are very pleased that you and your family enjoyed your condo and stay with us at the Island Winds West.  We look forward to having you and your family stay with us again in the future.

Brett-Robinson Vacation Rentals

name: Jerry Lingefelt
text: Great vacation rentals right on the beach and within walking distance of lots of restaurants and sites

resp.text: Jerry, we love to hear you enjoyed your gulf front vacation! Let us know if there is anything that would of made your stay PERFECT. Be well!

name: Maggie Pearce
text: Stayed here on our Gulf Shores vacation. Very beautiful and very sweet people! The view is right by the beach. Decently sized balconies and very pretty rooms. 2 bed 2 bath condo. Pool is always clean.

resp.text:
Maggie,

Thank you for the review.  We are very pleased that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  We take pride in our friendly and helpful staff and look forward to seeing you again in the future.

name: A&K Acres
text: Our room was great. It had a fully stocked kitchen with every gadget imaginable. However, there is no lobby, indoor pool, or hottub. The pool is outdoors and the gate was locked the whole time.

name: Valencia Jackson-Jones
text: I stayed in room 508 and the balcony view overlooking the swimming pool and onto the beach was very nice. However, the walkway on the 5th floor had a disturbing odor, which smelled of a mixture of something dead and mildew. This facility can use a good pressure wash and not to mention my family did not have hot water to shower for two nights straight. We had to take lukewarm showers. The dryer had to be reset three different times before our clothing fully dried. I will not choose to stay at Island Winds West again.

resp.text: We would like to know more about your experience. For your privacy, please send your reservation details to info@brett-robinson.com We hope you will give us another chance.

name: Emma R.
text: Really Fun Experience! It was such an easy reservation and check in, and the kitchen had tons of dishes and appliances. It had a great view and very friendly staff, doing things such as helping with your things. Very nice room and the bathroom was delightful! There was granite counters and newly remodeled bathrooms! Wonderful pool and beach! Definitely coming again!! I was in room #178!

name: Arlene Green
text: Elena at the office was rude & very unhelpful!! Will never stay again or recommend this place!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of Brett/Robinson. Reviews like these help us to adjust, and work hard to improve guests' experience. In these unprecedented times we are working in overdrive to uphold the Brett/Robinson standards. Thanks again, and be well!

name: Ray Tenhumberg
text: There was no emails or warnings of any kind about the work being done. High pressure sprayers blowing paint and water from upper floors down onto our walkway. Hammer drills non stop. They had half the parking lot closed off the whole week. I had to complain to the office someone was taking up three spots. The next day we opened the balcony sliding door only to smell parking lot sealant. We could not use the pool for two days or walk to our car without getting oil on your shoes. People had trails on there painted sidewalks. Ha Ha .We also found out thursday before we arrived several rooms were robbed while the people were out of the room. Shrimp Fest started Friday. No doors were broken into or windows. Random rooms on random floors were broken into. The OFFICE NEVER WARNED US ON SATURDAY Two days after the robberies about what happened!!!!!r I believe the workers had a master key and helping themselves. I stayed on the 5th floor at the end. I am 6'2 and 275lbs I way walking by the stairway door when a worker came out of the stairway. He was Shocked and looked like he was up to no good. This was our second trip there.We wont be back!!!!!!!! POOR MANAGEMENT

name: Judith Galligan
text: Just spent a week in unit 380. Room was ok, fully equipped, and clean. However, the rest of the complex is not clean. Green stagnant water standing on pool deck. They didn't clean the pool for 3 days and then cause I asked! Someone cleaned fish and left the remains in the trash can at the entrance, this stayed for 3 days! The stench was horrific! They then emptied this can into the dumpster, in the parking lot. The smell now permeated the entire building. Just awful experience!!

resp.text:
Judith,

We are glad that you enjoyed your condo.  We strive to make each guests stay an enjoyable one and it unfortunate you had these issues.  Please e-mail us at info@brett-robinson with your issues or concerns and we will address it with Management.

name: Haley 97
text: The location was convenient, but the Room was dirty when we arrived , The tv didn’t work, and the mattress in living room was uncomfortable

resp.text: We are so sorry to hear about your recent visit. Please allow us to look into this situation. Would you mind providing us with your contact and reservation information? Please email info@brett-robinson.com and provide: First and last name, condo building, and unit you stayed in during your trip. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: denise osbourne
text: We booked condo for a month stay. When booking we asked if there would be any maintenance during our stay, where told only routine. They have power washed and power scraped the floors and ceilings on each floor. The noise level in rooms where you couldn't even talk. The 2nd week we were here at least 4 condos were broken into. Ours was one of them. Luckily the police retrieved our belongs minus much cash. Not one person that works for Brent Robinson checked on us and they told us be sure to lock your door. Our door was dead bolted. Our patio, on 6th floor, was unlocked.  Had to have come from roof. Aside from proximity to festival & beach our stay has not been the best

resp.text:
Denise,

Thank you for the review.  We are glad that you enjoyed the festival and beach.  It is unfortunate that you had these issues during your stay.  Please e-mail us at info@brett-robinson.com so that we can pass this information on to Management.

name: Gary Jenkins
text: We will return for our annual trip to the gulf we will stay here as much as possible go an see for yourself it's a nice place people are very nice

resp.text:
Gary,

Thank you for the review.  We are very pleased that you and your friends and family enjoyed your condo and stay with us.  We take in our friendly staff and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

name: Theresa Hyland
text: We were turning around in the parking lot (not staying there for any time period what so ever) and we were approached by a staff member of this property. She (older lady w gray hair) screamed at us to leave and not speed through the parking lot. Lady - there are speed bumps through out the lot, do you really think we wanted to bottom out our car? I feel bad for those who have to deal with this woman. Merry Christmas Grinch lady!

name: Nick Hulen
text: DO NOT EVER STAY HERE! you pay for parking, you do not get it, i brought elderly with me after paying they said first come first serve, and the security held spots for the people that cooked and gave them food. We had to park a quarter mile away, 1 elevator was down most of the stay, the room was sub par for the 2k price, Brett Robinson told me that they could do nothing i had to speak with front desk. Lights out in parking lot, only 2 lights out of 10 working at pool, this is a swrious life safety issue if you know anything about stays! This was awful!!! Will never ever do again

name: William Whittaker
text: Well, they finally contacted me & advised they were going to compensate me for our trouble.  Sorry they had to & we had to have this experience. I will change my rating when the compensation arrives.  ( Old-"They don't tell you about the dust from their construction remodeling and take your money?  Very poor management team!")

name: Lane Rogers
text: DO NOT RENT FROM THEM!!!!! They do not have parking! “You are not guaranteed parking!!!!” SERIOUSLY PEOPLE!!!!! How can you rent a condo and not have parking available!!!???? They “sell” their parking to others as “parking passes” then you have NO PARKING WHEN YOU RENT!!!!!!! WORST EXPERIENCE OUR FAMILY HAS EVER HAD!!!!!!!!!! WE WILL NEVER RENT FROM BRETT ROBINSON AGAIN!!!!!

name: Cristina Willey
text: Great family vacation. So convenient to all the Gulf Shores fun

resp.text: Thanks Cristina! We try to make our guest feel at home. See you next time!

name: Melinda Thrasher
text: The check-in was smooth and efficient with my reservation. Staff was friendly. Individual owners provide content of kitchen/bath and furniture so this review is for this unit ONLY. We were pleased with the unit and impressed with with the amenities in the kitchen.

name: Connie Wilks
text: We were visiting my sister and it was amazing. The food was great.

resp.text: Connie, thank you for the review.  We are so glad that you are your family a great stay with us.  We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

name: Brian Honaker
text: Absolutely beautiful views.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 Star review! Come back and see us soon

name: Robert Kidwell
text: Bad experience. Dirty floors. AC partially works. Washer and Dryer inoperative. Dirty kitchen urtensils. Have requested partial refund. This was #475

name: CausIsaid
text: Old building. Some properties may be updated but building.shows wear.

resp.text:
Ht4jpc,

Thank you for the review.  Please e-mail us at info@brett-robinson.com and let us know of any issues you may have had with your stay or the building and we will address these issues with Management.  We do have many other great properties to choose from and look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.

Brett-Robinson Vacation Rentals

name: Brad Gartman
text: Roaches! Posted a picture on here as well. Roach was approximately 3 inches long. This is not a joke. Please take this into consideration. High rates as well. $1,200 for 2 bedroom for 3 nights. Guest who sleep on the pull out in livingroom, have to use one of the restrooms in the bedrooms, which can be inconvenient.

name: Kayla Newton
text: Small rooms, affordable, beautiful beachfront view, lots of close restaurants within walking distance, pretty quiet, older building, only 2 elevators, pool, and pool tags and parking passes required (can be a little pesky at times). Overall a great place for an affordable family vacation.

name: Todd Drummer
text: Older condo but updated. Pool not really big enough. Access to the beach though is great, very short walk.

resp.text: Thanks for your review Todd! We hope you come back to see us real soon

name: ROME BOVA
text: What an amazing time

resp.text:
Rome,

We are pleased that you enjoyed your condo and stay with us at the Island Winds West.  We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

name: Joey Young
text: The worse experience I have ever had on vacation.  Do not,  I repeat do not stay here. We arrived on the first day and was told they had oversold parking and therefore we had to park in public parking a block away. Are you serious? Trust me they were. The room was old and in need of updating. Bathrooms are old, from the fixtures to the tubs. Find another place. The reviews should have been worse. It's horrible. No on site help either. You are basically screwed.

name: Sheryl Johnson
text: Really beautiful condos they have a pool too far away from the water for me the ocean I mean

resp.text: Thank you so much for the 5 Stars Sheryl

name: Sierrah Puckett
text: We stayed here in room 409 this past weekend from May 25th-May 28th.  Overall I cant say a whole lot about the accommodations. When we booked the room, being as it is to sleep up to 6/7 people, we were told that two parking spots came along with the booking. When we got there to check in, we found out that we had to pay additional fees for any vehicles. Not a single one was included in the booking cost. Not even 24 hours in we had problems with the room keys not wanting to let us in. Some times it would blink red, sometimes it didnt register at all. We had to go to the office 4/5 times to fix the issue. Finally they replaced the batteries in the main lock. The office staff was rude, pissy, and didnt have much interested in helping their guest. Lastly, upon leaving, we did the courteous thing by sweeping majority of the tracked in sand up,  wiped down counters, made sure all dishes had been ran and washed, and so forth. Left, turned out keys in. And headed home. Today May 31st we are charged $110!! after speaking with someone at anchor, who didnt know why, she contacted the condo then gave us a call. These people are trying to say that they have pictures of ashes and cigarettes butts all over the room, and claiming they had to strip everything down due to the smell of smoke. Mind you we have small children in this room under the age of 5!!!!! Not once was a cigarette brought into that room and we are extremely disappointed with the way this is going. Might I add we were also charged another $40 for them to wash the comforter! The cleaning policy clearly says fresh linens are included and any additional cleaning will be extra. There was not reason to be charged extra! We will be doing everything in our power to have our bank reverse the charges as they are FAULTY!!! We will not be booking again, and would never recommend the condo to anyone!!!!

name: Kevin M. Martin
text: location was great. well stocked kitchen. other than that i was very disappointed with unit 672. mainly because i paid 700.00 for the stay and the beds were the most uncomfortable beds i have slept in. i could literally feel every spring in the mattress.  i feel that if i am going to pay the price i paid i should atleast have decent beds. Extremely musty smell in the condo, there were no extra linens for the couch bed. and if you have a larger family like myself , dont plan on getting showers all at once. you have about 5 minutes worth of hot water. Along with my stay we had construction workers constantly knocking on our door to come in and measure different things. didnt work out well with a 4 month old trying to sleep.  Probably will not be using island winds west again.

name: Whitney Allison
text:
I would never recommend this place or stay here again. We stayed in room 877 and on entering the condo was met with a musty mildew odor, back balcony door had been left open and was almost impossible to open or close without significant effort, wifi service was spotty, phone in room wouldn't dial out or to front desk, bed sheets were gritty from sand. The next morning construction was loud on the balcony, and I couldn't reach the front desk so on going to the beach I stopped by to ask how long it would take place seeing as I was on vacation and wanted to sit on the balcony and hear the waves not construction, was told they didn't even know anything was going on in the building, Brett-Robinson only owned the property didn't manage it, I explained that I booked through Brett Robinson and that was my only contacts and that if they owned the property and was renting it it would make sense they should know what was happening and inform guest before they arrive, I was told by the front desk woman, Dawn that she sarcasticly told me she was sorry I couldn't understand and that there was nothing that could be done and that they had no information.

Later that day I began to notice several dirty dishes that were put up as clean (spatula with dried up egg, skillet with burnt food on it, spoon with food on it) called to inform them with the number I assumed  was  the front desk(the phone in room is broke) and reached a lady from house keeping whose phone I had borrowed earlier who helped with the situations, finally reached the front desk only to be again be greeted by rude employes griping because we didnt call the front desk or use the phone in the room, explained it didn't work and they acted as if we were stupid. The lady from housekeeping came took the dishes apologized and explained they had a lot of new kids working and that stuff was missed, she was great. She gave us the phone number for the building manager and when the situation was explained to her and the problems especially with Dawn her response was "you really wouldn't stay here again because of 1 person" no honey it's the dirty dishes, stinky room, gritty bed, broke door locks, broke balcony door, bad wifi, and broke phone that's the reason we would never stay at a Brett Robinson rental again the rude employes is just the cherry on top! Save yourself the money and heartache go elsewhere!!!

name: Jayson Gallardo
text:
Being the first time that I took my family of four to the island, we didn't know what to expect, or what to look for. We spent days trying to find the perfect place on the beach at a reasonable price.

I think we found that place. We rented unit 879 of Island Winds West from Brett/Robinson, and couldn't be happier. They really eased some of the worries we had with some of the other property rental places nearby.

We booked less than two weeks before our vacation, and we still only had to pay a deposit ahead of time. Other places we checked out required the full payment.

The unit itself is almost perfect. The only reason I give it four stars instead of five is mainly due to the low water pressure. Maybe this is normal on the island; we're not too sure. The shower in the master bedroom had the worst of it.

The other negative is the washer/dryer combo. We couldn't figure out which was punching holes in our clothes... Also, my wife mentioned some dust on the pictures, but I didn't notice them myself.

And I should probably mention the Wi-Fi. Each unit seems to have their own Wi-Fi, but are probably all feeding into one network. I ran a speed test on it and only recorded 1Mb of download speed. This resulted in Netflix buffering every once in a while. You can forget about streaming anything in HD...

But who goes to the beach to stay in all the time?  Everything else really is perfect. The kitchen is fully stocked with dishes and utensils. Just bring your groceries. We even had enough dishwasher detergent for a couple of days.

And the view.... To wake up and sit on the balcony and watch the ocean... It is amazing. We even slept with our window open so we could fall asleep listening to the waves.

And speaking of sleep, I invited my parents to come stay with us, and we still were all able to sleep comfortably. My parents moved the twin beds together and my two toddlers slept on the pull out sofa bed.

So, over all we're having a great time at IWW-879. We will more than likely rent from Brett/Robinson again. Hopefully we can find that 5 star condo next time. I will be posting pics to my Google+ profile for everyone to check out.
